tika-s0301t:270_0: Kāmaṃ heṭṭhimamaggehipi ekaccassa mānassa pahānaṃ labbhati.
tika-s0301t:270_1: Aggamaggeneva pana tassa anavasesato pahānanti āha –
tika-s0301t:270_4: na upacārasamādhimattena samādhimattaṃ sandhāya paccekaṃ vākyaparisamāpanassa ayujjanato.
tika-s0301t:270_5: Na hi appanaṃ appattaṃ lokuttarajjhānaṃ atthi.
tika-s0301t:270_7: Tathā hi vakkhati “sucetasoti ettha cittena paññā dassitā”ti.
tika-s0301t:270_8: “Sabbadhi vippamutto”ti sabbesu bhavādīsu visaṃsaṭṭhacitto sabbaso khandhādīhi visaṃyutto hotīti vuttaṃ
tika-s0301t:271_0: Mānaṃ nissāya duccaritacaraṇato māno nāmāyaṃ sīlabhedano.
tika-s0301t:271_8: Adhisīlasikkhā adhicittasikkhā adhipaññāsikkhāti sīlādīnipi visesetvā vuttāni.
tika-s0301t:271_9: Sambhave byabhicāre ca visesanavisesitabbatāti taṃ dassento “adhisīlañca nāma sīle sati hotī”tiādiṃ vatvā
tika-s0301t:271_11: Paṭhamanayo saṅkaravasena pavattoti asaṅkaravasena dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādinā dutiyanayo vutto.
tika-s0301t:271_13: Vipassanāya pādakabhāvaṃ anupagatāpi tadatthaṃ nibbattanādivasena samāpannāti ayamattho purimanayato viseso.
tika-s0301t:271_14: Adhipaññāya panettha purimanayato viseso natthīti sā anuddhaṭā.
tika-s0301t:271_16: Sakalasāsananti tissannaṃ kathitattā eva sikkhattayasaṅgahaṃ sakalasāsanaṃ kathitaṃ hotīti.
tika-s0301t:274_2: Yasmā sīlādiguṇasambhavaṃ tato eva bhayasantañca upādāya paṇḍitā “santo”ti vuccanti,
tika-s0301t:274_6: Yasmā puthujjanakalyāṇato paṭṭhāya bhikkhu maggabrahmacariyavāsaṃ vasati nāma,
tika-s0301t:274_8: Ariyānaṃ pana mukhavaṇṇassa pasīdane vattabbameva natthi.
tika-s0301t:274_11: Sā hi vikkhepabyākulatāya appasannā samāhitacittasantatiyā visabhāgasantati.
tika-s0301t:274_15: Lohitaṃ pasīdatīti cittakālussiyassābhāvato lohitaṃ anāvilaṃ hoti.
tika-s0301t:274_17: Tālaphalamukhassa viya mukhassa vaṇṇo hotīti mukha-
tika-s0301t:274_19: Evañhi cassa pamuttaggahaṇaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti tālaphalamukhassa vaṇṇasampadāsadisattā.
tika-s0301t:275_0: Atītaṃ nānusocanti atītaṃ paccayalābhaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ katvā na socanti na anutthunanti.
tika-s0301t:275_1: Jappanataṇhāya vasena na parikappantīti āha “na patthentī”ti.
tika-s0301t:276_3: Arūpakāyassa viya rūpakāyassapi visesato sukkhabhāvakāraṇanti āha “etena kāraṇadvayenā”ti.
tika-s0301t:281_1: “Tatra bhagavā”ti vutte na tathā byañjanānaṃ siliṭṭhatā,
tika-s0301t:281_6: Catunnaṃ hi parisānaṃ jeṭṭhā bhikkhuparisā paṭhamuppannattā.
tika-s0301t:281_10: atthato pana bhadanteti bhaddaṃ tava hotu attano niṭṭhānapariyosānattā paresañca santatāvahattā.
tika-s0301t:281_11: Bhagavato paccassosunti ettha bhagavatoti sāmivacanaṃ āmantanameva sambandhiatthapadaṃ apekkhatīti adhippāyenāha “bhagavato vacanaṃ patiassosu”nti.
tika-s0301t:281_12: Bhagavatoti pana idaṃ patissavanasambandhena sampadānavacanaṃ yathā “devadattassa paṭissuṇātī”ti.
tika-s0301t:282_5: Ayaṃ pana kecivādo byāpanno hotīti taṃ arocentena “vadantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:282_7: Tathā hi vakkhati “evaṃ hi niddosaṃ padaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-s0301t:283_1: Paviṭṭhe paviṭṭhe dukkhappattepi attano sampattiyā nandayati,
tika-s0301t:283_7: te sandhāya “dīpasikhā viya vijjhāyantī”ti vuttanti vadanti.
tika-s0301t:284_8: Paricārayamānāti vā parito samantato cārayamānāti atthoti āha “indriyāni sañcārayamānā”ti.
tika-s0301t:284_19: Āsabhinti seṭṭhaṃ “aggohamasmi lokassā”tiādinā bhāsanto bodhisatto viya.
tika-s0301t:285_5: Appakaṃ adhikaṃ ūnaṃ vā gaṇanūpagaṃ nāma na hotīti “tikkhattuṃ dasanna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:285_10: “Tāvatiṃsā devā dīghāyukā vaṇṇavanto sukhabahulā”ti evamādivacanena yase icchite avisesetvāva “yasena sampannāna”nti sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-s0301t:286_2: Adhippāyaṃ vivaṭṭetvāti yathā tvaṃ andhabāle maññasi,
tika-s0301t:286_3: dhammasabhāvo evaṃ na hotīti tassā devatāya adhippāyaṃ viparivattetvā.
tika-s0301t:286_5: Kāmā hi dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammāti iminā adhippāyena tassā adhippāyaṃ paṭikkhipitvā.
tika-s0301t:286_7: te pana sammasanūpagā na hontīti tebhūmakaggahaṇaṃ sammasanayoggena.
tika-s0301t:286_8: Hutvāti pubbe avijjamānā paccayasamavāyena bhavitvā uppajjitvā.
tika-s0301t:287_1: tato eva “mayhaṃ ime sukhā”ti vā na iccāti aniccā.
tika-s0301t:287_5: Purimassa vā pacchimaṃ kāraṇavevacananti āha “yasmā vā”tiādi.
tika-s0301t:287_10: Yathā hi tasseva dhammassa uppādāvatthāya bhinnā bhaṅgāvatthā icchitā,
tika-s0301t:287_15: Na hi uppajjamāno bhijjatīti sakkā viññātunti.
tika-s0301t:290_17: Kāmaṃ dukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato nippariyāyato kāmā “upadhī”ti vattabbataṃ arahanti,
tika-s0301t:290_19: Kilesavatthuhetukattā sesapadadvayassa kiñcāpi sabbaṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ kilesahetukaṃ,
tika-s0301t:290_20: visesato pana pāpadhammā apāyūpapattiṃ nibbattentīti āha –
tika-s0301t:290_23: Manussajātikopi dullabhaghāsacchādanatāya dukkhabahulo peto viyāti manussapeto.
tika-s0301t:290_24: Manussajātikopi vuttarūpo anatthapātito parehi hiṃsito samāno nerayiko viyāti manussanerayiko.
tika-s0301t:291_1: Tatheva navahākārehīti yathā tīsu kālesu nāsamaraṇabhedanavasena puttimā puttanimittaṃ,
tika-s0301t:291_12: Upadhayo natthīti kāmaṃ kilesābhisaṅkhārūpadhayo tāva khīṇāsavassa nattheva maggādhigamena nirodhitattā,
tika-s0301t:291_14: Tepi tassa saupādisesakālepi aṭṭhuppattihetubhūtā na santeva,
tika-s0301t:294_6: Avayavo cettha ābhā evāti viññāyati “anantaraṃ ābhā”ti vuccamānattāti āha “sūriyābhāya samā”tiādi.
tika-s0301t:294_9: Sabbe te samuddaparamā orimajanehi adiṭṭhaparatīrattā tassa.
tika-s0301t:295_0: Natthi attasamaṃ pemanti gāthāya paṭhamagāthāyaṃ vuttanayena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0301t:295_1: Attapemena samaṃ pemaṃ nāma natthīti ayamattho.
tika-s0301t:295_2: Anudakakantāre ghammasantāpaṃ asahantiyā aṅke ṭhapitaputtakaṃ kandantaṃ bhūmiyaṃ nipajjāpetvā tassa upari ṭhatvā mataitthivatthunā dīpetabbaṃ. Tenāha –
tika-s0301t:300_3: Ekadesaṃyeva obhāsantīti ekasmiṃ khaṇe catūsu mahādīpesu obhāsaṃ pharituṃ asamatthattā sūriyassapi,
tika-s0301t:300_5: Bodhisattassa udayabbayassa ñāṇānubhāvena sakalajātikhettaṃ ekālokaṃ ahosīti āha “paññā…pe…
tika-s0301t:300_7: Tamaṃ vidhamatīti pubbenivāsañāṇādayo paññā yattha pavattanti,
tika-s0301t:300_9: “Vuṭṭhiyā pana pavattamānāya yāva ābhassarabhavanā”ti pacuravasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:303_7: Dvipadānaṃ seṭṭhoti ettha dvipadānaṃ eva seṭṭhoti nāyaṃ niyamo icchito,
tika-s0301t:303_9: tasmā sambuddho dvipadesu aññesu tattha ca uppajjanato seṭṭho eva sabbesampi uttaritarassa abhāvatoti ayamettha attho.
tika-s0301t:306_1: Ṭhite majjhanhiketi pubbaddhaṃ nikkhamitvā aparaddhaṃ appatvā ṭhitamajjhanhe.
tika-s0301t:306_6: Sabbasattānanti sabbesañca āhārūpajīvitasattānaṃ ghammatāpane santattakāyānaṃ iriyāpathadubbalyakāloti ṭhānādiiriyāpathassa asamatthakālo.
tika-s0301t:307_5: tato eva uttariṃ manussadhammato ratiṃ lābhino.
tika-s0301t:307_12: Pacchatoti atīte atītaṃ ārabbha paṭipattiyā vibādhanato.
tika-s0301t:307_16: Etena anāgatappajappanāya atītānusocanāya ca abhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0301t:307_17: Atīva phāsu bhavatīti nīvaraṇajeṭṭhakassa kāmacchandassa vigamena vikkhambhitanīvaraṇassa jhānassa vasena ativiya phāsuvihāro hoti.
tika-s0301t:307_18: Ekassa vasato vaneti taṇhādutiyikābhāvena ekassa araññe vivekavāsaṃ vasato.
tika-s0301t:310_1: Pacchime māse pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātappaṭikkanto catugguṇaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ paññapetvā dakkhiṇena passena sato
tika-s0301t:310_2: sampajānoti ettakaṃ pāṭhaṃ saṅkhipitvā “niddaṃ okkamitā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:310_10: Kāyālasiyapaccayā vīriyassa paṭipakkhabhūtā cattāro akusalakkhandhā tandī nāma.
tika-s0301t:310_18: Bhattakilamathoti yathāvuttassa bhattavatthukassa āhārassa vasena sarīre uppajjanakakhedo.
tika-s0301t:310_21: Ariyamaggassa jotanaṃ nāma uppajjanamevāti āha “na jotati,
tika-s0301t:314_4: Abyattenāti sāmaññassa upakārānupakāre dhamme jānanasamatthāya veyyattiyasaṅkhātāya paññāya abhāvato na byattena.
tika-s0301t:314_9: abyattena ca sāmañña”nti iminā gāthaddhena idaṃ dassetīti idaṃ idāni vuccamānaṃ atthajātaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0301t:314_12: So hi itaraṃ musalaṃ viya udukkhalaṃ visesato kassaci khādanakāle abhibhuyya vattati.
tika-s0301t:315_0: Pajjati cittametthāti padaṃ, ārammaṇaṃ. Iriyāpathaṃ eva padaṃ iriyāpathapadaṃ.
tika-s0301t:316_1: Samodahanti vā samodhānahetūti ayamettha atthoti āha –
tika-s0301t:316_6: Anissitoti tebhūmakadhammesu kañcipi dhammaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhābhinivesavasena anissito.
tika-s0301t:319_4: yathā sabbena sabbaṃ akkosavatthu na hoti,
tika-s0301t:319_9: Abhūtena abhūtakkosena parimutto nāma natthi bālānañca janānaṃ parāpavāde yuttapayuttabhāvato.
tika-s0301t:325_5: Evaṃ sabbapadehi pucchitatthassa anujānanavasena “ekaṃsavacane nipāto”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:325_6: Āpādikā posikā mātucchā mahāpajāpati mātā evāti katvā “pahāya pabbajitattā”ti avisesato vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:325_8: Puna mātukucchivāsādīnaṃ abhāvavacaneneva vaṭṭamhi bandhanassa abhāvo dīpito hotīti na gahito.
tika-s0301t:325_9: Ayaṃ kira devatā yathā puthujjanā buddhānaṃ guṇe na jānanti,
tika-s0301t:328_1: Tapanabhāvena tapanodakattā tapodāti tassa rahadassa nāmaṃ.
tika-s0301t:328_3: Tatoti nāgabhavane udakarahadato tapodā nāma nadī sandati.
tika-s0301t:328_7: Rahadassa pana ādito pabbatapādavanantaresu bahū petā viharanti,
tika-s0301t:329_0: Samiddhoti avayavānaṃ sampuṇṇatāya saṃsiddhiyāva sammā iddho.
tika-s0301t:330_0: Pubbāpayamānoti nhānato pubbabhāge viya vodakabhāvaṃ āpajjamāno gamento.
tika-s0301t:330_7: Cīvarapiṭṭheyeva ṭhapetabbaṃ yattha vā tattha vā aṭṭhapetvā.
tika-s0301t:330_11: Saṃharitvā ṭhapanaṃ puna sukhena gahetvā nivāsanatthaṃ.
tika-s0301t:330_14: Nivāsanaṃ parikkhipitvāti antaravāsakaṃ kaṭippadesassa yathā parito hoti,
tika-s0301t:331_0: Sarīravaṇṇopi vippasīdi sammadeva bhāvanānussatimpi vindantassāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0301t:331_1: Samanaṃ niggahetunti kilesavasaṃ gataṃ attano cittaṃ niggaṇhituṃ.
tika-s0301t:332_6: Jiṇṇakāle hi sattānaṃ kaṭiyaṃ kāyo obhaggo hoti.
tika-s0301t:333_0: Voti nipātamattaṃ “ye hi vo ariyā”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0301t:333_7: Ito paranti ettha paranti aññaṃ kālaṃ.
tika-s0301t:333_9: Paramāyuno orakāle eva cettha paranti adhippetaṃ tato paraṃ sattānaṃ jīvitassa abhāvato.
tika-s0301t:333_25: Yante yuttagoṇo viyāti yathā yante yuttagoṇo yantaṃ nātivattati,
tika-s0301t:333_26: evaṃ kālo gatipañcakanti evaṃ upamāsaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t:334_4: Purimānaṃ hi dvinnaṃ vayānaṃ sabbaso sīmā atikkamitvā pacchimassa ādisīmaṃ atikkanto tathā vutto.
tika-s0301t:334_6: na sakkā kātu”nti vatvā tamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “tadā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:334_7: Gaṇhitunti pāḷito atthato ca hadaye ṭhapanavasena gaṇhituṃ.
tika-s0301t:334_9: Ekassa kathanato paṭhamaṃ gāthaṃ suttaṃ vā ussāreti,
tika-s0301t:334_10: tasmiṃ niṭṭhite itaro dhammakathiko taṃyeva vitthārento dhammaṃ katheti,
tika-s0301t:334_13: “Mā maṃ kālo upaccagā”ti vadanto “samaṇadhammassa karaṇassa ayaṃ me kālo”ti katheti,
tika-s0301t:334_16: tasmā abhutvā bhikkhāmī”ti vadanto attanā kataṃ paṭipattiñca sahetukaṃ sānisaṃsaṃ katheti.
tika-s0301t:335_1: Etanti “atha kho sā devatā pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhahitvā”ti etaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:337_6: Asukasmiṃ nāma kāle phalaṃ hotīti evaṃ udikkhitabbo nassa kāloti akālo.
tika-s0301t:337_13: “Paccatta”nti etassa patiattanīti bhummavasena attho gahetabboti āha “attani attanī”ti.
tika-s0301t:338_1: kathaṃ akāliko”tiādinā sabbehi paccekaṃ sambandho veditabbo.
tika-s0301t:339_3: Idha sāsanaṃ nāma sikkhattayasaṅgahaṃ piṭakattayanti āha “dhammena hī”tiādi.
tika-s0301t:339_4: Tattha dhammena vinayo ettha vinā daṇḍasatthehīti dhammavinayo.
tika-s0301t:339_5: Dhammāya vinayo ettha na āmisatthanti dhammavinayo.
tika-s0301t:339_11: Dhammo ca so yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne satte apāyesu apatamāne dhāretīti,
tika-s0301t:339_12: sabbe saṃkilesato vinetīti vinayo cāti dhammavinayo.
tika-s0301t:340_0: Dhammavinayoti dhammena yutto vinayoti dhammavinayo ājaññaratho viya.
tika-s0301t:340_1: Dhammo ca vinayo cāti vā dhammavinayo,
tika-s0301t:340_3: Dhammavinayānañhi satthubhāvavacanato dhammavinayattasaṃsiddhi dhammavinayānaṃ aññamaññaṃ visesanato.
tika-s0301t:341_14: Idha sattānaṃ duvidhaṃ saraṇaṃ dhammo attā ca.
tika-s0301t:341_17: Sudanto attāpi saraṇaṃ “attā hi attano nātho”ti vacanato.
tika-s0301t:341_24: Adhunā āgato idāneva na cirasseva upagato.
tika-s0301t:342_0: Mahante ṭhāne ṭhapetvāti mahesakkhatādassanatthaṃ attano parivārena mahantaṭṭhāne ṭhapitabhāvaṃ pavedetvā.
tika-s0301t:342_2: Sabbepi kira nisīdantā taṃ ṭhānaṃ ṭhapetvāva nisīdanti.
tika-s0301t:342_5: tasmā nāyaṃ mānaṃ appahāya mama desanaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ sakkotīti mānaniggaṇhanatthaṃ ādito duviññeyyaṃ
tika-s0301t:342_7: dhammassa ca sandiṭṭhikādibhāvaṃ vibhāvento dve gāthā abhāsi.
tika-s0301t:343_6: Aniṭṭhaṅgatopi hi “idaṃ nu kho”tiādinā kaṅkhato tattha āsatto eva nāma avijahanato,
tika-s0301t:343_12: Yasmā apariññātavatthukā anatītamaraṇattā maccunā yathāruci payojetabbā,
tika-s0301t:343_13: tattha tattha uparūpari ca khipitāya āṇāya abbhantare eva honti,
tika-s0301t:343_17: nesampi kālassa laddhabbatāya kālikatā idha akkheyyavacanena paveditā. Tenāha –
tika-s0301t:343_20: yasmā ca kālikānaṃ kāmānaṃ tathāsabhāvatā kathitā.
tika-s0301t:343_21: Ayampi gāthā tadatthameva dīpetīti imāya te kathitā eva honti.
tika-s0301t:343_22: Ye ca sattā pañcasu khandhesu diṭṭhitaṇhādivasena patiṭṭhitā “itthī, puriso, ahaṃ,
tika-s0301t:343_25: Evampettha kāmānaṃ kālikattho kathitoti āha “kālikā kāmā kathitā”ti.
tika-s0301t:344_0: Ayaṃ ñātapariññāti rūpārūpadhamme lakkhaṇādito ñāte katvā paricchindanapaññā.
tika-s0301t:344_2: Padaṭṭhānaggahaṇeneva cettha tesaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ paccayo gahitoti paccayapariggahassapi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0301t:344_4: Dvācattālīsāya ākārehīti iminā matthakappattaṃ mahāvipassanaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0301t:344_5: Te pana ākārā visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāya vuttanayena veditabbā.
tika-s0301t:344_6: “Aniccānupassanāya niccasaññaṃ pajahatī”tiādinā vipassanākkhaṇepi ekadesena pahānaṃ labbhateva,
tika-s0301t:344_7: anavasesato pana pahānavasena pahānapariññaṃ dassento āha “aggamaggena …pe…
tika-s0301t:345_4: Na maññatīti vā maññanaṃ nappavatteti akkhātāranti khīṇāsavaṃ.
tika-s0301t:345_5: Atha vā tañhi tassa na hotīti taṃ kāraṇaṃ tassa khīṇāsavassa na hoti na vijjati,
tika-s0301t:345_6: yena diṭṭhitaṇhādikāraṇena akkheyyaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ “tisso”ti vā “phusso”ti vā “itthī”ti vā “puriso”ti
tika-s0301t:345_7: vā abhinivissa vadeyyāti evamettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0301t:345_8: Manussanāgādīhi pūjanīyattā “yakkho”ti sabbadevānaṃ sādhāraṇavacananti devadhītāpi “yakkhī”ti vuttā.
tika-s0301t:345_11: Na maññatīti khīṇāsavassa assa phalappattīti āha “navavidho lokuttaradhammo kathito”ti.
tika-s0301t:346_1: Tesu gahitesūti tesu seyyamānādīsu tīsu mānesu gahitesu.
tika-s0301t:346_7: Upaḍḍhagāthāyāti purimaddhena pana vatthukāmā vuttāti āha “kālikā kāmā kathitā”ti.
tika-s0301t:347_3: Vidahanato hīnādivasena vividhenākārena dahanato upadhāraṇato vidhā, māno.
tika-s0301t:347_6: Na calatīti na vedhati attano parisuddhapakatiṃ avijahanato.
tika-s0301t:348_4: Te te dhammā sammā yāthāvato saṅkhāyanti upatiṭṭhanti etāyāti saṅkhā, paññā.
tika-s0301t:348_5: Ekaṃ dvetiādinā saṅkhānaṃ gaṇanaṃ paricchindananti saṅkhā, gaṇanā.
tika-s0301t:348_12: Navavidhanti vā pāṭhe navabhedattā antarabhedavasena navavidhanti attho.
tika-s0301t:348_13: Paccayavisesehi itthibhāvādivisesehi visesena mānīyati gabbho etthāti vimānaṃ,
tika-s0301t:350_0: Aṭṭhaṅgikamaggavasena ca gāthāatthavacane ayaṃ idāni vuccamāno vitthāra- nayo.
tika-s0301t:350_1: Tasmiṃ kira ṭhāneti tasmiṃ kira devatāya pucchitaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjanaṭṭhāne.
tika-s0301t:350_2: Devatāya ñāṇaparipākaṃ oloketvā anupubbiyā kathāya saddhiṃ sāmukkaṃsikadesanā mahatī dhammadesanā ahosi.
tika-s0301t:350_3: Ñāṇaṃ pesetvāti satthudesanāya anussaraṇavasena pattavisuddhipaṭipāṭipavattaṃ bhāvanāñāṇaṃ bandhitvā.
tika-s0301t:350_4: Sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāyāti satthudesanāvilāsena attano ca paripakkañāṇattā paṭhamaṃ phalaṃ patvā.
tika-s0301t:355_3: Iminā eva pasaṅgena pahāre vibhāgato dassetuṃ “cattāro hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:355_5: Adhomukhaṃ dinnappahāroti khaggakaravālādīnaṃ adhomukhaṃ katvā pahatapahāro.
tika-s0301t:355_8: “Omaṭṭho gahito”ti vatvā tasseva gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “so hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:355_10: Mañcena saddhiṃ bandhitvāti yasmiṃ mañce vaṇikapuggalo nipanno,
tika-s0301t:355_11: tattha taṃ subandhaṃ katvā pādaṭṭhānaṃ uddhaṃ karontehi sīsaṭṭhānaṃ adho kātabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t:355_14: Sā pana pavatti bhāvanāvihārena yuttāti āha “vihareyyā”ti.
tika-s0301t:356_1: Atthaṃ parittakaṃ gahetvā ṭhitā upamākārassa vikkhambhanappahānassa adhippetattā.
tika-s0301t:356_3: Anubandhova hoti sati paccaye uppajjanārahato devatāya kāmarāgappahānassa jotitattā.
tika-s0301t:356_4: Nanu bhagavatā anāgāmimaggena desanā niṭṭhāpetabbāti? Na,
tika-s0301t:359_3: Vipāko na phusatīti vipākaphasso na phusati,
tika-s0301t:359_5: Evaṃ byatirekamukhena kammavaṭṭena vipākavaṭṭaṃ sambandhaṃ katvā atthaṃ vatvā idāni kevalaṃ kammavaṭṭavasena atthaṃ vadanto “kammamevā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t:359_6: Tattha nākaroto kariyatīti kammaṃ akubbato na kayirati,
tika-s0301t:359_11: Vuttamevatthaṃ sakāraṇaṃ katvā pariveṭhitavasena vibhūtaṃ katvā dassetuṃ “tasmā phusanta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:360_2: Ayañca attho araññe luddakassa uyyojanāya sunakhehi parivāriyamānassa bhikkhuno bhayena rukkhaṃ āruḷhassa
tika-s0301t:360_3: cīvare luddassa upari patite tassa sunakhehi khāditvā māritavatthunā dīpetabboti.
tika-s0301t:363_3: Sā hi aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritapabhedā attano avayavabhūtā eva jālā etissā atthīti jālinīti vuccati.
tika-s0301t:363_4: Idānissā jaṭākārena pavattiṃ dassetuṃ “sā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:363_5: Tattha rūpādīsu ārammaṇesūti tassā pavattiṭṭhānamāha rūpādichaḷārammaṇavinimuttassa taṇhāvisayassa abhāvato.
tika-s0301t:363_6: Heṭṭhupariyavasenāti kadāci rūpārammaṇe kadāci yāva dhammārammaṇā,
tika-s0301t:363_7: kadāci dhammārammaṇe kadāci yāva rūpārammaṇāti evaṃ heṭṭhā ca upari ca pavattivasena.
tika-s0301t:363_10: Saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇikabhāvato aparāparuppatti ettha saṃsibbananti āha “punappunaṃ uppajjanato saṃsibbanaṭṭhenā”ti.
tika-s0301t:363_11: Idaṃ yena sambandhena jaṭā viyāti jaṭāti jaṭātaṇhānaṃ upamūpameyyatā,
tika-s0301t:363_15: tāsaṃ sañcayādayo ca attano avayavehi saṃsibbitā vinaddhā “jaṭā”ti vuccanti,
tika-s0301t:364_0: Ime sattā “mama ida”nti pariggahitaṃ attanibbisesaṃ maññamānā abbhantarimaṃ karonti.
tika-s0301t:364_9: asukassa viya mama attabhāvo bhaveyyā”tiādinā sakaattabhāvādīsu taṇhāya uppajjanākāro veditabbo.
tika-s0301t:364_16: Kāmabhavo hi kassacipi kilesassa avikkhambhitattā katthacipi avimutto ajjhattaggahaṇassa visesapaccayoti “ajjhattaṃ anto”ti ca vuccati,
tika-s0301t:365_0: Visayabhedena pavattiākārabhedena anekabhedabhinnampi taṇhaṃ jaṭābhāvasāmaññena ekanti gahetvā “tāya evaṃ uppajjamānāya jaṭāyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:365_1: Sā pana pajāti vuttasattasantānapariyāpannā eva hutvā punappunaṃ taṃ jaṭentī vinandhantī pavattatīti āha “jaṭāya jaṭitā pajā”ti.
tika-s0301t:365_2: Tathā hi paramatthato yadipi avayavabyatirekena samudāyo natthi,
tika-s0301t:365_3: ekadeso pana samudāyo nāma na hotīti avayavato samudāyaṃ bhinnaṃ katvā upamūpameyyaṃ dassento “yathā nāma veḷujaṭādīhi…pe…
tika-s0301t:365_6: Tīsu dhātūsu ekampi asesetvā saṃsibbanena tedhātukaṃ jaṭetvā ṭhitaṃ.
tika-s0301t:365_8: Vijaṭetuṃ ko samatthoti iminā “vijaṭaye”ti padaṃ sattiatthaṃ,
tika-s0301t:366_0: Evaṃ “antojaṭā”tiādinā puṭṭho athassa bhagavā tamatthaṃ vissajjento “sīle patiṭṭhāyā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t:366_2: Taṃ pana pātimokkhasaṃvarādibhedesu parisuddhameva icchitabbanti āha “catupārisuddhisīle”ti.
tika-s0301t:367_2: padhānameva pana sattaṃ dassento “naro”ti āha yathā “satthā devamanussāna”nti,
tika-s0301t:367_3: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana avibhāgena puggalapariyāyo ayanti dassetuṃ “naroti satto”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:367_5: Tāya hi ādito paṭṭhāya santānavasena bahulaṃ pavattamānāya ayaṃ satto savisesaṃ sapaññoti vattabbataṃ arahati.
tika-s0301t:367_6: Vipākapaññāpi hi santānavisesena bhāvanāpaññuppattiyā upanissayapaccayo hoti ahetukadvihetukānaṃ tadabhāvato.
tika-s0301t:367_7: Kammajatihetukapaṭisandhipaññāyāti kammajāya tihetukapaṭisandhiyaṃ paññāyāti evaṃ tihetukasaddo paṭisandhisaddena sambandhitabbo,
tika-s0301t:367_10: Paṭisandhito pabhuti pavattamānā paññā “paṭisandhiyaṃ paññā”ti vuttā taṃmūlakattā,
tika-s0301t:368_2: Na hi vitakkādayo vinā samādhinā tamatthaṃ sādhenti,
tika-s0301t:368_6: Paṭhamajjhānādivasena cittavicittatāya iddhividhādicittakaraṇena ca samādhi cittanti vināpi paropadesenassa cittapariyāyo labbhateva.
tika-s0301t:368_8: saddo viññāṇe niruḷhoti katvā vuttaṃ “cittasīsena hettha aṭṭha samāpattiyo kathitā”ti.
tika-s0301t:368_11: “bhāvaya”nti pana vacanato bhāvetabbā idhādhippetāti taṃ dassento “paññānāmena vipassanā kathitā”ti.
tika-s0301t:368_15: saddo vīriye eva niruḷhoti āha “ātāpīti vīriyavā”ti.
tika-s0301t:368_16: Yathā kammaṭṭhānaṃ tāya paññāya parito harīyati pavattīyati,
tika-s0301t:368_18: Abhikkamādīni sabbakiccāni sātthakasampajaññādivasena paricchijja netīti sabbakiccapariṇāyikā.
tika-s0301t:369_1: tasmā puggalādhiṭṭhānameva upamaṃ dassento “yathā nāma puriso”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t:369_5: bāhubalena cassa ukkhipananti ubhayampetaṃ atthāpannaṃ katvā upamā vuttāti tadubhayaṃ upameyyaṃ dassento “samādhisilāyaṃ sunisitaṃ…pe…
tika-s0301t:369_11: Vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāya hi vattamānāya yogāvacaro taṇhājaṭaṃ vijaṭetuṃ samattho nāma.
tika-s0301t:370_8: “Paṭighaṃ rūpasaññā cā”ti gāthāsukhatthaṃ sānunāsikaṃ katvā niddeso,
tika-s0301t:370_15: Rūpe vā virajjanavasena ca vattuṃ sakkuṇeyyā idha rūpasaññāti vuttā,
tika-s0301t:373_3: tasmā yato kutoci cittaṃ nivāretabbanti evaṃdiṭṭhikā.
tika-s0301t:373_6: Saṃyatabhāvaṃ āgatanti rāgavisevanādito sammadeva saṃyatabhāvaṃ otarabhāvaṃ.
tika-s0301t:373_7: Dhammacariyāvasena hi pavattamāne citte natthi īsakampi rāgādivisevanaṃ,
tika-s0301t:373_8: na tassa sampati āyatiñca koci anattho siyā,
tika-s0301t:373_9: tasmā taṃ mano sabbato anavajjavuttito na nivāretabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t:373_11: Yato yatoti yato yato sāvajjavuttito ayonisomanasikārato.
tika-s0301t:377_0: Khandhādīsu kusaloti khandhāyatanādīsu salakkhaṇādīsu ca samūhādivasena pavattiyañca cheko yathābhūtavedī.
tika-s0301t:377_2: Vohārabhedaṃ akarontoti “ahaṃ paramatthaṃ jānāmī”ti lokavohāraṃ bhindanto avināsento loke lokasamaññameva nissāya “ahaṃ,
tika-s0301t:378_1: Tathā hi dutiyamaggādīsu sammādiṭṭhiyā pahānābhisamayassa paṭivipaccanīke paṭipattisiddhi.
tika-s0301t:378_5: Te pana viddhaṃsitā nāma hontīti āha “vidhamitā”ti.
tika-s0301t:378_6: Mamaṅkārādayo mayanti sattasantāne sati pavattanti etenāti mayo, maññanā.
tika-s0301t:381_1: Divārattinti na ādicco viya divā eva,
tika-s0301t:381_6: na ādicco viya candimā viya sakalaṃ mahādisaṃ disantarāḷañca.
tika-s0301t:381_10: ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi ñāṇaṃ udapādi paññā udapādi vijjā udapādi āloko udapādī”ti pana vacanato maggo ñāṇāloko.
tika-s0301t:381_12: āloko uppanno”ti vā vacanato vijjattayāloko ñāṇāloko.
tika-s0301t:381_14: visesato ratanaghare samantapaṭṭhānavicinane sañjātapītivasena uppannasarīrobhāso vā pītiāloko.
tika-s0301t:381_18: Sabbattheva satthu dhammadesanā sattānaṃ hadayatamaṃ vidhamantī dhammakathāāloko.
tika-s0301t:381_19: Sabbopi buddhānaṃ pātubhāvā uppanno ālokoti iminā sāvakānaṃ desanāya sañjātadhammālokopi buddhānubhāvoti dasseti.
tika-s0301t:384_1: Saraṇato avicchedavasena pavattanato khandhādīnaṃ paṭipāṭi sarā.
tika-s0301t:384_6: Āpotiādinā pāḷiyaṃ catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ appatiṭṭhānāpadesena tattha kāmarūpabhavānaṃ abhāvo dassito.
tika-s0301t:384_7: Tadubhayābhāvadassanena heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva arūpabhavassapi abhāvo dassitova hoti,
tika-s0301t:387_10: Analaṅkatāti na alaṃ pariyattanti evaṃ katacittā,
tika-s0301t:387_17: Taṇhānivāsatāya gehantipi agārantipi vuccatīti āha “mātugāmena saddhiṃ geha”nti.
tika-s0301t:390_9: atha kho nissitadhammo ca asuciṃ dasseti.
tika-s0301t:390_13: Tena sabhāvato nissitadhammato ca asucisabhāvato kāyato kathaṃ apagamo siyāti pucchati.
tika-s0301t:391_0: Nahanaṭṭhena bandhanaṭṭhena naddhīti upanāho idhādhippetoti āha “naddhinti upanāha”nti.
tika-s0301t:391_1: So pana ito pubbakāle kodhoti āha “pubbakāle”tiādi.
tika-s0301t:391_2: Pāḷiniddiṭṭheti upanāhaiccādike idha pāḷiyaṃ niddiṭṭhe kilese ṭhapetvā avasesā diṭṭhivicikicchādayo satta
tika-s0301t:391_3: kilesā dummocayatāya varattā viyāti varattāti veditabbā.
tika-s0301t:394_10: Yathā “vīrassa bhāvo vīriya”nti vīrabhāvena vīriyaṃ lakkhīyati,
tika-s0301t:394_13: abhutvā udakaṃ pive”ti dhammasenāpativuttaniyāmena parimitabhojitāya appāhāratā bhojane mattaññutā.
tika-s0301t:394_16: Catūsu paccayesu loluppavirahitaṃ bodhimūle eva sabbaso loluppassa pahīnattā.
tika-s0301t:394_17: “Catūsu paccayesū”ti hi imināva sabbattha loluppavigamo dīpitovāti.
tika-s0301t:395_4: Kāmaguṇaggahaṇena hettha rūpabhāvasāmaññena pañca vatthūni gahitāneva honti,
tika-s0301t:400_2: attano vā pubbenivāsānussatiyā tassa dhammassa ullapanato kathanato satullapā, devatā,
tika-s0301t:400_7: na vaṇṇanākathanamattena tatrāti tasmiṃ tāsaṃ devatānaṃ satullapakāyikabhāve.
tika-s0301t:400_19: Āsannānāsannesu āsannasseva paṭhamaṃ vipaccanato “āsannakāle gahitasīlaṃ nissāyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:401_1: Te hi saparahitasādhanato pāsaṃsatāya santaguṇatāya ca santoti vuccati.
tika-s0301t:401_2: Te pana yasmā paṇḍitalakkhaṇehi samannāgatā honti,
tika-s0301t:401_7: sā ca ñāṇasahitā ñāṇapubbaṅgamāvāti mittasanthavo asaṃkiliṭṭho,
tika-s0301t:401_8: itaro saṃkiliṭṭhoti āha “na kenaci saddhiṃ kātabbo”ti.
tika-s0301t:402_4: Sokanimittaṃ sokakāraṇaṃ uttarapadalopena idha sokasaddena gahitanti āha “sokavatthūna”ntiādi.
tika-s0301t:402_5: Sokavatthūni nāma corādayo acchindanādivasena paresaṃ sokakaraṇato.
tika-s0301t:403_2: Ayaṃ “idha corā paṭipajjiṃsū”ti amhe tiṇāyapi na maññatīti cintetvā ekacce “mārema na”nti āhaṃsu.
tika-s0301t:404_10: kiṃ amhesu lajjissatī”ti addhikānaṃ anāgamanato ekadivasaṃ laddhabbaparibbayampi na labhissantīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0301t:405_1: Te kira adhimuttassa bhaginiyā santikaṃ upagacchantā antarāmagge tena samāgatā,
tika-s0301t:405_2: adhimutto saccavācaṃ anurakkhanto corabhayaṃ tesaṃ nārocesi.
tika-s0301t:406_6: Svāyamattho taṃtaṃgāthāpadeneva viññāyatīti taṃ nīharitvā dassetuṃ “na kevala”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:406_7: Tena sappurisūpasaṃsevasaddhammābhiyogo yathā sattānaṃ vaḍḍhiyā paññāpaṭilābhassa ekantikaṃ kāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0301t:409_4: Idāni yathā macchariyanimittañca pamādanimittañca dānaṃ na dīyati,
tika-s0301t:409_12: Puññanti vā idha puññaphalaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ “evamidaṃ puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatī”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0301t:409_13: Atthi dānassa phalanti ettha deyyadhammassa anavaṭṭhitataṃ bahulasādhāraṇataṃ,
tika-s0301t:410_2: Ekacco dhanassa paribhogaparikkhayabhayena attanāpi na paribhuñjati atilobhaseṭṭhi viyāti āha “idhalokaparalokesū”ti.
tika-s0301t:411_0: Yasmā ekacco adānasīlo puriso addhike disvā passantopi na passati,
tika-s0301t:411_4: tasmā tattha mataliṅgāni upalabbhantiyevāti āha “adānasīlatāya maraṇena matesū”ti.
tika-s0301t:411_5: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana dānamattameva gahetvā matenassa samataṃ dassetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:411_12: tesaṃ dhammāti tesaṃ vasenapi dhammo sanantanoti āha “sanantanānaṃ vā paṇḍitānaṃ esa dhammo”ti.
tika-s0301t:411_13: Appasmimpi deyyadhamme sati eke dānaṃ dadanti,
tika-s0301t:411_15: Sahassadānasadisāti ekāpi dakkhiṇā pariccāgacetanāya uḷārabhāvato sahassadānasadisā hoti.
tika-s0301t:412_2: “Dhammaṃ care”ti ayaṃ dhammacariyā gahaṭṭhassa vasena āraddhāti āha “dasakusalakammapathadhammaṃ caratī”ti.
tika-s0301t:412_4: Samuñjakanti kassakehi attanā kātabbaṃ katvā visaṭṭhadhaññakaraṇato khale uñchācariyavasena samuñjaniādinā chaḍḍitadhaññasaṃharaṇaṃ.
tika-s0301t:412_7: Etenāti satasahassasahassayāgiggahaṇena dasannampi bhikkhukoṭīnaṃ piṇḍapāto dassito hoti.
tika-s0301t:412_9: Dasannaṃ vā kahāpaṇakoṭīnaṃ piṇḍapātoti dasannaṃ kahāpaṇakoṭīnaṃ viniyuñjanavasena sampāditapiṇḍapāto.
tika-s0301t:412_10: Tayidaṃ satasahassaṃ sahassayāgīnaṃ dānaṃ ettakaṃ hotīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:412_17: tassā kalampi nagghanti ete sahassayāgino attano sahassayāgitāya.
tika-s0301t:412_19: Sabbesampi tesanti “sataṃsahassānaṃ sahassayāgina”nti vuttānaṃ tesaṃ sabbesampi.
tika-s0301t:413_0: “Kalaṃ nagghatī”ti idaṃ tesaṃ dānato imassa dānassa uḷāratarabhāvena vipulatarabhāvena vipulataraphalatāya
tika-s0301t:413_1: vuttanti āha “kathaṃ nu kho etaṃ mahapphalataranti jānanattha”nti.
tika-s0301t:413_9: Taṃ pana pīḷanaṃ pothananti dassento “pothetvā”ti āha.
tika-s0301t:413_12: Uppattiyā aparisuddhatāyāti ajjhāsayassa deyyadhammagavesanāya ca suddhatāya malīnattā.
tika-s0301t:413_15: Attano uppattiyā parisuddhatāyāti ajjhāsayassa deyyadhammagavesanāya ca visuddhatāya.
tika-s0301t:416_1: Udānaṃ udānesīti pītivegena uggiritabbatāya udānaṃ uggiri uccāresi.
tika-s0301t:416_8: Pariccāgacetanāya hi saddhā visesapaccayo assaddhassa tadabhāvato. Pi-
tika-s0301t:416_12: Etaṃ ubhayanti dānaṃ yuddhanti idaṃ dvayaṃ.
tika-s0301t:416_19: Evaṃ bhoge rakkhissāmīti tathā bhoge aparikkhīṇe karissāmīti.
tika-s0301t:416_22: Evanti evaṃ jīvitabhoganirapekkhatāya dānañca yuddhañca samaṃ hoti.
tika-s0301t:416_24: So hi deyyavatthuno parittakattā appakampi dadanto attano pana cittasampattiyā khettasampattiyā ca bahuṃ uḷārapuññaṃ pavaḍḍhento bahuvidhaṃ lobha- dosa- issā-
tika-s0301t:416_27: tato eva ca taṃ mahapphalaṃ hoti mahānisaṃsaṃ.
tika-s0301t:418_8: Te pana abbudādīnaṃ vasena avīciṃ dasadhā katvā avasesamahāniraye sattapi āyuppamāṇabhedena tayo tayo katvā ekatiṃsāti vadanti.
tika-s0301t:418_9: Sañjīvādinirayasaṃvattanassa kammassa tikkhamajjhamudubhāvena tassa āyuppamāṇassa tividhatā vibhāvetabbā.
tika-s0301t:418_10: Apare pana “aṭṭha mahānirayā soḷasa ussadanirayā ādito cattāro sitaniraye ekaṃ katvā satta sitanirayāti evaṃ ekatiṃsa mahānirayā”ti vadanti.
tika-s0301t:418_11: Mahānirayaggahaṇato ādito cattāro sitanirayā eko nirayo katoti.
tika-s0301t:420_0: Pāṇesu saṃyamoti iminā dasavidhampi kusalakammapathadhammaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0301t:420_1: Yathā hi “pāṇesu saṃyamo”ti iminā sattānaṃ jīvitāvoropanato saṃyamo vutto,
tika-s0301t:420_2: evaṃ tesaṃ sāpateyyāvahārato paradārāmasanato visaṃvādanato aññamaññabhedanato pharusavacanena saṅghaṭṭanato
tika-s0301t:420_3: niratthakavippalapanato parasantakābhijjhānato ucchedacintanato micchābhinivesanato ca saṃyamo hotīti.
tika-s0301t:421_0: Parassa upavādabhayenāti pāpakiriyahetu parena attano vattabbaupavādabhayena.
tika-s0301t:421_2: “Kathaṃ nu kho amhe pare na upavadeyyu”nti āsīsantā pāpaṃ na karonti.
tika-s0301t:421_4: Yasmā sabbasaṅkhataṃ aniccaṃ khayadhammaṃ vayadhammaṃ virāgadhammaṃ nirodhadhammaṃ,
tika-s0301t:421_7: Puna akālaviseso apāṭiyekko bhummatthavisayovāti āha “sabbepi vā”tiādi.
tika-s0301t:421_8: Tattha sabbepi vāti ete sabbepi kassapabuddhādayo lokanāthā santo nāma vūpasantasabbakilesasantāpā santasabbhūtaguṇattā.
tika-s0301t:424_2: Tato eva etāni iṭṭhārammaṇāni sukhārammaṇāni rūpādīni,
tika-s0301t:424_8: Na puna āgacchati ettha taṃ apunāgamanaṃ.
tika-s0301t:425_4: evaṃ saupādisesanibbānaṃ vatvā aghavinayā dukkhavinayoti anupādisesanibbānaṃ vadati.
tika-s0301t:426_1: ākārabhedena ca atthi savighātāvighātāti tato visesetuṃ “ārammaṇacittānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:426_3: Kilesakāmo kāmoti vutto tassevidha visesato kāmabhāvasiddhito.
tika-s0301t:426_4: Pasūrasuttena vibhāvetabbo “na te kāmā”tiādinā tassa vatthumhi āgatattā.
tika-s0301t:426_6: Na te kāmā yāni citrāni loketi te ce kāmā na honti,
tika-s0301t:426_8: Vedesīti kevalaṃ saṅkapparāgañca kāmaṃ katvā vadesi ce.
tika-s0301t:426_11: satthāpi te hehiti kāmabhogīti paccekaṃ gāthā,
tika-s0301t:427_0: Tassāti yo pahīnakodhamāno sabbaso saṃyojanātigo nāmarūpasmiṃ asajjanto rāgādikiñcanarahito, tassa.
tika-s0301t:427_1: Mogharājā nāma thero bāvarībrāhmaṇassa paricārakānaṃ soḷasannaṃ aññataro.
tika-s0301t:428_0: Catusaccadhammaṃ jānitvāti tena paṭividdhaṃ catusaccadhammaṃ paṭivijjhitvā.
tika-s0301t:428_1: Tathā ca buddhasubuddhatāya nibbematikā hontīti āha “vicikicchaṃ pahāyā”ti.
tika-s0301t:428_2: Tato paraṃ pana anukkamena aggamaggādhigamena saṅgātigāpi honti.
tika-s0301t:432_0: Aññenākārena bhūtanti attanā pavediyamānākārato aññena asuddhena ākārena vijjamānaṃ upalabbhamānaṃ attānaṃ.
tika-s0301t:433_4: Bhāsitamattena ca savanamattena cāti ettha ca-
tika-s0301t:433_6: Tena bhāsitassa sutassa ca sammāpaṭipattivisesaṃ nivatteti.
tika-s0301t:433_7: Lokapariyāyanti lokassa parividhamanaṃ uppādanirodhavasena saṅkhārānaṃ parāvuttiṃ.
tika-s0301t:433_10: Evaṃ na kubbantīti attani vijjamānampi guṇaṃ anāvīkaronto “yathā tumhe vadatha,
tika-s0301t:433_11: evaṃ na kubbantī”ti avijjamānataṃ byākarotīti attho.
tika-s0301t:434_2: evaṃ so desakena desiyamāno tato vigato nāma hoti.
tika-s0301t:435_1: Ekasadisanti paresaṃ cittācāraṃ jānantampi ajānantehi saha ekasadisaṃ karontā.
tika-s0301t:435_3: Kathāya uppannāyāti “kassaccayā na vijjantī”tiādikathāya pavattamānāya “tathāgatassa buddhassā”tiādinā buddhabalaṃ buddhānubhāvaṃ dīpetvā.
tika-s0301t:436_9: tena pariyāyena yadi aparādho nāma na bhaveyyāti.
tika-s0301t:437_1: Ko niccameva paṇḍito nāmāti atthoti “kassaccayā”tiādikāya pucchāgāthāya attho.
tika-s0301t:437_3: saddo vitthārato saṃvaṇṇitoti āha “evamādīhi kāraṇehi tathāgatassā”ti.
tika-s0301t:437_11: Idāni khittaṃ saṅkhepena saṃharāpitaṃ hotīti dasseti.
tika-s0301t:440_4: kārassa ca lopaṃ katvā niddesoti āha “tato assā”ti.
tika-s0301t:440_16: tathalakkhaṇaṃ nirodhasaccaṃ upanijjhāyatīti ayamattho maggepi vattabbo tena vinā asammohapaṭivedhassa asambhavato.
tika-s0301t:440_19: Yathā ca kasiṇārammaṇāni aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ avasesānañca tadārammaṇānaṃ paccavekkhaṇavasena cittānaṃ,
tika-s0301t:440_20: evaṃ tena tāni ārammaṇāni gahitānīti “kasiṇārammaṇassa”icceva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:440_21: Paramaṃ uttamaṃ sukhanti vattabbato paramasukhaṃ arahattaṃ.
tika-s0301t:443_1: Udānaṃ paṭiccāti ukkākaraññā jātisambhedaparihāranimittaṃ attano vaṃsaparisuddhaṃ nissāya vuttaṃ pītiudāhāraṃ
tika-s0301t:443_5: Akkharacintikā hi īdisesu ṭhānesu yutte viya saliṅgavacanāni icchanti,
tika-s0301t:444_2: Sassāni kārentīti jeṭṭhamāse kira ghammassa balavabhāvena himavante himaṃ vilīyitvā sanditvā anukkamena rohiṇiṃ nadiṃ pavisati,
tika-s0301t:444_4: “Jātiṃ ghaṭṭetvā kalahaṃ vaḍḍhayiṃsū”ti saṅkhepena vuttamatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “koliyakammakarā vadantī”ti āha.
tika-s0301t:445_0: Tīṇi jātakānīti “kuṭhārihattho puriso”tiādinā phandanajātakaṃ “duddubhāyati bhaddante”tiādinā duddubhajātakaṃ,
tika-s0301t:445_1: “vandāmi taṃ kuñjarā”tiādinā laṭukikajātakanti imāni tīṇi jātakāni.
tika-s0301t:450_0: Yadā te vivadissanti, tadā ehinti me vasa”nti. –
tika-s0301t:455_2: Mahāpathaviyā mahagghe khattiye kasmā nāsethāti dassetvā kalahaṃ vūpasametukāmo bhagavā pathaviṃ nidassanabhāvena
tika-s0301t:455_8: Pucchitaṃ kathesi anukkamena kuṇālasakuṇarājassa pucchāpasaṅgena kuṇālajātakaṃ kathessāmīti.
tika-s0301t:455_9: Anabhiratiṃ vinodesi itthīnaṃ dosadassanamukhena kāmānaṃ ādīnavokārasaṃkilesavibhāvanavasena.
tika-s0301t:455_10: Purisapurisehīti kosajjaṃ viddhaṃsetvā purisathāmabrūhanena uttamapurisehi no bhavituṃ vaṭṭatīti uppannacittā.
tika-s0301t:456_3: na kathesīti iminā sabbepi te bhikkhū tāvadeva paṭipāṭiyā āgatattā aññamaññassa lajjamānā attanā paṭiladdhavisesaṃ bhagavato nārocesunti dasseti.
tika-s0301t:457_4: Rāmaṇeyyakadassanatthanti buddhuppādapaṭimaṇḍitattā visesato ramaṇīyassa lokassa ramaṇīyabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0301t:457_6: Evarūpe khaṇe laye muhutteti yathāvutte candamaṇḍalassa uṭṭhitakkhaṇe uṭṭhitavelāyaṃ uṭṭhitamuhutteti
tika-s0301t:458_0: Tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ jātiādivasena bhagavato anurūpaparivārabhāvaṃ dassento “tatthā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t:458_2: Khattiyagabbhe jātoti idaṃ satipi jātivisuddhiyaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ vasena avisuddhatā siyāti tesampi “avisuddhatā
tika-s0301t:458_4: Satipi ca gabbhavisuddhiyaṃ katadosena missakattā arajjārahatāpi siyāti “tampi natthi imesa”nti dassanatthaṃ “rājapabbajitā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:459_4: Tikkhattuṃ tesaṭṭhiyā nagarasahassesūti jambudīpe kira ādito mahantāni tesaṭṭhi nagarasahassāni uppannāni,
tika-s0301t:459_8: Tāni pana sampiṇḍetvā satasahassato paraṃ navasahassādhikāni asītisahassāni.
tika-s0301t:459_10: Doṇamukhanti ca mahānagarassa āyuppattiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ pādanagaraṃ vuccati.
tika-s0301t:459_15: ratanākarādibhāvena kathanaṃ taṃtaṃadhivatthāya vasantīnaṃ tāsaṃ devatānaṃ bahubhāvadassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0301t:460_2: Yadi tā devatā evaṃ nirantarā hutvā sannipatitā,
tika-s0301t:460_3: pacchā āgatānaṃ okāso eva na bhaveyyāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “yathā kho panā”tiādi.
tika-s0301t:461_4: Devatā pana orambhāgiyānaṃ itaresañca saṃyojanānaṃ samucchinnaṭṭhena suddho āvāso vihāro etesanti suddhāvāsā.
tika-s0301t:462_4: sā yāva cakkavāḷā uttarituṃ na sakkā.
tika-s0301t:462_5: Mahatiyā buddhavīthiyāvāti buddhānaṃ santikaṃ upasaṅkamantehi tehi devabrahmehi valañjitabuddhavīthiyāva.
tika-s0301t:463_4: Samādahaṃsūti samāhitaṃ lokuttarasamādhiṃ suṭṭhu appitaṃ akaṃsu.
tika-s0301t:463_5: Tathā samāhitaṃ pana samādhinā niyojitaṃ nāma hotīti vuttaṃ “samādhinā yojesu”nti.
tika-s0301t:463_8: Avīthipaṭipannānaṃ assānaṃ vīthipaṭipādanaṃ rasmiggahaṇena hotīti “yottāni gahetvā acodento”ti vatvā
tika-s0301t:463_9: taṃ pana acodanaṃ avāraṇamevāti āha “acodento avārento”ti.
tika-s0301t:464_3: yathā ca indakhīlaṃ gambhīranemi sunikhātaṃ dunnīharaṇaṃ,
tika-s0301t:464_4: evaṃ rāgādayo sattasantānato dunnīharaṇā nibbānanagarappavesanivāraṇā cāti te “khīlaṃ palighaṃ indakhīla”nti ca vuttā.
tika-s0301t:464_14: Chandādīhīti chandādīnaṃ vasena na gacchanti na vattanti.
tika-s0301t:465_3: Evampīti imāyapi gāthāya vasena “āguṃ na karotī”ti pade.
tika-s0301t:466_4: Te hi niyamena apāyaṃ na gamissanti,
tika-s0301t:466_6: Ye pana lokiyena saraṇagamanena buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gatā,
tika-s0301t:466_8: sati ca paccayantarasamavāye pahāya mānusaṃ dehaṃ devakāyaṃ paripūressantīti.
tika-s0301t:469_2: Dhanunā sarena gahanti pothayanti bādhentīti dhanuggahā.
tika-s0301t:469_3: Taṃ sampaṭicchīti tassā silāya heṭṭhābhāgena uggantvā sampaṭicchi.
tika-s0301t:469_4: Satthu puññānubhāvena upahatattā sayampi paripatantī vātaṃ upatthambheti.
tika-s0301t:469_7: Tato eva tato paṭṭhāya bhagavato aphāsu jātanti etenapi upādiṇṇakasarīre nāma aniṭṭhāpi samphassakā patanti
tika-s0301t:470_8: pageva suppaṭividitattā yathā samudācāro cittaṃ nābhibhavati,
tika-s0301t:470_11: Kāmaṃ aniṭṭhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho tāya apīḷiyamāno nāma natthi,
tika-s0301t:470_12: pariññātavatthukattā pana tassā vase avattamāno “avihaññamāno”ti vutto.
tika-s0301t:471_6: Dakkhiṇapassena sayāno nāma natthi dakkhiṇahatthassa sarīraggahaṇādiyogakkhamato.
tika-s0301t:471_8: Ekena passena sayituṃ na sakkonti dukkhuppattito.
tika-s0301t:471_11: Bhīrukajātikā hi sesamigā attano āsayaṃ pavisitvā utrāsabahulā santāsapubbakaṃ yathā tathā sayanti,
tika-s0301t:471_12: sīho pana abhirukabhāvato satokārī bhikkhu viya satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāva sayati.
tika-s0301t:471_14: Purimapādeti dakkhiṇapurimapāde vāmassa purimapādassa ṭhapanavasena dve purimapāde ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhapetvā.
tika-s0301t:471_16: Vuttanayeneva idhāpi ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhapanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t:471_18: Sīsaṃ pana ukkhipitvātiādinā vuttasīhakiriyā anutrāsapabujjhanaṃ viya abhīrukabhāvasiddhā dhammatāvasenevāti veditabbā.
tika-s0301t:471_19: Sīhavijambhitavijambhanaṃ ativelaṃ ekākārena ṭhapitānaṃ sarīrāvayavānaṃ gamanādikiriyāsu yoggabhāvāpādanatthaṃ.
tika-s0301t:472_4: Tato hi vuṭṭhahitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā anukkamena aggamaggaṃ adhigantvā tathāgato jātoti.
tika-s0301t:472_6: tathāpi yasmā ‘catutthajjhānā vuṭṭhahitvā samanantaraṃ bhagavā parinibbāyī’ti mahāparinibbāne āgataṃ.
tika-s0301t:472_11: Tattha yathā sattānaṃ niddupagamalakkhaṇā seyyā bhavaṅgacittavasena hoti,
tika-s0301t:472_12: sā ca nesaṃ paṭhamaṃ jātisamanvayā yebhuyyavuttikā,
tika-s0301t:472_13: evaṃ bhagavato ariyajātisamanvayaṃ yebhuyyavuttikaṃ aggaphalabhūtaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ tathāgataseyyāti veditabbā.
tika-s0301t:473_0: “Kālaparicchedaṃ katvā yathāparicchedaṃ uṭṭhahissāmī”ti evaṃ tadā manasikārassa akatattā pāḷiyaṃ “uṭṭhānasaññaṃ
tika-s0301t:473_1: manasikaritvā”ti na vuttanti āha “uṭṭhānasaññanti panettha na vutta”nti.
tika-s0301t:474_0: Visuṃ visuṃ rāsivasena anāgantvā ekajjhaṃ puñjavasena āgatattā vuttaṃ “sabbāpi tā”ti.
tika-s0301t:475_7: Ājānīyoti sammāpatitaṃ dukkhaṃ sahanto attanā kātabbakiriyaṃ dhīro hutvā nitthārako.
tika-s0301t:476_1: Sāmaññakatopi samādhisaddo pakaraṇato idha visesatthoti āha “samādhinti arahattaphalasamādhi”nti.
tika-s0301t:476_6: Lokiyajjhānacittaṃ viya vipassanā viya ca sasaṅkhārena sappayogena tadaṅgappahānavikkhambhanapahānavasena ca vikkhambhetvā na adhigataṃ na ṭhapitaṃ,
tika-s0301t:476_7: kiñcarahi kilesānaṃ sabbaso chinnatāyāti āha “chinnattā vataṃ phalasamādhinā samāhita”nti.
tika-s0301t:476_9: Sā pana laṅghanā āsādanā ghaṭṭanāti āha “ghaṭṭetabba”nti.
tika-s0301t:477_14: evaṃ paṭipannassa vaṭṭato mutti atthī”ti vadantī sā attato sāsanassa niyyānabhāvo kathito nāma hotīti āha “sāsanassa niyyānikabhāvaṃ kathentī”ti.
tika-s0301t:480_2: Dhammo anubuddhoti catusaccadhammo pariññeyyādibhāvassa anurūpato buddho.
tika-s0301t:480_3: Paccakkhamevāti parapattiyā ahutvā attapaccakkhameva katvā jānāmi.
tika-s0301t:480_4: Dhammaṃ garahantā nāma saddadosavasena vā atthadosavasena vā garaheyyunti taṃ dassento “hīnakkhara…pe…
tika-s0301t:480_6: Sā pana “tesaṃ vigarahā dummedhatāya mahānatthāvahāvā”ti dassentī devatā āha “dummedhā upenti roruva”nti.
tika-s0301t:480_7: Visuṃ hotīti avīcimahānirayato visuṃ eva hoti.
tika-s0301t:483_1: Buddhañca dhammañca namassamānāti buddhasubuddhataṃ dhammasudhammatañca ñatvā tadubhayaṃ namassamānā.
tika-s0301t:483_2: Yasmā buddhe ca dhamme ca pasanno saṅghe ca pasanno eva hoti tassa suppaṭipattiyā vijānanato,
tika-s0301t:483_5: saddena saṅghañcā”ti āha atthavatiyoti lokiyalokuttaraatthasaṅgahitā lokiyakusalalokuttaramaggasaṅgaṇhanato.
tika-s0301t:483_6: Yaṃ dhammaṃ sā abhāsīti yaṃ tumhākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭivijjhitvā ṭhitā,
tika-s0301t:483_10: Tādisoti tathārūpo tathāpaṭividdhasacco atthadhammādīsu kusalo ekekaṃ padampi udāharaṇahetunigamanāni
tika-s0301t:483_11: nīharanto ācikkhati deseti paññapeti paṭhapeti vivarati vibhajati uttānīkaroti.
tika-s0301t:483_15: Evaṃ vitthārakkhamaṃ dhammaṃ yasmā devadhītā “saṃkhittamatthaṃ lapayissāmī”ti avoca,
tika-s0301t:488_2: desanāya aññesupi vattabbesu kassacideva sīsabhāgena apadisanaṃ.
tika-s0301t:488_5: Taṃ pana pariccajanaṃ cetanāya hotīti āha “dānacetanāyā”ti dānapuññacetanāti dānamayā puññacetanā dāyakasseva hoti taṃsantatipariyāpannattā.
tika-s0301t:488_11: Tepi kenaci ākārena vināsaṃ anupagatā maraṇena pahīyanti nāmāti vuttaṃ “corādīnaṃ vasena avinaṭṭhabhoge”ti.
tika-s0301t:491_1: Dve tīṇi bhattāni abhutvāti dve tayo vāre bhattāni abhuñjitvā.
tika-s0301t:491_2: Uṭṭhātuṃ na sakkotīti uṭṭhātumpi na sakkotī,
tika-s0301t:491_4: Dubbalopi hutvāti bhuñjanato pubbe dubbalo hutvā balasampanno hoti.
tika-s0301t:491_5: Evaṃ byatirekato anvayato ca āhārassa sarīre balavataṃ āha.
tika-s0301t:491_6: Yasmā annado dāyako paṭiggāhakassa balado hoti,
tika-s0301t:491_7: tasmā so āyatiṃ attano sarīre balado avināsavasena balassa rakkhako ca hoti.
tika-s0301t:491_9: “balaṃ kho pana datvā balassa bhāgī hotī”ti sesapadesupi eseva nayo.
tika-s0301t:491_14: Adukkhappatto hutvā yāti vattati etenāti yānanti chattādīnampi yānabhāvo vutto.
tika-s0301t:491_16: Cakkhudo nāma hoti cakkhunā kātabbakicce sahakārīkāraṇabhāvato dīpassa.
tika-s0301t:492_0: “Sabbesaṃyeva balādīnaṃ dāyako hotī”ti saṅkhepato vuttaṃ atthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “dve tayo gāme”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:492_3: Bahi vicarantassāti patissayaṃ alabhitvā bahi vivaṭaṅgaṇe vicarantassa.
tika-s0301t:492_8: Sukhaṃ nāma dukkhapaccayaparihārato sukhapaccayuppannato ca hoti,
tika-s0301t:492_9: tadubhayaṃ patissayavasena labhatīti dassento “bahi vicarantassa pāde”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t:492_12: Nivātaṃ pihitavātapānaṃ patissayaṃ pavisitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya ṭhitassa andhakāro hotīti vuttaṃ “kūpe otiṇṇo viya hotī”ti.
tika-s0301t:493_5: Aṭṭhakathaṃ kathetīti avivaṭapāṭhassa pāḷiyā atthasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ karotīti attho.
tika-s0301t:496_5: Sabbepi dāyake ekajjhaṃ gahetvā sāmaññato ekavasena “dāyakamevā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0301t:496_16: Dāyakaṃ apariccajanameva anugacchati cakkaṃ viya kubbaraṃ.
tika-s0301t:499_1: Patiṭṭhaṭṭhena avijjāsaṅkhātaṃ ekaṃ mūlaṃ etissāti ekamūlā.
tika-s0301t:499_4: evaṃ taṇhābhibhavavasena anavabodhoti avijjā taṇhāya mūlaṃ,
tika-s0301t:499_8: Idha pana imissaṃ gāthāyaṃ adhippetā “ekamūla”nti sā taṇhā.
tika-s0301t:499_14: pageva sammuyhaṃ āpannassa pana vattamānāya taṇhāya balavabhāvena malīnatā siyā.
tika-s0301t:499_19: Uttarituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya patāya alaṃ pariyattoti pātālo,
tika-s0301t:502_5: chaḷabhiññotiādīni nāmāni anomanāmāni na honti paricchinnavisayattā,
tika-s0301t:502_7: sammāsambuddhotiādīni nāmāni anomanāmāni nāma mahāvisayattā anūnabhāvato.
tika-s0301t:502_13: Kilesakāmānaṃ vasena allīyitabbaṭṭhena kāmā eva ālayo.
tika-s0301t:502_15: Na etarahi tadabhāvatoti āha “atītaṃ pana upādāya idaṃ vutta”nti.
tika-s0301t:505_2: so anupubbikathāya vinā na paññāyatīti taṃ āgamanato paṭṭhāya kathento “ayaṃ kira devaputto”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t:505_6: Sayanassa koṭṭhāsoti divasaṃ purimayāmañca bhāvanānuyogavasena kilantakāyassa samassāsanatthaṃ seyyāya upagamanabhāgo anuññāto.
tika-s0301t:506_0: Abbhantareti kucchiyaṃ bhattassa parittatāya satthakavātāti tikkhabhāvena satthakā viya kantanakā vātā.
tika-s0301t:506_3: Upanissayamandatāya aparipakkañāṇatāya āsavakkhayaṃ appatto kālaṃ katvāti yojanā.
tika-s0301t:506_5: Tatheva aṭṭhāsīti tāhi tathā vuttepi yathā tato pubbe,
tika-s0301t:506_9: Yasmā tasmiṃ satthu santikaṃ āgacchante tāpi tena saddhiṃ āgamaṃsu tasmā “accharāsaṅghaparivuto”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:507_6: Taṃ pana vaṭṭato niggamanaṃ hotīti āha “kathaṃ niggamanaṃ bhavissatī”ti.
tika-s0301t:508_3: Suññatāvipassananti suññatādīpanaṃ vipassanaṃ duccaritataṇhāya dūrīkaraṇena ekavihāritāya.
tika-s0301t:508_4: Eko maggo assāti lokuttaramaggo eva assa anāgato,
tika-s0301t:509_2: asmiṃ vā adhigate puggalassa natthi bhayanti abhayaṃ nāma.
tika-s0301t:509_3: Saṃsārakantāraṃ atikkamitvā nibbānasaṅkhātaṃ khemaṃ amataṭṭhānaṃ gamane sugatasārathinā susajjitayānabhāvato
tika-s0301t:510_7: Tattha vipassanāya pavattiṭṭhānabhāvato pañcakkhandhā bhūmi nāma,
tika-s0301t:511_1: nanu ca sā desanā bhagavatā catumaggappadhānabhāvena pavattitāti āha “yathā hī”tiādi.
tika-s0301t:514_1: Kesanti sāmivasena vuttakasaddo “dhammaṭṭhā sīlasampannā”ti ettha paccattabahuvacanavasena pariṇāmetabbo.
tika-s0301t:514_3: Ke janāti ettha vā vuttakesaddo sīhavilokananayena ānetvā yojetabboti āha “ke dhammaṭṭhā,
tika-s0301t:515_1: Attanā katañhi puññaṃ anussarato taṃ ārabbha bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati,
tika-s0301t:515_2: na pana yathā kataṃ puññaṃ sayameva pavaḍḍhati.
tika-s0301t:515_3: Tasmiṃ dhamme ṭhitattāti tasmiṃ ārāmaropanādidhamme patiṭṭhitattā.
tika-s0301t:515_4: Tenapi sīlena sampannattāti tena yathāvuttadhamme katasīle ṭhatvā ciṇṇena tadaññenapi kāyavācasikasaṃvaralakkhaṇena sīlena samannāgatattā.
tika-s0301t:519_1: ca anaññasādhāraṇaṃ atiramaṇīyaṃ taṃ jetavanaṃ cittaṃ toseti,
tika-s0301t:519_2: tathā ariyānaṃ nivāsabhāvenapīti āha “evaṃ paṭhamagāthāya jetavanassa vaṇṇaṃ kathetvā”ti.
tika-s0301t:519_6: Apacayagāmicetanā sattānaṃ visuddhiṃ āvahati kammakkhayāya saṃvattanatoti āha “kammanti maggacetanā”ti.
tika-s0301t:519_7: Catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ viditakaraṇaṭṭhena kilesānaṃ vijjhanaṭṭhena ca vijjā.
tika-s0301t:519_12: Sīlaṃ etassa atthīti sīlanti āha “sīle patiṭṭhitassa jīvitaṃ uttama”nti.
tika-s0301t:519_14: Tattha sammāsaṅkappassa sammādiṭṭhiyā upakārabhāvena vijjābhāvo vutto.
tika-s0301t:519_18: Dhammoti hi idha samādhi adhippeto “evaṃdhammā te bhagavanto ahesu”ntiādīsu viya.
tika-s0301t:520_5: sammāsamādhiṃ desessāmi saupanisaṃ saparikkhāra”nti hi vacanato sammādiṭṭhiādayo maggadhammā sammāsamādhiparikkhārā.
tika-s0301t:520_12: Tesu vipassiyamānesu vipassanāya ukkaṃsagatāya yadaggena dukkhasaccaṃ pariññāpaṭivedhena paṭivijjhīyati,
tika-s0301t:520_15: maggasaccaṃ bhāvanāpaṭivedhena paṭivijjhīyatīti evaṃ tesu catūsu saccesu visujjhatīti imasmiṃ pakkhe nimittatthe eva bhummaṃ,
tika-s0301t:521_2: “Sāriputtovā”ti ca avadhāraṇaṃ sāvakesu sāriputtova seyyoti imamatthaṃ dīpeti tassevukkaṃsabhāvato.
tika-s0301t:521_3: Kilesaupasamenāti iminā mahātherassa tādiso kilesavūpasamoti dasseti.
tika-s0301t:521_6: etāvaparamo siyā”ti idaṃ tesaṃ buddhānaṃ ñāṇavisaye paññāpāramippattānaṃ vaseneva vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t:521_7: Avadhāraṇampi vimuttiyā nānattā tīhi vimuttīhi pāraṅgate sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Tenāha –
tika-s0301t:521_9: Na therena uttaritaro nāma atthi labbhati,
tika-s0301t:524_6: Idaṃ tāva mudumacchariyaṃ na hadayaṃ viya attānaṃ dassentassa macchariyanti katvā.
tika-s0301t:524_7: Kiṃ tuyhaṃ pādā rujjanti nanu tuyhaṃyeva āgatagamanesu pādā rujjanti,
tika-s0301t:524_9: Sāmīcimpi na karoti kuto dānanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0301t:524_10: Yathākammaṃ taṃtaṃgatiyo aranti upagacchantīti ariyā, sattā.
tika-s0301t:524_13: Macchariyasadisañhi kucchitaṃ sabbahīnaṃ natthi sabbaguṇābhibhūtattā bhogasampattiādisabbasampattīnaṃ mūlabhūtassa dānassa nisedhato.
tika-s0301t:524_15: Attano upaghātakoti macchariyānuyogena kusaladhammānaṃ gatisampattiyā ca vināsako.
tika-s0301t:525_2: Khiḍḍāti kāyikakhiḍḍā vācasikakhiḍḍā cetasikakhiḍḍāti evaṃ tividhā.
tika-s0301t:525_3: Esa vipākoti coḷādīnaṃ kicchalābhoti esa evarūpo vipāko.
tika-s0301t:525_7: Tena pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ nirayaṃ tiracchānayoniñca saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0301t:526_9: Parasambhatesūti sayaṃ sambhataṃ anāpajjitvā pareheva sambharitesu sukhūpakaraṇesu.
tika-s0301t:526_11: paranimmitabhogesu vasavattī devaputtā viya sukhasamaṅgitāya modantīti attho.
tika-s0301t:526_12: Evaṃ vuttasamparāyoti ete saggāti evaṃ heṭṭhā vuttasamparāyo.
tika-s0301t:526_14: Tato cavitvā tato nirayasaggādito cavitvā manussesu nibbattati.
tika-s0301t:526_16: so daliddo hutvā pubbacariyavasena maccharīyeva honto dārādibharaṇatthaṃ macchakacchapādīni hantvā punapi niraye nibbatto.
tika-s0301t:526_17: Itaro suddhāsayo samiddho hutvā pubbacariyāvasena punapi puññāni katvā sagge nibbatteyya.
tika-s0301t:529_9: Mānusaṃ dehaṃ samatikkamanti cittupakkilesapahānavasenāti phalena hetudassanamidanti āha “mānusaṃ dehanti idha…pe…
tika-s0301t:529_13: Tattha saṃyojanakoti vuttaṃ “dibbaṃ yoganti pañca uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanānī”ti.
tika-s0301t:529_16: dibbayogaṃ upaccagu”nti tesaṃ tvaṃ kusalaṃ sabbāvajjappahānena anavajjataṃ bhāsatīti kusalī vadesi.
tika-s0301t:529_17: Atthena saddassa abhedopacāraṃ katvā gambhīravacanaṃ vuttanti āha “gambhīrattha”nti atthasseva gambhīrato,
tika-s0301t:529_19: Samucchinnakāmarāgatāya sabbaso kāmavisayappahānena nirāmisabrahmacārī nāma anāgāmī.
tika-s0301t:529_20: Nivāsanaṭṭhānabhūto samāno eko gāmo etassāti āha “ekagāmavāsī”ti.
tika-s0301t:534_3: Taṃ pana atthakāmena labhitabbato upasevitabbato laddhakaṃ,
tika-s0301t:534_4: kalyāṇaṭṭhena bhaddakanti vuccatīti āha “sādhūti laddhakaṃ bhaddaka”nti.
tika-s0301t:534_5: “Sīlaṃ yāva jarā sādhū”ti vuttamatthaṃ byatirekato vibhāvetuṃ “iminā idaṃ dassetī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:535_5: Cittīkatanti ratananti idaṃ ratanaṃ nāma loke cittīkataṃ vatthūnaṃ sahassagghanatādivasena.
tika-s0301t:535_14: Dullabho anekāni asaṅkhyeyyāni atidhāvitvāpi laddhuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā.
tika-s0301t:535_16: Tattha visesato anomasattaparibhogato tehi “sammāsambuddho bhagavā”ti anussaritabbatoti āha “bhagavā anomo sīlenā”tiādi.
tika-s0301t:536_0: Ariyamaggapaññāyeva idha adhippetāti “idha pana dullabhapātubhāvaṭṭhena paññā ‘ratana’nti vutta”nti āha.
tika-s0301t:536_2: attano santānaṃ punātīti ca puññacetanā puññaṃ,
tika-s0301t:542_9: Yathā asaṇṭhitānaṃ saṇṭhāpanavasena pavasato purisassa bhogabyasane nāthatā,
tika-s0301t:542_10: evaṃ puttasinehavasena puttassa mātuyā antogehe nāthatāti vuttaṃ “mātā mittaṃ sake ghare”ti.
tika-s0301t:545_0: 54. Patiṭṭhāti avassayo. Guyhassāti guhitabbassa rahassassa. Paramo sakhā nāma atipiyaṭṭhānatāya.
tika-s0301t:548_0: 55. Vidhāvatīti vividhaṃ rūpaṃ padhāvati, yathākāmaṃ pavattatīti attho.
tika-s0301t:557_5: Tathā hi “bhasmakhārādīhi dhovitvā sakkā sodhetu”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:557_6: Duṭṭhoti dūsito sattasantāno na sakkā suddho nāma kātuṃ abbhantaramalīnabhāvāpādanato.
tika-s0301t:557_8: Pajāti sattakāyo sajjati saṅgaṃ karoti yāthāvato ādīnavaṃ apassanto.
tika-s0301t:560_3: tasmā lokiyalokuttarahitasukhāvahāti āha “sugatiñceva nibbānañca gacchantassa dutiyikā”ti.
tika-s0301t:563_1: Gāyattiādikoti chabbīsatiyā chandesu gāyattiādiko ukkatipariyosāno chando gāthānaṃ nidānaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ “samuṭṭhahati etenā”ti katvā.
tika-s0301t:563_2: Tehi pana anuṭṭhubhādiko hotīti āha “chando gāthānaṃ nidāna”nti.
tika-s0301t:563_3: Pubbapaṭṭhāpanagāthāti dhammakathāya ādito ārocanabhāvajānanatthaṃ satijananaṃ viya pavattitagāthā.
tika-s0301t:563_4: Akkharañhi padaṃ janetīti yasmā akkharasamudāyo padaṃ,
tika-s0301t:563_9: padaṃ taṃ viyañjetā janetā viya hotīti “akkharañhi padaṃ janetī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:563_10: Akkharaṃ hi uccāritaviddhaṃsitāya taṃtaṃkhaṇamattāvaṭṭhāyīpi parato pavattiyā manoviññāṇavīthiyā saṅkalanavasena
tika-s0301t:563_11: ekajjhaṃ katvā padabhāvena gayhamānaṃ yathāsaṅketamatthaṃ byañjeti.
tika-s0301t:563_12: Padaṃ gāthaṃ janetīti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-s0301t:563_13: Gāthā atthaṃ pakāsetīti gāthāsaññito padasamudāyo kiriyākārakasambandhavasena sambandhito kattuadhippāyānurūpaṃ
tika-s0301t:568_5: Abhibhavati anupatatīti etena abhibhavo anupatanaṃ pavatti evāti dasseti.
tika-s0301t:568_6: Taṃ panassa abhibhavanaṃ appavisaye anāmasitvā mahāvisayānaṃ vasena dassento “opapātikena vā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t:568_7: Tassa nāmaṃ hotīti tassa rukkhapāsāṇādikassa anāmakoicceva samaññā hoti,
tika-s0301t:571_1: Ye cittassa vasaṃ gacchantīti ye apariññātavatthukā,
tika-s0301t:571_4: Na hi pariññātakkhandhā pahīnakilesā cittassa vasaṃ gacchanti,
tika-s0301t:574_1: Tatiye “sabbeva vasamanvagū”ti ye taṇhāya vasaṃ gacchanti,
tika-s0301t:574_2: tesaṃ eva anavasesapariyādānanti imamatthaṃ “eseva nayo”ti iminā atidissati.
tika-s0301t:577_1: Kiṃ su saṃyojanoti sūti nipātamattanti āha “kiṃ-
tika-s0301t:580_0: 65. Catutthe āgataattho eva anantarepi vutto, byañjanameva nānanti āha “pañcamepi eseva nayo”ti.
tika-s0301t:586_2: Saddādīsūti saddādināgadantesu sotādīni uḍḍitāni taṇhārajjunā daḷhabandhanena baddhattā tadanativattanato.
tika-s0301t:586_4: Tathā atthayojanāya katattā khandhādilokavasenapi yojanā kātabbā.
tika-s0301t:586_7: evaṃ sante kasmā sattā na bujjhantīti āha “balavatiyā”tiādi.
tika-s0301t:589_3: pacchimaṃ purimaṃ katvā aṭṭhamasutte devatāya pucchitattā vuttaṃ “heṭṭhupariyāyavasena pucchito”ti.
tika-s0301t:592_5: Sabbaṃ chindati bandhananti sabbaṃ dasavidhampi saṃyojanaṃ samucchindati.
tika-s0301t:592_6: Na hi taṃ kiñci kilesabandhanaṃ atthi,
tika-s0301t:592_7: yaṃ asamucchinnaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ assā taṇhāya samucchinnāya.
tika-s0301t:595_2: Tassa pana santabhāvo uppattivasenevāti āha “kismiṃ uppanne”ti?
tika-s0301t:595_4: Chasūti etthāpi eseva nayo santhavanti adhikasinehaṃ karoti adhikasinehavatthubhāvato ajjhattikāyatanānaṃ.
tika-s0301t:595_5: Upādāyāti pubbakālakiriyā aparakālakiriyaṃ apekkhatīti vacanasesavasena kiriyāpadaṃ gahitaṃ “pavattatī”ti.
tika-s0301t:595_11: Uppanno nāma hoti chaḷāyatanaṃ nāma mūlaṃ sabbadukkhānanti katvā.
tika-s0301t:595_12: Bāhiresu āyatanesu santhavaṃ karoti visesato rūpādīnaṃ taṇhāvatthukattā.
tika-s0301t:595_13: Yasmā cakkhādīnaṃ santappanavasena rūpādīnaṃ pariggahitattā lokassa nisevitāya saṃvattati,
tika-s0301t:600_5: tassa mūlakāraṇaṃ kodho aniṭṭhaphalattāti āha “visamūlassāti dukkhavipākassā”ti.
tika-s0301t:603_3: “Coḷarañño raṭṭhaṃ coḷaraṭṭha”nti evaṃ raṭṭhaṃ raññā paññāyati.
tika-s0301t:606_4: Heṭṭhā tiṇṇaṃ dvārānaṃ vasena uppannakassa sabbassapi anavajjadhammassa saṅgaṇhanato “dhammoti dasakusalakammapatho”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:606_8: Asecanakabhāvena abhirucijananato piyākicchakaraṇato bahuṃ sucirampi kālaṃ āsevantassa adosāvahato saccameva madhurataraṃ.
tika-s0301t:606_9: Na hi taṃ pivitabbato sāditabbato anubhavitabbato rasoti vattabbataṃ arahati.
tika-s0301t:606_10: Idāni tassa kiccasampattiatthehipi mahārahataṃ dassetuṃ “saccasmiṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:606_18: Paññājīvīti ca paññāvasena iriyati vattati jīvitaṃ pavattetīti atthoti dassento “yo paññājīvī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t:609_8: Te pana yasmā jaṅgamā nāma honti,
tika-s0301t:610_0: Attano khantiyāti attano khantiyā ruciyā gahitabhāvena.
tika-s0301t:610_1: Itarā devatā tassā vissajjane aparitussamānā āha.
tika-s0301t:610_7: Dasabalaṃ pucchi saṇhaṃ sukhumaṃ ratanattayasaṃhitaṃ atthaṃ sotukāmā.
tika-s0301t:610_13: Puññakkhettabhūtoti idaṃ “padasā caramānāna”nti padassa atthavivaraṇavasena bhūtakathanavisesanaṃ.
tika-s0301t:610_14: Yādiso putto vā hotūti idaṃ purimapade devatāya puttagahaṇassa katattā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:613_3: Maggo ca nekāyatanappavuttoti anekakāraṇaṃ nānāvidhādhigamokāsaṃ katvā pavutto kathito.
tika-s0301t:613_5: Evaṃ santeti evaṃ sabbasādhāraṇānekāyatanehi nibbānagāmimaggassa tumhehi paveditattā labbhamāne kheme
tika-s0301t:613_6: magge kiṃ bhītāyaṃ janatā uppathabhūtā viparītadiṭṭhito gaṇhīti attho?
tika-s0301t:613_7: Evaṃ devatā yathicchāya purimaddhena attanā yathācintitamatthaṃ satthu paveditā,
tika-s0301t:614_5: Yathā hi saddho paccayaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā vatthupariccāgassa visesapaccayo kammaphalassa paralokassa ca paccakkhato viya pattiyāyanato,
tika-s0301t:614_7: Muduhadayo hi anudayaṃ patvā yaṃ kiñci attano santakaṃ paresaṃ deti.
tika-s0301t:614_9: so appakasmimpi attano santake parehi sādhāraṇabhogī hoti.
tika-s0301t:614_10: Vadaññū vadāniyatāya yāginova yuttaṃ yuttakālaṃ ñatvā atthikānaṃ manorathaṃ pūretīti vuttaṃ “iti…pe…
tika-s0301t:615_3: Suddhāsayassa sammāpayoge ṭhitassa kathaṃ paralokato bhayanti.
tika-s0301t:615_5: Etesu catūsu dhammesu ṭhitoti etesu yathāvuttadukasaṅgahesu catūsu guṇesu patiṭṭhito.
tika-s0301t:618_1: Nāmagottanti tisso kassapo gotamoti evarūpaṃ nāmañca gottañca.
tika-s0301t:618_4: Na jīratīti asabhāvadhammattā uppādavayābhāvato jaraṃ na pāpuṇāti.
tika-s0301t:619_12: Yato gahaṇahatthopi na kilāsupi puriso niddāya abhibhuyyati.
tika-s0301t:619_16: Āgantukālasiyaṃ na pubbe vuttaālasyaṃ viya pakatisiddhaṃ.
tika-s0301t:619_17: “Te chidde”ti pāḷiyaṃ liṅgavipallāsena vuttanti āha “tāni cha chiddānī”ti.
tika-s0301t:622_3: satthamalaggahaṇena cettha malīnaṃ satthameva gahitanti āha “malaggahitasattha”nti.
tika-s0301t:622_4: Āṇāpavattananti appake vā mahante vā yattha katthaci attano āṇāya pavattanavasena vasanaṃ issariyattamicchanti.
tika-s0301t:622_5: Maṇiratanampi vissajjanīyapakkhikattā uttamaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ nāma na hoti,
tika-s0301t:622_6: itthī pana pariccattakulācāritthikāyapi anissajjanīyatāya uttamabhaṇḍaṃ nāma.
tika-s0301t:622_8: Tesaṃ tesañhi purisājānīyānaṃ uppattiṭṭhānatāya uttamaratanākarattā itthī bhaṇḍānamuttamaṃ.
tika-s0301t:622_10: Satthamalaṃ viya satthassa paññāsatthassa guṇābhāvakaraṇato paññāsatthamalaṃ.
tika-s0301t:622_15: Tassa anvayato byatirekato ca yuttataṃ dassento “salākabhattādīnī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t:625_2: Te hi sabbaso paratthāya eva paṭipajjamānā mahākāruṇikā paratthakāmā,
tika-s0301t:625_7: Yasmā bodhisattā parahitapaṭipattiyā pāramiyo pūrentā tathārūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ patvā attānaṃ paresaṃ pariccajanti paññāpāramiyā paripūraṇato,
tika-s0301t:625_12: Taṃ pana pharusaṃ vācanti sarūpato dasseti.
tika-s0301t:628_1: Saddhā bandhati pātheyyanti saddhā nāma sattassa maraṇavasena mahāpathaṃ saṃvajato mahākantāraṃ paṭipajjato
tika-s0301t:628_2: mahāviduggaṃ pakkhandato pātheyyapuṭaṃ bandhati sambalaṃ sajjeti.
tika-s0301t:628_4: Etaṃ vuttanti “saddhā bandhati pātheyya”nti etaṃ gāthāpadaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā.
tika-s0301t:628_5: Sirīti katapuññehi sevīyati tehi paṭilabhīyatīti sirī.
tika-s0301t:628_9: Parikaḍḍhatīti icchāvasikaṃ puggalaṃ tattha tattha upakaḍḍhati.
tika-s0301t:631_2: Padīpo andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā paccakkhato rūpagataṃ dasseti,
tika-s0301t:631_3: evaṃ paññāpajjoto avijjandhakāraṃ vidhamitvā dhammānaṃ paramatthabhūtaṃ rūpaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0301t:631_5: So hi satipaññāvepullappattiyā sabbadāpi jāgaro hoti.
tika-s0301t:631_15: gorasasiddhiyā ceva kasanabhāravahanasiddhiyā ca kasikammaekaccavāṇijjakammādīni ijjhanti.
tika-s0301t:631_16: Sattakāyassāti āhārupajīvino sattakāyassa kasito aññathā jīvikaṃ kappentassapi kasijīvitavuttiyā mūlakāraṇaṃ phalanipphattinimittattā tassa.
tika-s0301t:634_2: Tehi abhibhūtatāya hi sattā nānappakāraṃ kandanti paridevanti.
tika-s0301t:634_3: Te pana sabbaso natthi etesaṃ raṇāti araṇā.
tika-s0301t:634_11: paccavekkhaṇe lokiyalokuttarāya pariññāya pariññeyyaṃ tebhūmakaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ parijānanti paricchijjanti.
tika-s0301t:634_13: Tathā hi te sāmī hutvā paribhuñjanti.
tika-s0301t:634_15: vandanīyabhāvo ca sīlasampannatāyāti āha “patiṭṭhitanti sīle patiṭṭhita”nti.
tika-s0301t:644_2: Devānaṃ janakajanetabbasambandhābhāvato kathamayaṃ devaputtoti vuccatīti āha “devānaṃ hī”tiādi.
tika-s0301t:644_5: Heṭṭhā devatāsaṃyutte “apākaṭā aññatarā devatā”ti vatvā idha “pākaṭo devaputto”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:645_2: Tattha ādito tiṇṇaṃ bhagavā pañhaṃ bhāraṃ na karoti ekekaṅgavekallato ceva aṅgadvayavekallato ca,
tika-s0301t:645_3: catutthassa pana ubhayaṅgapāripūrattā bhāraṃ karotīti āha “ayaṃ panā”tiādi.
tika-s0301t:646_1: Catusaccādinissitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ sikkhanto catubbidhaṃ vacīsucaritaṃ sikkhati nāmāti āha “catusaccanissitaṃ…pe…
tika-s0301t:646_5: Aṭṭhatiṃsabhedaṃ kammaṭṭhānanti idaṃ tassa vipassanāpadaṭṭhānataṃ hadaye ṭhapetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:646_7: Ye pana “dutiyapadena adhicittasikkhā cittavūpasamena adhipaññāsikkhā”ti paṭhanti,
tika-s0301t:646_8: tesaṃ padena aṭṭhatiṃsappabhedakammaṭṭhānaṃ suddhasamathakammaṭṭhānasseva gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t:646_11: Evañca katvā “dutiyapadena adhipaññāsikkhā”ti idaṃ vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0301t:646_16: Vacīsucaritassa hi sīlasabhāvattā taggahaṇeneva tadekalakkhaṇaṃ kāyasucaritampi itarampi gahitamevāti.
tika-s0301t:646_20: kāyaviveko pana sarūpeneva pāḷiyaṃ gahitoti tividhassapi vivekassa pakāsitattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t:649_6: Taṃ pana atthato aññā evāti āha “arahatta”nti.
tika-s0301t:649_7: Taṃ pattukāmena ekantato vajjetabbataṇhādiṭṭhīnaṃ bhāve tassa anijjhanato,
tika-s0301t:649_8: tadabhāve ijjhanato ca te uppādanavasena yadaggena nissito,
tika-s0301t:649_9: tadaggena panāyampi tehi nissito nāma hotīti āha “anissito”tiādi.
tika-s0301t:649_13: so idha na gahitoti āha “tantidhammo pubbabhāgo”ti.
tika-s0301t:655_2: tasmā idha na vattabbo atthoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0301t:658_3: Yaṃ kiñci khuddakampi mahantampi hīnampi paṇītampi bhavaṃ.
tika-s0301t:658_7: tato pacchāpi tatheva “buddhipaggaho”ti vīriyaṃ daḷhaṃ karotūti kuppadhammaṃ viya maññamāno vadati.
tika-s0301t:659_2: Yadi evaṃ idheva kasmā etaṃ vuttanti āha “idha panā”tiādi.
tika-s0301t:662_2: Ayaṃ kira kassapassa bhagavato sāsane pabbajitvāva bahūni vassasahassāni samaṇadhammaṃ akāsi,
tika-s0301t:662_7: Sīlena samāhitāti yathā sīlaṃ uparūpari visesāvahaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyañca hoti,
tika-s0301t:662_10: Patiṭṭhitasabhāvāti sekkhattā eva yathādhigatadhammena niccalabhāvena adhiṭṭhitasabhāvā.
tika-s0301t:662_11: Mayā tuṭṭhiyā gahitāya devaputto “dullabhā tuṭṭhī”ti vakkhatīti bhagavā “tuṭṭhi hoti sukhāvahā”ti avocāti āha “upari pañhasamuṭṭhāpanattha”nti.
tika-s0301t:662_12: Pabbajito rukkhamūliko abbhokāsiko vā anagāriyupeto nāma hoti,
tika-s0301t:662_17: manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ nibbisevanabhāvakaraṇena savisesaṃ cittassa vūpasamakarabhāvanāya rato manoti yojanā.
tika-s0301t:663_0: Ettha ca indriyūpasamena cittasamādhānaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ hoti indriyabhāvanāya cittasamādhānassa akārakānaṃ dūrīkaraṇato.
tika-s0301t:663_1: Adhicittasamādhānena catupaccayasantoso savisesaṃ parisuddho paripuṇṇo ca hoti paccayānaṃ alābhalābhesu pariccāgasabhāvato.
tika-s0301t:663_2: Vuttanayena pana santuṭṭhassa yathāsamādinnaṃ sīlaṃ visujjhati pāripūriñca upagacchati,
tika-s0301t:663_3: tathābhūto catusaccakammaṭṭhāne yutto maggapaṭipāṭiyā sabbaso kilese samucchindanto nibbānadiṭṭho hotīti imamatthaṃ dasseti “ye rattindiva”ntiādinā.
tika-s0301t:663_5: Gamissantevāti ariyamaggabhāvanaṃ pahāya sammāpaṭipattiyā dukkarabhāvaṃ sandhāya sāsaṅkaṃ vadati.
tika-s0301t:663_6: Tenāha “ayaṃ pana duggamo bhagavā visamo maggo”ti.
tika-s0301t:664_1: So hi bhagavato ‘ariyā gacchantī’ti vacanaṃ sutvā ‘duggamo bhagavā’tiādimāhā”ti vadanti,
tika-s0301t:664_3: Yasmā “saccameta”nti evamādipi tasseva vevacanaṃ katvā dassitaṃ,
tika-s0301t:664_4: tasmā “yena maggena ariyā gacchantī”ti tumhehi vuttaṃ,
tika-s0301t:664_5: ayaṃ pana “duggamo bhagavā visamo maggo”ti āha devaputto.
tika-s0301t:664_6: Ariyamaggo kāmaṃ kadāci atidukkhā paṭipadātipi vuccati,
tika-s0301t:664_8: ayaṃ pana atīva sugamo sabbakilesaduggavivajjanato kāyaduccaritādivisamassa rāgādivisamassa ca dūrīkaraṇato na visamo.
tika-s0301t:664_11: Ariyamaggassa hi adhisīlasikkhādīnaṃ paribundhitabbabhāgena bahū parissayā hontīti.
tika-s0301t:664_12: Evaṃ vuttoti “duggamo visamo”ti ca evaṃ vutto.
tika-s0301t:665_2: tañca anariyā patanti na uṭṭhahanti micchāpaṭipajjanato.
tika-s0301t:665_6: Taṃ magganato anariyā ariyānaṃ maggato apāpuṇanena pariccattā hutvā apāye sakalavaṭṭadukkhe ca patanti.
tika-s0301t:665_7: Svevāti svāyaṃ anariyehi kadācipi gantuṃ asakkuṇeyyo maggo ariyānaṃ visuddhasattānaṃ sabbaso samadhigamena samo hoti.
tika-s0301t:665_8: Kāyavisamādīhi samannāgatattā visame sattakāye tesaṃ sabbasova pahānena sabbattha samāyeva.
tika-s0301t:668_3: So hi duggahano tasmiṃ asati kāmaguṇasambādho anavasaro eva seyyathāpi mahākassapādīnaṃ.
tika-s0301t:668_15: Paṭilabhiṃsūti kāmaguṇasambādhepi “ime kāmaguṇā mādisānaṃ kiṃ karissantī”ti?
tika-s0301t:669_0: Ayaṃ kira devaputto ito purimavāre attabhāve paṭhamajjhānalābhī hutvā tato cavitvā brahmakāyikāsu nibbattitvā
tika-s0301t:669_1: tattha jhānasukhaṃ anubhavitvā tato cuto idāni kāmabhave nibbatto,
tika-s0301t:669_2: tasmā taṃ jhānaṃ sambhāvento “tādisassa nāma jhānasukhassa lābhī bhagavā”ti tena guṇena bhagavantaṃ abhitthavanto “sambādhe vatā”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
tika-s0301t:669_3: Athassa bhagavā yathā nāma aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyojanasatasahassubbedhasinerupabbatarājaṃ upādāya sāsapo na kiñci hoti,
tika-s0301t:669_4: evaṃ anantāparimeyyabuddhaguṇe upādāya rūpāvacarapaṭhamajjhānaṃ na kiñci hotīti dassento “ye sati”ntiādinā anuttaraguṇādhigamaṃ pavedesi.
tika-s0301t:669_6: Susamāhitāti lokiyasamādhinā ceva lokuttarasamādhinā ca suṭṭhu samāhitā.
tika-s0301t:669_9: Keci “kammante susamāhitā”ti pāṭhaṃ vatvā “maggasamāhitā”ti atthaṃ vadanti.
tika-s0301t:672_1: Atītajātiyaṃ sayaṃkāravasena tāya diṭṭhiyā uppāditattā pubbe titthakaro.
tika-s0301t:672_3: Apare āhu “ayaṃ me satthāti gahaṇavasena titthakaro assa atthīti pubbe titthakaro,
tika-s0301t:672_5: Te “diṭṭhiṃ uppādetvāti tassa satthuno diṭṭhiṃ ādāya gahetvāti attho”ti vadanti.
tika-s0301t:672_6: Titthaṃ nāma dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo tabbinimuttassa micchāvādassa abhāvato.
tika-s0301t:673_5: Upapajjatīti na uppajjati na pāpuṇātīti āha “na paṭilabhatī”ti.
tika-s0301t:673_8: Pabbajitavatasamādānassa adaḷhatāya ca tattha ca asakkaccakiriyāya sithilagahitā.
tika-s0301t:673_11: Dukkaṭaṃ akatameva seyyoti duccaritaṃ nāma sabbena sabbaṃ akatameva hitāvahaṃ.
tika-s0301t:674_1: Sithilaṃ katanti asakkaccakāritāya sithilaṃ katvā pavattitaṃ.
tika-s0301t:677_1: Vimāne gahite taṃnivāsīpi gahito hotīti vuttaṃ “candavimānavāsī devaputto”ti.
tika-s0301t:677_2: Sabbadhīti sabbasmā duggaṭṭhānā vippamuttosi bhagavā tvaṃ,
tika-s0301t:677_3: tasmā mayhampi ito sambādhaṭṭhānato vippamokkhaṃ karohīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0301t:680_5: rāhuno pana payogo tassa vimāneti āha “maṇḍalīti maṇḍalasaṇṭhāno”ti.
tika-s0301t:680_9: Idāni tassa mukhena gahaṇasamatthataṃ dassetuṃ “rāhussa hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:680_13: So hi kenaci abhimukhaṃ atidunnivāro kammaniyāmasiddho.
tika-s0301t:680_21: candimasūriyānaṃ pana gamanavego tena sabbathāpi dunnivāriyovāti dasseti.
tika-s0301t:680_24: Amāvāsiyañhi dve vimānāni yojanamattantaritāni hutvā saheva pavattanti.
tika-s0301t:680_26: atha kasmā sūriyasutte eva “pajaṃ mama”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0301t:680_28: “So ca kira na cirasseva tato cavitvā aññattha nibbatto,
tika-s0301t:680_29: aññā eva ca devatā tattha vasi,
tika-s0301t:680_30: yasmiṃ candaggahe bhagavā taṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi,
tika-s0301t:680_32: aparabhāge pana tatthapi kālena kālaṃ rāhuggaho hotī”ti vadanti.
tika-s0301t:685_1: Pabbatataṭā sandamāno tathārūpo nadīnivattanapadesopi sambādhaṭṭhānatāya kaccho viyāti āha “pabbatakacchepī”ti.
tika-s0301t:685_2: Paṭipakkhadūrībhāvena seṭṭhaṭṭhena ca eko udetīti ekodi, ekaggatā.
tika-s0301t:685_7: Kāyādibhedaṃ ārammaṇaṃ sātisayāya satiyā sarantīti satā.
tika-s0301t:685_9: Sotthiṃ gamissantīti yathāvuttapadese magā sotthimanupaddavena vattissanti,
tika-s0301t:685_10: evaṃ jhānalābhino sotthiṃ kilesehi anupaddutā vattissanti.
tika-s0301t:685_18: Suttajālaṃ chinditvā macchā viya kilesajālaṃ bhinditvā gamissantīti.
tika-s0301t:688_3: Siṭṭhipadeti kilesānaṃ sāsanato vaṭṭadukkhaparittāsanato ca siṭṭhisaññite yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjitabbato pade,
tika-s0301t:691_0: 94. Tatheva paññāyīti dīghalaṭṭhitveva paññāyi, tathāsamaññā eva ahosi.
tika-s0301t:694_2: Rukkho vā pabbato vāti sattānaṃ pakaticakkhussa āvaraṇabhūto rukkho viya pabbato viya ca abhibhavituṃ samattho ñeyyāvaraṇo natthi.
tika-s0301t:697_2: Tattha hi paribbhamantassa patiṭṭhā dullabhā yebhuyyena tattha sattā nimuggā eva honti,
tika-s0301t:697_5: Tattha hi nibbattassa nibbānaṃ āruhituṃ ālambanā dullabhā,
tika-s0301t:697_6: jhānābhiratiyā tattheva nikanti tesaṃ balavatī hoti,
tika-s0301t:697_12: kāmacchandapamukhāni ca orambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni gahitānīti āha “kāmasaññāgahaṇena pañcorambhāgiyasaṃyojanānī”ti.
tika-s0301t:703_2: Tassa satthu santikūpasaṅkamanassa kāraṇaṃ dassento “so kirā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t:703_8: Aññathā pupphāniyeva tāya tāya cittassa vasena mālābhāvena hatthaṃ upagacchantīti.
tika-s0301t:703_9: Upacchedakakammavasenāti tasmiṃ devaloke āyusese sati eva tassa pana upaghātakassa laddhokāsassa pāpakammassa vasena.
tika-s0301t:704_3: Tatthevāti tasmiṃyeva niraye nibbattitabbaṃ iminā tāhi ca saheva pubbe tassa pāpakammassa katattā.
tika-s0301t:704_6: Satthu santikaṃ gantvāti tāhi pañcasatāhi accharāhi saddhiṃ bhagavato santikaṃ gantvā.
tika-s0301t:705_2: Svāyaṃ niccattho adhippāyavasena gahetabboti tattha pahātabbaṃ gahetabbañca dassento “devaloke”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t:705_3: Na gahetabbo hetupavattito pubbe tassa utrāsassa abhāvato.
tika-s0301t:705_5: Tāni hi hetupaccayehi kattabbato gāthāyaṃ “kicchesū”ti vuttāni.
tika-s0301t:705_7: Yāsañhi payogavipattīnaṃ vasenassa tāni dukkhāni uppajjeyyuṃ,
tika-s0301t:705_9: Tā hi assa payogavipattiyo gativipattiyo satthu santikaṃ upagamanena hāyeyyuṃ.
tika-s0301t:705_10: Nibbattānaṃ diṭṭhānīti nibbattānaṃ vasena diṭṭhāni dukkhāni.
tika-s0301t:706_4: aññatrasaddayogena ca “bojjhā”ti nissakkavacananti tadatthaṃ dassento muñcitvāpadaṃ apekkhitvā “bojjhaṅgabhāvana”nti āha.
tika-s0301t:707_0: Indriyasaṃvarova paṭhamaṃ veditabbo paṭipattikkamavasena tasseva paṭhamattā.
tika-s0301t:707_2: Nippariyāyato maggapariyāpannā eva bojjhaṅgāti āha “sahavipassanāya bojjhaṅge”ti.
tika-s0301t:707_4: Yasmā devaputtassa satthā taṃ gāthaṃ vatvā upari ca saccāni pakāsesi,
tika-s0301t:707_6: Devaputto sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahīti kāmaṃ tasseva visesādhigamo idhāgato,
tika-s0301t:707_7: pañcasatamattāhi pana accharāhi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t:707_8: Tenāha mahāsatipaṭṭhānasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ “so desanāpariyosāne pañcahi accharāsatehi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale
tika-s0301t:707_9: patiṭṭhāya taṃ sampattiṃ thāvaraṃ katvā devalokameva agamāsī”ti.
tika-s0301t:710_1: “Nandāmī”ti vutte nandī nāma pabbajitassa malanti codetukāmo devaputto “nandasī”ti pucchi.
tika-s0301t:710_2: Athassa bhagavā taṃ paṭikkhipanto “kiṃ laddhā”ti? Āha.
tika-s0301t:710_3: Tena “tayā mama adhippetanandiyā idha paccayo eva natthi,
tika-s0301t:710_6: Atha devaputto nandiyā asati sokena bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-s0301t:710_7: soko ca pabbajitassa malanti codento āha “tena hi, samaṇa,
tika-s0301t:711_0: Yadi te nandisokā na santi hāsavatthuno lābhassa jāniyā ca abhāvato,
tika-s0301t:711_4: Tasmimpi bhagavatā paṭikkhitte atha nesampi nandisokāratīnaṃ abhāve kāraṇaṃ pucchanto “kathaṃ tva”nti gāthamāha?
tika-s0301t:711_5: Athassa bhagavā taṃ kāraṇaṃ pavedento “aghajātassā”ti gāthamāha.
tika-s0301t:711_8: Jātataṇhassa appahīnataṇhassa vaṭṭadukkhaṃ āgatameva kāraṇassa appahīnattā.
tika-s0301t:711_9: Tasseva hi kāraṇassa appahīnataṃ dassento “dukkhī sukhaṃ patthayatīti hi vutta”nti āha.
tika-s0301t:717_1: Dasame kāmaṃ devatāsaṃyuttepi “idaṃ hi taṃ jetavana”ntiādinā imā eva gāthā āgatā.
tika-s0301t:717_3: Heṭṭhā āgatanayattā eva hi potthakesu na likhitaṃ,
tika-s0301t:717_4: idha pana devaputtasaṃyutte “anāthapiṇḍiko devaputto”ti nidāne nigame ca āgataṃ,
tika-s0301t:717_6: Satthā pana bhikkhūnaṃ tamatthaṃ pavedento “aññataro devaputto”ti āha.
tika-s0301t:725_2: Balavacintanaṃ cintetīti yathā sākaṭiko ajānitvā visame magge sakaṭaṃ pājento akkhe chinne patikātuṃ
tika-s0301t:725_5: evaṃ adhammavādī maccumukhaṃ patto balavacittasantāpaṃ pāpuṇāti,
tika-s0301t:728_1: Yaṃ dānaṃ demīti yaṃ deyyadhammaṃ parassa demi.
tika-s0301t:728_2: Tassa pati hutvāti tabbisayaṃ lobhaṃ suṭṭhu abhibhavanto tassa adhipati hutvā demi tena anākaḍḍhanīyattā.
tika-s0301t:728_3: “Na dāso na sahāyo”ti vatvā tadubhayaṃ anvayato byatirekato dassetuṃ “yo hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:728_4: Dāso hutvā deti taṇhāya dāsabyassa upagatattā.
tika-s0301t:728_6: Sāmī hutvā deti taṇhādāsabyato attānaṃ mocetvā abhibhuyya pavattanato.
tika-s0301t:729_0: Atha vā yo dānasīlatāya dāyako puggalo,
tika-s0301t:729_1: so dāne pavattibhedena dānadāso dānasahāyo dānapatīti tippakāro hotīti dasseti.
tika-s0301t:729_2: Tadassa tippakārataṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “yo hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:729_6: tassa vase vattanato dāso viya hoti.
tika-s0301t:729_8: tatthapi annapānasāmaññena idaṃ vuttaṃ “dānasaṅkhātassa deyyadhammassa dāso hutvā detī”ti.
tika-s0301t:729_9: Sahāyo hutvā deti attanā paribhuñjitabbassa paresaṃ dātabbassa ca samasamaṭṭhapanena.
tika-s0301t:729_10: Pati hutvā deti sayaṃ deyyadhammassa vase avattitvā tassa attano vase vattāpanato.
tika-s0301t:730_1: yo attanā paṇītaṃ paribhuñjitvā paresaṃ nihīnaṃ deti,
tika-s0301t:730_6: Yo attanā nihīnaṃ paribhuñjitvā paresaṃ paṇītaṃ deti,
tika-s0301t:730_9: tasmā devaputto “dānapatī”ti vadanto “ahaṃ tādiso ahosi”nti dasseti.
tika-s0301t:731_0: “Catūsu dvāresu dānaṃ dīyitthā”ti pāḷiyaṃ saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthāretvā dassetuṃ “tassa kirā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:731_9: Kasivāṇijjādijīvikaṃ anuṭṭhātuṃ asamatthā idha “kapaṇā”ti adhippetāti āha “kāṇakuṇiādayo”ti.
tika-s0301t:731_11: Vanibbakāti dāyakānaṃ guṇakittanakammaphalakittanavasena yācakā seyyathāpi naggādayo.
tika-s0301t:731_17: Mahantataraṃ dānaṃ adaṃsu aññassapi dhanassa viniyogaṃ gatattā.
tika-s0301t:731_18: Taṃ sandhāyāti taṃ mahantataraṃ dānaṃ kataṃ sandhāya.
tika-s0301t:731_19: Rañño hi tattha dānaṃ itthāgārassa dānena mahatā abhibhūtaṃ viya paṭinivattaṃ hotīti āha “paṭinivattī”ti.
tika-s0301t:731_22: Anekavassasahassāyukakāle tassa uppannattā asītivassasahassāni so rājā dānamadāsīti.
tika-s0301t:737_1: Ye vinaye apakataññuno saṃkilesikesu vodāniyesu dhammesu na kusalā yaṃ kiñci na kārino vippaṭisārabahulā.
tika-s0301t:737_3: uppannañca bhiyyobhāvaṃ vepullaṃ āpajjatīti āha “akappiye kappiyasaññitāya…pe…
tika-s0301t:737_5: Sārābhāvena tucchattā ca naḷo viyāti naḷo,
tika-s0301t:737_8: Māno hi seyyassa seyyoti sadisoti ca pavattiyā visesato tuccho.
tika-s0301t:737_17: Yena samannāgatā sattā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhātuṃ vā nisīdituṃ vā na sakkonti,
tika-s0301t:738_0: Guṇakathāya saddhiṃ kathiyamāno nigguṇassa aguṇo pākaṭo hoti jātimaṇisamīpe ṭhitassa viya kācamaṇino doso.
tika-s0301t:739_2: Vissajjetvāti sativossaggavasena vissajjetvā kilesamucchāyāti mahicchāsaṅkhātāya taṇhāmucchāya.
tika-s0301t:739_3: Sīlavantānaṃyeva hi duppaṭipattiṃ sandhāya devaputto vadati.
tika-s0301t:739_9: tatheva honti attahitāsamatthatāya viññūnaṃ jigucchitabbatāya ca.
tika-s0301t:742_3: sāmaññato vuttampi “so lokassa anto”ti vacanato visiṭṭhavisayameva hoti.
tika-s0301t:742_4: “Na jāyati na mīyatī”ti vatvā puna “na cavati na upapajjatī”ti kasmā vuttanti āha “idaṃ aparāparaṃ…pe…
tika-s0301t:742_7: Saṅkhāralokassa antaṃ sandhāya vadati upari saccāni pakāsetukāmo.
tika-s0301t:743_7: sikkhā ca ettake kāle samatthassa ukkaṃsagato hotīti āha “dasa dvādasa vassāni dhanusippaṃ sikkhito”ti.
tika-s0301t:744_7: Tadāti yadā so lokantagavesako ahosi, tadā.
tika-s0301t:750_10: gorūpassa viya sīlaṃ etassāti hi gorūpasīlo.
tika-s0301t:750_12: Ariyānaṃ sabhāgatā nāma guṇavantavasenāti āha “aññamaññassa guṇesu pasīditvā”ti.
tika-s0301t:750_16: Tesaṭṭhi sāvakasādhāraṇañāṇānipi ettheva saṅgahaṃ samosaraṇaṃ gacchanti.
tika-s0301t:751_6: saddena bhagavatā attānaṃ ādiṃ katvā tadaññesaṃ viññūnaṃ sabbesaṃ therassa ruccanasabhāvo dīpitoti dassento “mayhaṃ ruccatī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t:751_7: Tattha satipi ānandattherassapi asītiyā mahātherānaṃ antogadhabhāve “asītiyā mahātherānaṃ ruccatī”ti
tika-s0301t:751_8: vatvā “tuyhampi ruccatī”ti vacanaṃ tena dhammasenāpatino vaṇṇaṃ kathāpetukāmatāyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t:752_1: Laddhokāsoti nibbuddhaṃ karonto sāṭakantare laddhaṃ gahetuṃ laddhāvasaro.
tika-s0301t:752_8: Keci pana “bālo bālatāyāti mūḷhatāya pakatibālabhāvena na jānāti.
tika-s0301t:752_9: Mūḷho mohenāti sayaṃ abālo samānopi yadā mohena pariyuṭṭhito hoti,
tika-s0301t:753_0: “Catūsu kosallesū”ti vuttaṃ catubbidhaṃ kosallaṃ pāḷiyā eva dassetuṃ “vuttaṃ heta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:753_1: Tattha yo aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo samudayato atthaṅgamato assādato ādīnavato nissaraṇato ca yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti,
tika-s0301t:753_6: idaṃ aṭṭhānaṃ akāraṇa”nti evaṃ ṭhānañca ṭhānato,
tika-s0301t:753_8: Yo pana imesu dhātuādīsu pariññābhisamayādivasena nissaṅgagatiyā paṇḍāti laddhanāmena ñāṇena ito gato pavatto,
tika-s0301t:754_0: Mahantānaṃ atthānaṃ pariggaṇhanato mahatī paññā etassāti mahāpañño.
tika-s0301t:754_1: Sesapadesupi eseva nayoti āha “mahāpaññādīhi samannāgatoti attho”ti.
tika-s0301t:754_2: Nānattanti yāhi mahāpaññādīhi samannāgatattā thero “mahāpañño”tiādinā kittito,
tika-s0301t:754_3: tāsaṃ mahāpaññādīnaṃ idaṃ nānattaṃ ayaṃ vemattatā.
tika-s0301t:754_4: Yassa kassaci visesato arūpadhammassa mahattaṃ nāma kiccasiddhiyā veditabbanti tadassa kiccasiddhiyā
tika-s0301t:754_6: Tattha hetumahantatāya paccayamahantatāya nissayamahantatāya pabhedamahantatāya kiccamahantatāya phalamahantatāya
tika-s0301t:754_17: vitthāro pana visuddhimagge ākaṅkheyyasuttādīsu ca āgatanayena veditabbo.
tika-s0301t:754_18: Iminā nayena samādhikkhandhādīnampi mahantatā yathārahaṃ niddhāretvā veditabbā.
tika-s0301t:754_24: sāmaññaphalānaṃ mahato hitassa mahato sukhassa mahato atthassa mahato yogakkhemassa nipphattibhāvato
tika-s0301t:754_26: abhiññānaṃ mahāsambhārato mahāvisayato mahākiccato mahānubhāvato mahānipphattito ca;
tika-s0301t:754_28: Pariggaṇhātīti sabhāvādito paricchijja gaṇhāti jānāti paṭivijjhatīti attho.
tika-s0301t:755_0: Puthupaññāti ettha nānākhandhesu ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti ayaṃ rūpakkhandho nāma…pe…
tika-s0301t:755_1: ayaṃ viññāṇakkhandho nāmāti evaṃ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati.
tika-s0301t:755_8: viññāṇakkhandhoti evaṃ ekekassa khandhassa ekavidhādivasena atītādivasenapi nānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati.
tika-s0301t:755_12: dve catubhūmakāti evaṃ āyatanānaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati.
tika-s0301t:755_16: dve catubhūmakāti evaṃ dhātunānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati,
tika-s0301t:755_17: taṃ upādiṇṇadhātuvasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ paccekabuddhānañhi dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānañca upādiṇṇadhātūsu eva nānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati.
tika-s0301t:755_20: anupādiṇṇakadhātūnaṃ pana nānākaraṇaṃ na jānanti eva.
tika-s0301t:755_22: sabbaññubuddhānaṃyeva pana imāya nāma dhātuyā ussannattāva imassa rukkhassa khandho seto hoti,
tika-s0301t:755_28: imassa pupphaṃ nīlaṃ pītakaṃ lohitakaṃ odātaṃ,
tika-s0301t:755_30: phalaṃ khuddakaṃ mahantaṃ dīghaṃ vaṭṭaṃ susaṇṭhānaṃ maṭṭhaṃ pharusaṃ sugandhaṃ madhuraṃ tittakaṃ ambilaṃ kaṭukaṃ kasāvaṃ;
tika-s0301t:755_31: kaṇṭako tikhiṇo atikhiṇo ujuko kuṭilo tambo lohito odāto hotīti dhātunānattaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati.
tika-s0301t:756_1: Nānāpaṭiccasamuppādesūti ajjhattabahiddhābhedato ca saṇṭhānabhedato ca nānappabhedesu paṭiccasamuppādaṅgesu.
tika-s0301t:756_5: tato eva itthipurisaattaattaniyādivasena anupalabbhesu sabhāvesu. Ma-
tika-s0301t:756_10: Paṭibhānesūti atthapaṭisambhidādīsu visayabhūtesu “imāni idamatthajotakānī”ti tathā tathā paṭibhānato patiṭṭhānato paṭibhānānīti laddhanāmesu ñāṇesu.
tika-s0301t:756_11: Puthu nānāsīlakkhandhesūtiādīsu sīlassa puthuttaṃ nānattañca vuttameva.
tika-s0301t:756_14: tattha upacāravasena puthuttaṃ gahetabbanti āha “puthu janasādhāraṇe dhamme samatikkammā”ti.
tika-s0301t:756_15: Tenassa idha madanimmadanādipariyāyena puthuttaṃ dīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0301t:757_0: Evaṃ visayavasena paññāya mahattaṃ puthuttañca dassetvā idāni sampayuttadhammavasena hāsabhāvaṃ,
