tika-s0301t:1193_0: Nisīdi tattha bhikkhūti iminā sattūpaladdhiyā anissitattā yathāruciyā tesaṃ nisajjaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0301t:1194_0: Iminā ca iminā ca ākārena jātanti na anussavadassanametaṃ,
tika-s0301t:1194_2: Takkahetu nayahetu vā na vadāmīti yojanā.
tika-s0301t:1194_5: kenaci ganthānusārena evaṃ na vadāmīti attho.
tika-s0301t:1194_6: Brahmassa seṭṭhassa dhammassa cariyaṃ vācasikaṃ pavattatīti brahmacariyaṃ,
tika-s0301t:1194_8: Bhāvitena maraṇassa sabbaso bhāgena vippahānena maraṇapariccāgīnaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1195_2: Puññabhāginoti vivaṭṭanissitapuññassa bhāgino tassā desanāya ettakā sattā jātāti gaṇetuṃ ahaṃ na sakkomīti dasseti.
tika-s0301t:1198_1: Abhibhū sambhavoti tesaṃ dvinnaṃ mahātherānaṃ nāmāni.
tika-s0301t:1198_3: Ete dve tassa bhagavato aggasāvakāti dasseti.
tika-s0301t:1198_5: Khiyyanti taṃ lāmakato cintetabbataṃ pāpenti pāpakataṃ karonti.
tika-s0301t:1198_6: Vitthārayantāti tameva lāmakato cintetabbataṃ vepullaṃ pāpentā.
tika-s0301t:1198_7: Sabbe pāsaṇḍā attano attano samaye siddhante sabbe devamanussā attano attano samaye paṭilābhe paṭiladdhaatthe purisakāraṃ vaṇṇayantīti yojanā.
tika-s0301t:1199_4: Payogaṃ karothāti paraṃ paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanato tatopi balavataraṃ bhāvanābhiyogaṃ pavattethāti attho.
tika-s0301t:1199_10: tadaññaṃ pana tesaṃ paṭipāṭi pavattaṃ saṃsāroti adhippāyenāha “jātiñca saṃsārañcā”ti.
tika-s0301t:1199_11: Yasmā “ekampi jātiṃ dvepi jātiyo”tiādīsu tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhave ādānanikkhepaparicchinnakhandhappavatti “jātī”ti vuccati,
tika-s0301t:1199_12: sā eva yāva parinibbānā aparāparaṃ pavattamāno saṃsāro “ito cito saṃsaraṇa”nti katvā,
tika-s0301t:1199_17: Ālokakiccaṃ natthīti andhakāraṭṭhāne ālokadassanaṃ viya ālokaṭṭhāne ālokadassanakiccaṃ natthi.
tika-s0301t:1199_22: Osaṭāya parisāyāti dhammassavanatthaṃ sabbosaṭāya paricitaparicchinnāya parisāya.
tika-s0301t:1199_23: Saddaṃ suṇiṃsūti na kevalaṃ saddameva suṇiṃsu,
tika-s0301t:1199_24: atha kho atthopīti yathādhippeto tesaṃ pakatisavanupacāre viya pākaṭo ahosi,
tika-s0301t:1202_1: Evaṃ taṃ kusinārāya hotīti yathā anurodhapurassa thūpārāmo dakkhiṇapacchimadisāyaṃ,
tika-s0301t:1202_2: evaṃ taṃ uyyānaṃ kusinārāya dakkhiṇapacchimadisāyaṃ hoti.
tika-s0301t:1202_3: Tasmāti yasmā nagaraṃ pavisitukāmā uyyānato upecca vattanti gacchanti etenāti upavattananti vuccati, tasmā.
tika-s0301t:1202_10: Appamādapadeyeva pakkhipitvā abhāsi atthato tassa sakalassa buddhavacanassa saṅgaṇhanato.
tika-s0301t:1203_0: Jhānādīsu citte ca paramukkaṃsagatavasībhāvatāya “ettake kāle ettakā samāpattiyo samāpajjitvā parinibbāyissāmī”ti
tika-s0301t:1204_0: Ayampi cāti yathāvuttapañcasaṭṭhiyā jhānānaṃ samāpannakathāpi saṅkhepakathā eva. Kasmā?
tika-s0301t:1204_1: Yasmā bhagavā tadā devasikaṃ vaḷañjanasamāpattiyo sabbāpi aparihāpetvā samāpajji evāti dassento “nibbānapuraṃ pavisanto”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t:1204_3: pavisitvāti ettha keci tāva āhu “bhagavā devasikaṃ dvādasakoṭisatasahassakkhattuṃ mahākaruṇāsamāpattiṃ samāpajjati,
tika-s0301t:1204_8: arahantaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ dve vitakkā bahulaṃ samudācaranti khemo ca vitakko paviveko ca vitakko’ti.
tika-s0301t:1204_9: Khemo hi vitakko bhagavato mahākaruṇāsamāpattiṃ pūretvā ṭhito,
tika-s0301t:1204_11: Buddhānaṃ hi bhavaṅgaparivāso lahuko matthakappatto samāpattīsu vasībhāvo,
tika-s0301t:1204_13: Pañca rūpāvacarasamāpattiyo catasso arūpasamāpattiyo appamaññāsamāpattiyā saddhiṃ nirodhasamāpatti arahattaphalasamāpatti
tika-s0301t:1204_14: cāti dvādasetā samāpattiyo bhagavā paccekaṃ divase divase koṭisatasahassakkhattuṃ purebhattaṃ samāpajjati,
tika-s0301t:1204_15: tathā pacchābhattanti evaṃ catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasaṅkhā devasikaṃ vaḷañjanakakasiṇasamāpattiyo”ti.
tika-s0301t:1205_0: Apare panāhu “yaṃ taṃ bhagavatā abhisambodhidivase pacchimayāme paṭiccasamuppādaṅgamukhena paṭilomanayena
tika-s0301t:1205_1: jarāmaraṇato paṭṭhāya ñāṇaṃ otāretvā anupadadhammavipassanaṃ ārabhantena yathā nāma puriso suviduggaṃ
tika-s0301t:1205_2: mahāgahanaṃ mahāvanaṃ chindanto antarantarā nisānasilāyaṃ pharasuṃ nisitaṃ karoti,
tika-s0301t:1205_3: evamevaṃ nisānasilāsadisiyo samāpattiyo antarantarā samāpajjitvā ñāṇassa tikkhavisadabhāvaṃ sampādetuṃ
tika-s0301t:1205_6: tadanusārena bhagavā buddhabhūtopi anulomapaṭilomato paṭiccasamuppādaṅgamukhena vipassanāvasena divase divase lakkhakoṭiphalasamāpattiyo samāpajjati,
tika-s0301t:1206_0: Imāni dvepi samanantarāneva paccavekkhaṇāyapi yebhuyyena nānantariyakatāya jhānapakkhikabhāvato.
tika-s0301t:1206_1: Yasmā sabbapacchimaṃ bhavaṅgacittaṃ tato tato cavanato “cutī”ti vuccati,
tika-s0301t:1206_3: atha kho sabbepi sattā bhavaṅgacitteneva cavantīti dassetuṃ “ye hi kecī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1206_4: Dukkhasaccenāti dukkhasaccapariyāpannena cuticittena kālaṃ kālakiriyaṃ karonti pāpuṇanti,
tika-s0301t:1207_1: Saṅkhārā vūpasammanti etthāti vūpasamoti evaṃ saṅkhātaṃ ñātaṃ kathitaṃ nibbānameva sukhanti.
tika-s0301t:1207_4: Sabbākāravaraguṇūpeteti sabbehi ākāravarehi uttamakāraṇehi sīlādiguṇehi samannāgate.
tika-s0301t:1207_10: Pajjotanibbānasadisoti padīpassa nibbānasadiso tattha vilīyitvā avaṭṭhānābhāvato.
tika-s0301t:1217_1: Dhanañjānigottāti ettha pubbapurisato āgatassa kulavaṃsassa nāmābhidhānasaṅkhātaṃ gaṃ tāyatīti gottaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1217_3: Aññakulaparamparāsādhāraṇaṃ tassa kulassa ādipurisasamudāgataṃ taṃkulapariyāpannasādhāraṇaṃ sāmaññarūpanti
tika-s0301t:1217_5: Tassā udānassa kāraṇaṃ pucchitvā ādito paṭṭhāya vibhāvetuṃ “so kirā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1218_2: Satthusāsane hi lokiyacchandaṃ anapekkhitvā esā pañcapadikagāthāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0301t:1219_2: idha pana dve eva uddhaṭā”ti vadanti.
tika-s0301t:1219_3: Paharituṃ vāti ekavārampi hatthena vā pādena vā paharitumpi parāmasitumpi asakkontoti attho.
tika-s0301t:1219_4: So hi tassā ariyasāvikāya ānubhāvena attano sāmatthiyena vase vattāpanatthaṃ santajjitvāpi tadanuvattanto nibbiso ahosi.
tika-s0301t:1220_2: Tasmiṃ samayeti tasmiṃ dukkhuppattikāle “sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā”ti bhagavato vacanaṃ anussaritvā “dasabalassa
tika-s0301t:1221_1: Bhijjitvāti saṃyatābhāvato tassa brāhmaṇassa antare mettibhedena bhijjitvā.
tika-s0301t:1222_0: Gāmanigamaraṭṭhapūjitoti iminā gāmanigamaraṭṭhasāmikehi pūjitabhāvo dīpito gāmādīnaṃ tesaṃ vase vattanato.
tika-s0301t:1225_1: Bhāradvājova soti bhāradvājo nāma eva so brāhmaṇo.
tika-s0301t:1225_5: Pakkho bhinnoti tato eva ñātipakkho naṭṭho.
tika-s0301t:1225_8: Dasahīti anavasesapariyādānavasena vuttaṃ pañcahi gāthāsatehi akkosanto tathā akkoseyyāti katvā.
tika-s0301t:1225_9: Tattha pana yena kenaci akkosantopi akkosatiyeva nāma.
tika-s0301t:1226_5: Assa anussavavasena sutvā “sapati ma”nti saññino bhayaṃ uppajjīti yojanā.
tika-s0301t:1226_7: Sutvāti padaṃ ubhayatthāpi yojetabbaṃ “tavevetaṃ brāhmaṇāti sutvā,
tika-s0301t:1227_2: Tassevāti paṭikujjhantasseva puggalassa tena kodhena pāpaṃ hoti pāpassa santānantarasaṅkantiyā abhāvato.
tika-s0301t:1227_3: Keci pana “tassevāti tasseva paṭikujjhantapurisassa tena paṭikujjhanena.
tika-s0301t:1227_4: Pāpiyoti paṭikujjhantapuggalassa lāmakataro”ti evamettha atthaṃ vadanti.
tika-s0301t:1227_5: Satiyā samannāgato hutvā paṭisaṅkhāne ṭhito adhivāseti,
tika-s0301t:1227_7: Ubhinnaṃ tikicchantanti ubhinnaṃ uppannakodhasaṅkhātaṃ kilesabyādhiṃ tikicchantaṃ vūpasamentaṃ taṃ puggalaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1227_8: Yo puggalotiādinā purimāsu gāthāsu pavattitāni padāni sambandhitvā dasseti.
tika-s0301t:1227_9: Pañcasu khandhesu yāthāvato vinītā ariyadhammassa kovidā nāma hontīti āha “dhammassāti pañcakkhandhadhammassā”ti.
tika-s0301t:1227_10: Idāni tamatthaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā dassento āha “catusaccadhammassa vā”ti.
tika-s0301t:1230_3: “Taṃ jayaṃ hotī”ti liṅgavipallāsavasena vuttanti āha “so jayo hotī”ti,
tika-s0301t:1230_6: taṃ pana bālānaṃ maññanāmattanti idha imamatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “katamassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1230_7: Vijānatova jayo na avijānato titikkhāya abhāvato.
tika-s0301t:1230_8: Na hi avijānanto andhabālo kodhaṃ vijetuṃ sakkoti.
tika-s0301t:1230_9: Kevalaṃ jayaṃ maññati kilesehi parājito samānopīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0301t:1233_8: asundarikabhāradvājoti ādito tīsu suttesu āgatā tayo.
tika-s0301t:1236_2: “Ahiṃsako aha”nti tadatthaṃ sādhetuṃ icchāya kathesīti vuttaṃ “ahiṃsakapañhaṃ pucchī”ti.
tika-s0301t:1236_3: Tathā ce assāti yathā te nāmassa attho,
tika-s0301t:1236_4: tathā cetaṃ bhaveyyāsi anvatthanāmako bhaveyyāsi ahiṃsako eva siyāti.
tika-s0301t:1242_4: Vijjāti tayo vedāti vadanti “tāya idhalokatthaṃ paralokatthaṃ ñāyantī”ti katvā.
tika-s0301t:1242_7: Tathā hi so eva tapaṃ ācarituṃ labhati, na itaro.
tika-s0301t:1245_3: Tathābhūto ca so sappinā saddhiṃ yojito nāma hotīti āha “saṃyojito”ti.
tika-s0301t:1245_4: Apāyamaggaṃ okkamati micchādiṭṭhimicchāsaṅkappādīnaṃ attano santāne samuppādanato.
tika-s0301t:1246_2: Sutavāti sutvā niṭṭhaṃ patto aggadakkhiṇeyyattāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0301t:1247_0: Pubbenivāsañāṇenāti idaṃ loke sāsane ca niruḷhatāvasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1247_1: Aññe hi pubbenivāsaṃ jānantā pubbenivāsañāṇeneva jānanti,
tika-s0301t:1247_6: tena pattabbattā āpannattā ca jātikkhayo arahattaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1247_7: Jānitvā vositavosānoti vijānitabbaṃ catusaccadhammaṃ maggañāṇena jānitvā soḷasannampi kiccānaṃ vositavosāno.
tika-s0301t:1248_1: Gāthāhi abhigītanti dvīhi gāthāhi mayā abhigītaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1248_6: brāhmaṇo pana pubbe adātukāmo pacchā gāthā sutvā dhammadesanāya muduhadayo hutvā dātukāmo ahosi,
tika-s0301t:1248_7: tasmā taṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anāgate diṭṭhānugatiāpajjanatthaṃ paṭikkhipi.
tika-s0301t:1248_8: Tathā hi anantarasutte kasibhāradvājasutte ca evameva paṭipajji.
tika-s0301t:1248_11: pakāsitāti etena gāthaṃ uddesaṭṭhāneva ṭhapetvā bhagavā brāhmaṇassa vitthārena dhammaṃ desesīti dasseti.
tika-s0301t:1248_14: Atthañca dhammañcāti sadevakassa lokassa hitañceva tassa kāraṇañca.
tika-s0301t:1248_18: Dhamme satīti ariyānaṃ ācāradhamme sati taṃ ālambitvā jīvantānaṃ etadeva seṭṭhanti “somaṃ bhuñjeyya pāyasa”nti taṃ ārabbha kathāya uppannattā.
tika-s0301t:1249_1: Sesā paccayā niddosā te ārabbha kathāya appavattitattā.
tika-s0301t:1249_3: Annena pānenāti lakkhaṇavacanametaṃ yathā “kākehi sappi rakkhitabba”nti.
tika-s0301t:1249_5: Bahusassaphaladāyakaṃ sukhettaṃ viya paṭiyattanti sammā kasanabījanaudakānayanāpanayanādinā susajjitaṃ
tika-s0301t:1249_6: khettaṃ viya sīlādiguṇavisesasampādanena paṭiyattaṃ puññakkhettaṃ etaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1252_5: Suvisodhito cassāti nihīnajātikānaṃ anena suṭṭhu visodhito ca bhaveyya.
tika-s0301t:1253_0: Aphalaṃ karotīti ito paṭṭhāya yāva demīti padaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1253_3: Himapātassa ca sītavātassa ca paṭibāhanatthanti akāraṇametanti taṃ anādiyitvā aññameva sukāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “paṭibalovā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1255_0: Akāraṇaṃ dakkhiṇeyyabhāvassa jāti adakkhiṇeyyabhāvahetūnaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ apaṭikkhepabhāvato.
tika-s0301t:1255_4: Tamatthanti taṃ dakkhiṇeyyabhāvassa kāraṇatāsaṅkhātamatthaṃ upamāya vibhāvento.
tika-s0301t:1255_6: Sāpānadoṇiādiavisuddhakaṭṭhā jāto aggikiccaṃ na ca na karoti.
tika-s0301t:1255_7: Evanti yathā aggi yato kutoci jātopi aggikiccaṃ karotiyeva,
tika-s0301t:1255_8: evaṃ caṇḍālakulādīsu jātopi dakkhiṇeyyo na na hoti guṇasampadāvasena ariyānaṃ vaṃse pajātattāti āha “guṇasampattiyā jātimā”ti.
tika-s0301t:1255_9: Dhitiyā guṇasampattiyā pamukhabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “so hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1255_11: Tañhi anuppannānaṃ kusaladhammānaṃ uppādanaparibrūhanehi te dhāreti.
tika-s0301t:1255_13: sammadeva pāpānaṃ jigucchane sati tesaṃ pavattiyā avasaro eva natthi.
tika-s0301t:1255_15: Kāraṇākāraṇajānanakoti tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ ṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0301t:1256_1: Indriyadamenāti tato eva ariyena indriyasaṃvarena upagato.
tika-s0301t:1257_2: Atha vā suyiṭṭhanti suṭṭhu sammadeva yiṭṭhaṃ sāre upanītaṃ mama idaṃ deyyavatthu.
tika-s0301t:1258_2: Tena taṃ sukhumattaṃ gatanti taṃ habyasesaṃ sabbaso sukhumabhāvaṃ gatanti ojāya anoḷārikatāya purimākāreneva paññāyamānataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0301t:1258_3: na pana ojāya eva kevalāya gahaṇaṃ sandhāya.
tika-s0301t:1258_4: Sā hi avinibbhogavuttitāya visuṃ gaṇhituṃ na sakkā,
tika-s0301t:1258_7: Oḷārikavatthutāya devānaṃ viya gahaṇī na tikkhāti dibbojasammissatāya sammā pariṇāmaṃ na gacchati.
tika-s0301t:1258_8: Sukhumāpi samānā dibbojā tena pāyasena missitā oḷārikasammissatāya sukhumavatthukānaṃ devānaṃ sukhadā
tika-s0301t:1258_10: Paribhogavatthuno oḷārikatāya vā devānaṃ dukkaraṃ sammā pariṇāmetuṃ,
tika-s0301t:1258_13: Samāpatticittasamuṭṭhitā tejodhātu jhānānubhāvasantejitā tikkhatarā hotīti vuttaṃ “aṭṭha…pe…
tika-s0301t:1260_0: Dāru samādahānoti dāruhariddi dārusmiṃ tassa dahanto.
tika-s0301t:1260_1: Yadītiādi dārujhāpanassa bahiddhabhāvasādhanaṃ asuddhahetūnaṃ paṭipakkhābhāvato tassa.
tika-s0301t:1260_2: Khandhādīsu kusalāti tesu sabhāvato samudayato atthaṅgamato assādato ādīnavato nissaraṇato jānanato chekā paṇḍitā.
tika-s0301t:1260_7: Evaṃ vadatīti caritaṃ brahmacariyaṃ gahetvā carāmīti evaṃ vattamānaṃ viya vadati āsannataṃ hadaye ṭhapetvā.
tika-s0301t:1261_2: Khandhena vayhamānoti kāje pakkhipitvā khandhena vayhamāno.
tika-s0301t:1261_3: Pathaviyā saddhiṃ phuseti bhārassa garukabhāvena kājassa pariṇamanena.
tika-s0301t:1261_4: Mānena attano jātiādīni paggaṇhato aññassa tāni na sahatīti āha –
tika-s0301t:1261_6: tattha tattha jātiādimānavatthusmiṃ garutaraggahaṇena saṃsīdeyyāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0301t:1261_7: Kodho dhūmoti yathāpi bhāsuro aggi dhūmena upakkiliṭṭho,
tika-s0301t:1261_12: evaṃ musāvāde sati ñāṇampīti tena taṃ nirodhitaṃ viya hotīti āha –
tika-s0301t:1261_14: Yathā sujāya vinā brāhmaṇānaṃ yāgo na ijjhati,
tika-s0301t:1261_15: evaṃ pahūtajivhāya vinā satthu dhammayāgo na ijjhatīti jivhā sujāpariyāyā vuttā.
tika-s0301t:1261_18: Sattānaṃ hadayaṃ jotiṭṭhānaṃ ñāṇaggino tattha samujjalanato.
tika-s0301t:1261_19: Attāti cittaṃ “āhito ahaṃ māno etthā”ti katvā.
tika-s0301t:1262_0: Dhammo rahadoti assaddhiyādiālasiyābhāvato kilesamalapakkhālanato paramagginibbutāvahanato ariyamaggadhammo anāvilo rahado.
tika-s0301t:1262_4: Seṭṭhabhāvena santo pāsaṃso hutvā kilese bhindati samucchindatīti sabbhīti vuccati.
tika-s0301t:1263_0: Vacīsaccanti iminā “caturaṅgasamannāgatā vācā suparisuddhā hotī”ti sammāvācaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0301t:1263_1: Saccasaṃyamapadehi dassitā maggadhammā idha “dhammo”ti adhippetāti āha –
tika-s0301t:1263_4: Maggasaccaṃ gahitaṃ anantaragāthāya anekehi visesetvā vuttattā.
tika-s0301t:1263_6: Tāya hi sakiccaṃ karontiyā itare sabbepi tadanuvattikā honti.
tika-s0301t:1263_9: Tathā hi so paññākkhandhena saṅgahaṃ gato.
tika-s0301t:1263_12: Tathā hi “evaṃdhammā te bhagavanto”tiādīsu samādhi “dhammo”ti vutto.
tika-s0301t:1263_21: Brahmacariyaṃ nāmāti etaṃ nibbānagāmi uttamaṭṭhena maggabrahmacariyaṃ nāma.
tika-s0301t:1263_22: Majjhe sitāti līnuddhaccādiantadvayavivajjanena majjhe majjhimapaṭipadābhāvanaṃ nissitā.
tika-s0301t:1263_25: kāro padasandhikaroti “sa ujubhūtesū”ti vattabbe majjhe ta-
tika-s0301t:1263_29: iti sundariko brāhmaṇo vuttoti katvā āha “sa tva”nti,
tika-s0301t:1263_31: Dhammo sāriyo paridhānabhūtā alaṅkārā etassāti dhammasārī.
tika-s0301t:1266_3: Dvinnaṃ ūrūnaṃ aññamaññabandhanavasena ābhujitākāraṃ sandhāyāha “ābhujitvāti bandhitvā”ti.
tika-s0301t:1266_4: Heṭṭhimakāyassa anujukaṃ ṭhapanaṃ nisajjāvacaneneva bodhitanti “ujuṃ kāya”nti ettha kāya-
tika-s0301t:1266_5: saddo uparimakāyavisayoti āha “uparimaṃ sarīraṃ ujukaṃ ṭhapetvā”ti.
tika-s0301t:1266_6: Taṃ pana ujukaṭṭhapanaṃ sarūpato payojanato ca dassetuṃ “aṭṭhārasā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1266_9: bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇato nivāretvā kammaṭṭhānaṃyeva purekkhatoti attho.
tika-s0301t:1266_13: tasmā pariggahitaniyyānanti sabbathā gahitasammosaṃ pariccattasammosaṃ satiṃ katvā paramaṃ satinepakkaṃ upaṭṭhapetvāti attho.
tika-s0301t:1267_0: Ajjasaṭṭhinti ajja channaṃ pūraṇī saṭṭhī divasavutti,
tika-s0301t:1267_1: ajja ādiṃ katvā cha divaseti attho.
tika-s0301t:1270_1: kaḷārapiṅgalāti vā rattagattā ca piṅgalacakkhukā ca.
tika-s0301t:1271_0: Paṭigāthāhi brāhmaṇassa dhammadesanaṃ vaḍḍhesīti pakatiyā tassa attanā kathetabbaṃ dhammadesanaṃ pabbajjāguṇakittanavasena sattahi vaḍḍhesi.
tika-s0301t:1271_1: Pabbajitvāti iṇāyikānaṃ attano palibodhaṃ tathā tathā jānāpetvā pabbajitvā.
tika-s0301t:1272_0: Yathā ca tattha bhagavā paṭipajji, taṃ dassetuṃ “puna divase”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1273_0: Taṃ taṃ kulagharaṃ pesetvāti taṃ taṃ tassa brāhmaṇassa dhītaraṃ tassa tassānucchavikassa brāhmaṇassa
tika-s0301t:1273_1: dento taṃ taṃ kulagharaṃ pesetvā brāhmaṇadhamme garukaraṇābhāvato.
tika-s0301t:1275_0: Itthiyā patiseṭṭhāya, na añño pati icchiyo”ti. –
tika-s0301t:1276_0: Ayañhi brāhmaṇadhammo. Ayyikaṭṭhāneti mātāmahiṭṭhāne ṭhapesi satthu cittārādhanavasenāti.
tika-s0301t:1281_3: Khandhesu ṭhapetvā yuge yottehīti yottarajjūhi yuttāni payojitāni icceva attho.
tika-s0301t:1284_0: Buddhānaṃ kiccāni kālavasena vibhattāni pañca kiccāni bhavanti.
tika-s0301t:1284_3: Kadāci ekotiādi tesaṃ tesaṃ vineyyānaṃ vinayanānurūpapaṭipattidassanaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1284_10: Kadāci anekehi pāṭihāriyehi vattamānehīti iminā pāramīnaṃ nissandabhūtāni pāṭihāriyāni rucivaseneva pakāsanakāni bhavanti,
tika-s0301t:1284_12: Evañca katvā “indakhīlassa anto ṭhapitamatte dakkhiṇapāde”tiādivacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0301t:1284_13: Bhagavato kāye pītarasmīnaṃ yebhuyyatāya “suvaṇṇarasasiñcanāni viyā”ti vatvā kāyamhi nīlādirasmīhi tahaṃ
tika-s0301t:1284_14: tahaṃ pītamissitaṃ sandhāya “vicitrapaṭaparikkhittāni viya cā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1285_0: Tatthāti vihāre. Gandhamaṇḍalamāḷeti hatthena kataparibhaṇḍe samosaritagandhapupphadāme maṇḍalamāḷe.
tika-s0301t:1286_6: Dutiyabhāgeti iminā aparabhāgaṃ tayo bhāge katvā tattha purimabhāgaṃ seyyanisajjāvasena samāpattīhi vītināmetīti dasseti.
tika-s0301t:1286_7: Lokanti rājagahādīsu yaṃ tadā upanissāya viharati,
tika-s0301t:1286_8: tattha aññattha vā bujjhanakaṃ vineyyasattalokaṃ buddhacakkhunā voloketi.
tika-s0301t:1288_3: Na hi mahāsamaye viya sabbadā majjhimayāme dasasahassacakkavāḷe sabbattha sabbā devatā satthu samīpaṃ upagacchanti.
tika-s0301t:1290_0: Atirocamānanti taṃ taṃ atikkamitvā samantato sabbadisāsu virocamānaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1290_2: Jaṅgamaṃ viya padumasaranti ratanamayakiñjakkhaṃ rajatamayakaṇṇikaṃ samantato samphullitakañcanapadumaṃ sañcārimasaraṃ viya.
tika-s0301t:1290_6: Siriyā jalamānanti sabbaso anavajjāya sabbākārena paripuṇṇakāyatāya anaññasādhāraṇāya rūpakāyasiriyā samujjalaṃ,
tika-s0301t:1290_7: yassā rucirabhāvo viddhe vigatavalāhake puṇṇamāsiyaṃ paripuṇṇakalamanomamaṇḍalaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ atirocati,
tika-s0301t:1290_9: hemasamujjalabhāvo tadubhaye abhibhuyya pavattamānaṃ ekakkhaṇe dasasahassilokadhātuvijjotanasamattha-
tika-s0301t:1290_10: mahābrahmuno pabhāsamudayaṃ abhivihacca bhāsati tapati virocati.
tika-s0301t:1291_2: Uttamadamathasamathamanuppatteti kāyavācāhi anuttaraṃ dantabhāvañceva anuttaraṃ cittavūpasamañca sampatte.
tika-s0301t:1291_5: Ubhayathāpi noti appasādo macchariyanti ubhayathāpi no eva,
tika-s0301t:1291_7: bhagavato mukhato kiñci desetukāmo vā evamāha.
tika-s0301t:1292_1: tathā hi na cirasseva arahattaṃ sacchikarissati.
tika-s0301t:1292_3: “evaṃ ahaṃ imassa kañci dhammaṃ sotuṃ labhissāmī”ti.
tika-s0301t:1293_5: tasmā bījaṃ vā īsaṃ vā pariggahayottāni vāti ayamattho dassito hoti.
tika-s0301t:1293_6: Tathā hi bhagavā brāhmaṇassa paṭivacanaṃ dento “saddhā bīja”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0301t:1293_9: taṃ aṭṭhakathāruḷhameva gahetabbañca saddato atthāpattito vā idha daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1294_5: Anukampāyāti asabbaññū hi satipi anukampāya pucchitamatte tiṭṭheyya,
tika-s0301t:1294_7: bhagavā pana ubhayadhammapāripūriyā “idaṃ apucchita”nti aparihāpetvā katheti.
tika-s0301t:1294_9: Tattha bījassa kasiyā mūlabhāvo nānantariyato tappamāṇavidhānato cāti āha “tasmiṃ…pe…
tika-s0301t:1294_11: Tena anvayato byatirekato ca bījassa kasiyā mūlabhāvaṃ vibhāveti.
tika-s0301t:1294_12: Kusalāti iminā akusalā tato aññathāpi karonti,
tika-s0301t:1295_0: Tassāti brāhmaṇassa bījaṭṭhāniyassa dhammassa ca upakārabhāvato.
tika-s0301t:1295_1: Dhammasambandhasamatthabhāvatoti tathā vuttadhammassa phalena sambandhituṃ yojetuṃ samatthabhāvato.
tika-s0301t:1295_3: Saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ “ayaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1295_4: Kassakassa upakārassa bījassa anantaraṃ vuṭṭhi vuccamānā aṭṭhāne vuttā nāma na hoti. Kasmā?
tika-s0301t:1295_6: tasmā avasāne majjhe vā vuccamānāya dhammasambandhasamatthatā tassā vibhāvitā na siyā.
tika-s0301t:1295_12: bījassa phalena sambandhane samatthāti dīpitā hoti anantaravacaneneva tassā āsannaupakārattadīpanato.
tika-s0301t:1296_4: Bhūtagāmo pana mūlaṃ bījaṃ etassāti mūlabījantiādinā veditabbo.
tika-s0301t:1296_5: Bījabījanti pañcamaṃ pana paccayantarasamavāye sadisaphaluppattiyā visesakāraṇabhāvato virūhanasamatthe
tika-s0301t:1296_6: sāraphale niruḷho bījasaddo tadatthasiddhiyā mūlādīsupi kesuci pavattatīti tato nivattanatthaṃ ekena bīja-
tika-s0301t:1296_7: saddena visesetvā vuttaṃ “bījabīja”nti “dukkhadukkhaṃ rūparūpa”nti ca yathā.
tika-s0301t:1296_8: Evampi iminā atthena imassapi nippariyāyova bījabhāvoti dassento āha “taṃ sabbampi…pe…
tika-s0301t:1297_0: Idāni kathañci vattabbe saddhāya opammatte bīje saddhāya bījabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “tattha yathā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1297_2: tathāpi samādhissa viya sabbesampi anavajjadhammānaṃ ādimūlabhāvato saddhāyapi patiṭṭhā hotīti āha “heṭṭhā sīlamūlena patiṭṭhātī”ti.
tika-s0301t:1297_10: Ariyamagganāḷenāti ariyamaggasotena ariyaphaladhaññaparipākagahaṇatthanti ariyaphalameva dhanāyitabbato dhaññaṃ tassa nibbattiatthaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1297_17: Khīraṃ janetvāti taruṇasalāṭukabhāvappattiyā taṇḍulassa bījassa bījabhūtaṃ khīraṃ uppādetvā.
tika-s0301t:1297_23: Ñāṇadassanavisuddhikhīranti sādurasasuvisuddhibhāvato ñāṇadassanavisuddhisaṅkhātaṃ khīraṃ janetvā. Aneka…pe…
tika-s0301t:1298_1: Yañhi taṃsadisassa visadisassa ca attano phalassa patiṭṭhāpanasambandhananipphādanasaṅkhātaṃ bījassa kiccaṃ,
tika-s0301t:1298_2: tassa karaṇato nibbattanato “evaṃ saddhā bījakicca”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1298_3: Iminā anaññasādhāraṇaṃ saddhāya kusaladhammānaṃ bījabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0301t:1298_7: evaṃ anavasesāya sammāpaṭipattiyā saddhā mūlakāraṇanti dasseti.
tika-s0301t:1299_1: dukkarakārikā dhutaṅgañca akusaladhamme ceva kāyañca tapati vibādhatīti tapoti vuccati.
tika-s0301t:1299_6: Viruhanāmilāyananipphattivacanehi dhaññabījasantānassa viya tesaṃ vuddhiyā saddhābījasantānassa tapovuṭṭhiyā ādimajjhapariyosānesu upakārataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0301t:1300_1: saddena parapadesupīti attho daṭṭhabbo “hirī me īsā,
tika-s0301t:1300_5: Udakampi tāva dātabbaṃ hoti nadītaḷākādito ānetvā.
tika-s0301t:1301_0: Saha vipassanāya maggapaññā adhippetā amatapphalāya kasiyā adhippetattā.
tika-s0301t:1301_1: Vipassanā paññā cāti duvidhāpi paññā upanissayā hoti visiṭṭhabhāvato.
tika-s0301t:1301_4: Paññavataṃ paññā purato hoti yonisomanasikārassa visesapaccayabhāvato,
tika-s0301t:1301_10: paññāya kadāci appayogato manosīsena samādhi idha vuttoti āha “manosaṅkhātassa samādhiyottassā”ti.
tika-s0301t:1301_12: Ekato gamananti līnaccāraddhasaṅkhātaṃ ekapassato gamanaṃ vāreti.
tika-s0301t:1301_13: Majjhimāya vipassanāvīthiyā paṭipādanato kāyādīsu subhasukhaniccattabhāvavigamane paññāya visesapaccayā satīti vuttaṃ –
tika-s0301t:1301_16: purimapacchimānaṃ dhammānaṃ nirantaratāya ekībhūtānaṃ viya pavatti santatighanatā,
tika-s0301t:1301_25: Sā ca kho “padāletī”ti vuttā lokuttarāva paññā anusayappahānassa adhippetattā.
tika-s0301t:1301_26: Santatighanādibhedanā pana lokiyāpi hoti vipassanāvasena ghanavinibbhogassa nipphādanato.
tika-s0301t:1302_5: na hi lajjanaṃ nibbhayaṃ pāpabhayaṃ vā alajjanaṃ atthīti.
tika-s0301t:1302_7: Tena padesena kasanato visesato naṅgalanti vuccatīti āha “īsā yuganaṅgalaṃ dhāretī”ti.
tika-s0301t:1302_13: Hiripaṭibaddhapaññā paṭipakkhavasena ca asithilabhāvena ca acalā asithilāti āha “abbokiṇṇā ahirikenā”ti.
tika-s0301t:1302_14: Nāḷiyā minamānapuriso viya ārammaṇaṃ munāti paricchedato jānātīti mano.
tika-s0301t:1302_16: Taṃsampayuttoti iminā kuntasahacaraṇato puriso kunto viya manasahacaraṇasamādhi “mano”ti vuttoti dasseti.
tika-s0301t:1302_18: So hi idha balībaddānaṃ sāraṇato pācanato “sārathī”ti adhippeto.
tika-s0301t:1302_21: Tena hi īsādīsu yathārahaṃ bandhitvā ekābaddhesu katesu naṅgalesu kiccaṃ ijjhati,
tika-s0301t:1303_11: Purato cassa gacchatīti assa naṅgalassa kassane bhūmiyā vilikhane purato gacchati pubbaṅgamā hoti.
tika-s0301t:1303_14: Ārammaṇe vā kāyādike upaṭṭhāpayamānā asubhādivasena paññānaṅgalaṃ rakkhati.
tika-s0301t:1303_15: Sabhāvāsabhāvūpagame phālo viya naṅgalassa “ārakkhā”ti vuttā “sabbānatthato sati rakkhatī”ti katvā.
tika-s0301t:1303_17: Cirakatacirabhāsitānaṃ asammussanavasena sati paññānaṅgalassa purato hotīti vatvā tassa puratobhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “sati…pe…
tika-s0301t:1303_22: Saṃsīdituṃ na detīti sakiccakiriyāya saṃsīdanaṃ kātuṃ na deti.
tika-s0301t:1304_1: Āhāre udare yatoti paribhuñjitabbaāhāre saṃyatabhāvadassanena paribhuñjitabbatāya catūsupi paccayesu saṃyatabhāvo dīpitoti āha “āhāramukhenā”tiādi.
tika-s0301t:1304_2: Saṃyatabhāvo cettha paccayahetu anesanābhāvoti vuttaṃ “nirupakkilesoti attho”ti.
tika-s0301t:1304_3: Bhojanasaddo āhāraparibhoge niruḷhoti katvā vuttaṃ “bhojane mattaññutāmukhenā”ti.
tika-s0301t:1304_4: Paribhuñjanaṭṭhena pana bhojanasaddamukhenāti vutte adhippetattho labbhateva.
tika-s0301t:1305_0: Dvīhākārehīti adiṭṭhādīnaṃ adiṭṭhādivasena diṭṭhādīnañca diṭṭhādivasenāti evaṃ dvippakārehi.
tika-s0301t:1306_0: Sīlameva “soracca”nti vuttaṃ “pāṇātipātādīhi suṭṭhu oratassa kamma”nti katvā.
tika-s0301t:1306_1: Saṅkhāradukkhādīnaṃ abhāvato sundarabhāvato sundare nibbāne ārammaṇakaraṇavasena ratattā surato, arahā.
tika-s0301t:1307_0: Yadaggena vipassanāya paññāya taṃsahagatavīriyassa ca naṅgaladhorayhatā,
tika-s0301t:1307_3: tathāpavattakusalabhāvanāya ca kasibhāvo veditabboti dassento “yathā hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t:1307_6: Vahitabbā ādibhūtā dhurā etesaṃ atthīti dhurā,
tika-s0301t:1307_9: Dhurā ca dhorayhā ca dhuradhorayhaṃ ekattavasena.
tika-s0301t:1308_10: Sabbakilese avasiṭṭhasabbakilese pajahantaṃ anivattantaṃ gacchati puna pahātabbatāya abhāvato.
tika-s0301t:1309_3: Paññānaṅgalena satiphālaṃ ākoṭetvāti paññāsaṅkhātena naṅgalena saddhiṃ satiphālassa ekābaddhabhāvakaraṇena ākoṭetvā.
tika-s0301t:1309_4: Kaṭṭhāti ettha “kasī”ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ “kaṭṭhā kasī”ti.
tika-s0301t:1309_6: Yadipi pubbe “paññā me yuganaṅgala”ntiādinā attuddesikavasenāyaṃ amatapphalā kasi dassitā,
tika-s0301t:1309_7: mahākāruṇikassa pana bhagavato desanā sabbassapi sattanikāyassa sādhāraṇā evāti dassento “sā kho panesā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t:1310_2: saddena kathāpariyosāne pāṭhapadeso gahitoti tadaññaṃ “evaṃ vutte”tiādipāṭhaṃ sandhāya “tato parañcā”ti āha.
tika-s0301t:1313_1: Etaṃ vuttanti “odanena pūresī”ti etaṃ vacanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1313_2: “Gahetuṃ samattho nāma nāhosīti bhagavato adhiṭṭhānabalenā”ti vadanti.
tika-s0301t:1313_3: Taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vinetukāmatāya kira bhagavā tathā akāsi.
tika-s0301t:1314_1: Avatvāva nivatto “abbhāgatopi pāsaṇḍo vācāmattenapi na pūjetabbo”ti brāhmaṇadhamme vuttattā.
tika-s0301t:1314_2: Pakkantoti brāhmaṇassa dhammaṃ avatvā pakkanto brāhmaṇassa na tāva ñāṇaṃ paripakkanti.
tika-s0301t:1314_4: magamāsi “punappunañceva vapanti bīja”ntiādinā dhammaṃ kathetuṃ avassaṃ ākaṅkhanto.
tika-s0301t:1315_0: “Punappunañceva vapanti bīja”nti imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhīti sambandho.
tika-s0301t:1316_1: dasseti brāhmaṇena vuttaṃ ayuttavacanaṃ parivaṭṭentopi divase divase bhikkhācariyā nāma bhikkhūnaṃ kāyagatā vuttīti.
tika-s0301t:1316_8: “Punappuna”nti vacanaṃ upādāya bījavapanādayo punappunadhammā nāma jātāti āha “soḷasa punappunadhamme desentenā”ti.
tika-s0301t:1319_6: Tasmāti yasmā tassa uṇhodakavikkiṇanacariyāya jīvikākappanaṃ hoti, tasmā.
tika-s0301t:1320_0: Vattametaṃ tassa patikāratthaṃ parikathādīnampi kātuṃ labbhanato.
tika-s0301t:1320_1: Idāni tattha kāraṇampi savisayaṃ dassetuṃ “vaṇṇaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1320_2: Bhagavā hi āyasmato upavāṇassa devahitabrāhmaṇassa taṃ sambhāvitaṃ bhavissati tikicchāpaṭiyattaṃ,
tika-s0301t:1320_4: tappasaṅgena ca devahitabrāhmaṇo mama santikaṃ āgantvā dhammassavanena saraṇesu sīlesu ca patiṭṭhahissatīti sabbamidaṃ ñatvā evaṃ “iṅgha me tvaṃ, upavāṇa,
tika-s0301t:1320_6: Āgamanīyappaṭipadaṃ pubbabhāgappaṭipadaṃ pubbabhāgappaṭipattiṃ kathetuṃ vaṭṭati anuttarimanussadhammattā.
tika-s0301t:1321_0: Ettakenapīti upasaṅkamanādinā ettakena appamattakenapi katavattena ayaṃ kitti…pe… somanassajāto.
tika-s0301t:1322_1: Dakkhiṇāya ijjhanaṃ nāma vipulaphalabhāvoti āha “mahapphalo hotī”ti.
tika-s0301t:1322_6: Brāhmaṇena attanā kato kāro ca bhagavato eva paccupaṭṭhātīti taṃ dassento “iminā khīṇāsave yajanākārena yajantassā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1325_1: Yasmā tassa brāhmaṇassa anissayassa jiṇṇabhāvena visesato kāyo lūkho jāto,
tika-s0301t:1325_4: Pāṭiyekkanti puttesu ekameko ekamekāya vācāya visuṃ visuṃ.
tika-s0301t:1326_0: Sampucchanaṃ nāma idha sammantananti āha “saddhiṃ mantayitvā”ti.
tika-s0301t:1327_1: So pana yasmā purime dve vaye atikkamavasena gato.
tika-s0301t:1328_0: Nipparibhogoti jiṇṇabhāvena javaparakkamahāniyā aparibhogo na bhuñjitabbo.
tika-s0301t:1328_1: Khādanā apanīyatīti yavasaṃ adadantā tato nīharanti nāma.
tika-s0301t:1330_1: Udake patiṭṭhaṃ labhati tattha patiṭṭhato thirapatiṭṭhabhāvato.
tika-s0301t:1330_2: Addhapatiṭṭho hi daṇḍo daṇḍadharapurisassa patiṭṭhaṃ labhāpeti.
tika-s0301t:1331_1: Pāṭiyekkanti “asukassa gehe asukassa gehe”ti evaṃ uddesikaṃ katvā visuṃ visuṃ.
tika-s0301t:1331_3: amhākaṃ ruccanaṭṭhānamevāti tava puttānaṃ gehesu yaṃ amhākaṃ ruccanaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1331_4: Tatthameva gamissāmāti sabbesampi etesaṃ anuggahaṃ kātukāmo bhagavā evamāha.
tika-s0301t:1332_1: Yadatthaṃ mayaṃ imassa brāhmaṇassa mahāsampattidānādinā anuggaho kato,
tika-s0301t:1332_2: so cassa puttaparijanassapi attho siddhoti satthā na sabbakālaṃ tassa brāhmaṇassa puttānaṃ gehaṃ agamāsi,
tika-s0301t:1332_3: te eva pana kālena kālaṃ satthu santikaṃ gantvā yathāvibhavaṃ sakkārasammānaṃ akaṃsūti adhippāyo.
tika-s0301t:1335_1: Mānena thaddhoti “ayaṃ kho”tiādinā paggahitena mānena thaddho bajjhitacitto thaddhaayosalāko viya kassacipi anonato.
tika-s0301t:1335_2: Na kiñci jānāti loke paṭisanthāramattassapi ajānanato.
tika-s0301t:1336_2: Abhūtapubbāyāti yā tassā parisāya vitti tadā bhūtā,
tika-s0301t:1336_7: Apacitāti paramanipaccena pūjanīyasāmaññato tattha attano pakkhipanaṃ idha desanākosallaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1339_1: “Sabbaṃ seta”nti kenaci vutte tassa paccanīkaṃ karontasseva assa brāhmaṇassa.
tika-s0301t:1339_3: Suṇātīti atthoti “suṇātī”ti kiriyāpadaṃ āharitvā gāthāya attho veditabbo “jaññā subhāsita”nti vuttattā.
tika-s0301t:1339_4: Na hi asutvā desitaṃ jānituṃ sakkonti.
tika-s0301t:1342_8: taṃ maggañāṇapharasunā samādhimayasilāyaṃ sunisitena sabbaso ucchinnamūlaṃ,
tika-s0301t:1345_1: Dhammantevāsikāti kiñcipi dhanaṃ adatvā kevalaṃ antevāsikā.
tika-s0301t:1345_4: tadā himapiṇḍasinnabhāvena mayūrayānehi patiṭṭhātuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya ca gambhīrabhāve.
tika-s0301t:1346_2: Atisundaraṃ vatāti evaṃ sante nāma araññe evaṃ niccalakāyo nisinno jhāyanto ativiya sundarañca jhānaṃ jhāyasīti vadati.
tika-s0301t:1348_1: “kasmā bhava”ntiādinā pana tadaññavisesākaṅkhaṃ pucchatīti āha “aparenapi ākārena pucchatī”ti.
tika-s0301t:1349_1: Anekasabhāvesūti rūpādivasena ajjhattikādivasena evaṃ nānāsabhāvesu ārammaṇesu.
tika-s0301t:1350_2: tassa hi vasena eva nānāsabhāvesu bhagavā samantacakkhunā passatīti “sabbe…pe…
tika-s0301t:1353_3: Sagge hi nibbattanto kammaphalena dhammatāvasena paṭisandhikālato paṭṭhāya abhirativasena abhiramati eva nāmāti.
tika-s0301t:1356_4: Taṃ pana anavasesato pajahananti āha “aggamaggena jahitvā”ti.
tika-s0301t:1359_2: Tathābhūto ca tamatthaṃ nikāmento nāma hotīti vuttaṃ “icchati patthetī”ti. Sādhu,
tika-s0301t:1359_5: na abhinandanatthoti “āyācamāno āhā”ti vatvā āyācane kāraṇaṃ dassento “therassa kirā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t:1359_13: tasmā dve atthavaseti dve atthe dve kāraṇānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1362_6: Ujukameva āgacchati lokagganāyako bhagavā sabbasattuttamo attano uttaritarassa abhāvato lokassa apacitiṃ na dasseti.
tika-s0301t:1371_3: Taṃ kira bhūmirāmaṇeyyakabhāvena manuññatāya padhānayuttatādisampattiyā ca itaracetiyehi seṭṭhasammataṃ.
tika-s0301t:1371_6: Ohīnakoti theresu gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhesu vihāre eva avahīnako ṭhito.
tika-s0301t:1371_13: Dhammo vāti mama citte uppajjanakato añño dhammo vā.
tika-s0301t:1371_14: Yena kāraṇena paro anabhiratiṃ vinodetvā idāneva abhiratiṃ uppādeyya,
tika-s0301t:1372_13: Neva maṃ byādhayissanti neva maṃ nijjhāyissanti.
tika-s0301t:1372_15: Dhamme samhīti sake santike patiṭṭhite sāsanadhamme.
tika-s0301t:1373_0: Magganti “maggo”ti vattabbe liṅgavipallāsena vuttaṃ. Tenāha “so hi nibbānassa pubbabhāgamagggo”ti.
tika-s0301t:1376_1: Vihāragaruko kiresa theroti etena thero attano saddhivihārikaṃ vaṅgīsaṃ ovadituṃ anavasaro.
tika-s0301t:1376_2: Tena antarantarā tassa cittaṃ rāgo anuddhaṃsetīti dasseti.
tika-s0301t:1376_3: Sāsane aratinti sīlaparipūraṇe samathavipassanābhāvanāya ca anabhiratiṃ.
tika-s0301t:1376_4: Kāmaguṇesu ca ratinti pañcasu kāmakoṭṭhāsesu assādaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1378_0: Paṭighapadena gandharasā gahitā ghānajivhānaṃ paṭihananavasena pavattanato.
tika-s0301t:1379_3: Puthū adhammavitakkāti rūpavitakkādivasena bahū nānāvitakkā micchāsaṅkappā.
tika-s0301t:1383_4: ekāya pāḷiyā sati pāḷigatiyā tathā tathā upaṭṭhānampi nesaṃ natthīti vadati.
tika-s0301t:1383_8: Hīḷanavasena abhibhavitvā paṭibhānasutena attānaṃ pasaṃsati sambhāveti.
tika-s0301t:1383_14: Nissesaṃ navavidhanti navavidhampi mānaṃ kassaci ekadesassapi asesato.
tika-s0301t:1386_1: Rāgoti ettha āyasmato vaṅgīsassa rāgassa uppattiyā kāraṇaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “āyasmā ānando”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1386_5: rūpādiekekameva vā chaḷārammaṇaṃ aniccadukkhādito pariggaṇhituṃ paricchijja jānituṃ.
tika-s0301t:1387_4: Ettha ca iṭṭhārammaṇasīsena tattha iṭṭhākāraggahaṇaṃ vadati.
tika-s0301t:1387_9: sā ca nesaṃ paratā aniccadassanena pākaṭā hotīti vuttaṃ “parato passāti aniccato passā”ti.
tika-s0301t:1387_10: Kāmaṃ vipassanā saṅkhāranimittaṃ na pariccajati saṅkhāre ārabbha vattanato,
tika-s0301t:1387_11: yesaṃ pana nimittānaṃ aggahaṇena animittāti gahituṃ arahati,
tika-s0301t:1387_20: Rāgādisantatāyāti rāgādīnaṃ samucchedavasena paṭippassaddhivasena vūpasametabbato santabhāvena.
tika-s0301t:1390_1: Aṅgīyanti hetubhāvena āgamabhāvena avayavabhāvena vā ñāyantīti aṅgāni, kāraṇāni,
tika-s0301t:1390_4: Viratiyo subhāsitavācāya pubbaṃ patiṭṭhitā hontīti musāvādāveramaṇiādayo tassā visesahetūti āha “musāvādā…pe…
tika-s0301t:1390_7: tasmā vacīsucaritasamudāyassa saccavācādayo aṅgabhūtāti āha “saccavacanādayo cattāro avayavā”ti.
tika-s0301t:1390_10: Vācā hi tāya viratiyā sammā anurūpato āgatā pavattāti “samannāgatā”ti vuccati.
tika-s0301t:1390_13: Sahajātāpi hi cetanā yathāsamādinnāya viratiyā sammā anurūpato yuttāti vattuṃ arahati.
tika-s0301t:1391_2: Viññatti pana vuccati etāyāti vācā nāma,
tika-s0301t:1391_4: Na sā idha adhippetāti sā cetanāvācā viññattivācā viya idha imasmiṃ sutte na adhippetā “subhāsitā hotī”ti vacanato.
tika-s0301t:1391_6: Suṭṭhu bhāsitāti sammā ñāyena bhāsitā vacīsucaritabhāvato.
tika-s0301t:1391_10: Rāgadosādivinimuttañhi taṃ bhāsato anurodhavirodhavivajjanato agatigamanaṃ dūrasamugghāṭitamevāti.
tika-s0301t:1392_4: “dhammaṃyeva bhāsatī”tiādinā pana adhammadosādirahitāya vācāya vuccamānattā idhāpi subhāsitā vācā adhippetāti.
tika-s0301t:1392_5: “Subhāsitaṃyevā”ti avadhāraṇena nivattitaṃ sarūpato dasseti “no dubbhāsita”nti iminā.
tika-s0301t:1392_9: “Subhāsita”nti vā iminā catubbidhaṃ vacīsucaritaṃ gahitanti “no dubbhāsitanti iminā micchāvācappahānaṃ dīpetī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1392_11: Tena parabhedanādikaṃ asabbhādikañca bodhisattānaṃ vacanaṃ apisuṇādivisayanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1392_12: Bhāsitabbavacanalakkhaṇanti bhāsitabbassa vacanassa sabhāvalakkhaṇaṃ dīpetīti ānetvā sambandho.
tika-s0301t:1392_13: Yadi evaṃ nanu abhāsitabbaṃ paṭhamaṃ vatvā bhāsitabbaṃ pacchā vattabbaṃ yathā “vāmaṃ muñca,
tika-s0301t:1393_1: Dhammato anapetanti attano paresañca hitasukhāvahadhammato anapetaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1393_3: Paññavā avikiṇṇavāco hi na ca anatthāvahaṃ vācaṃ bhāsati.
tika-s0301t:1393_8: Aññeti ito bāhirakā ñāyavādino akkharacintakā ca.
tika-s0301t:1393_13: Kattā sampadānaṃ apādānaṃ karaṇaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ kammañca kārakaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1393_14: Sampattīhi samannāgatanti ete avayavādike sampādetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1393_15: Taṃ paṭisedhetīti taṃ yathāvuttavisesampi vācaṃ “imehi kho”ti vadanto bhagavā paṭisedheti. Kho-
tika-s0301t:1393_21: Arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsūti saṃsāre ativiya sañjātasaṃvegā tannissaraṇe ninnapoṇamānasā hutvā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
tika-s0301t:1396_0: Jarāya parimadditanti yathā hatthacaraṇādiaṅgāni sithilāni honti,
tika-s0301t:1396_6: parehi vuṭṭhāpanīyasaṃvesanīyatā punadeva bālabhāvappatti ca honti,
tika-s0301t:1396_9: Milātachavicammanissitanti jiṇṇabhāvena appamaṃsalohitattā milātehi gatayobbanehi dhammehi sannissitaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1396_10: Ghāsamāmisanti ghāsabhūtaṃ āmisaṃ maccunā gilitvā viya patiṭṭhapetabbato.
tika-s0301t:1397_1: Na tāpeyyāti cittañca kāyañca na tāpeyya.
tika-s0301t:1397_2: Tāpanā cettha sampati āyati ca visādanā.
tika-s0301t:1399_0: Patiṭṭhitāti niccalabhāvena aṭṭhiṃ katvā paccayāyattabhāvato avisaṃvādanakā.
tika-s0301t:1399_1: Ubhayathā paṭipattiṃ āha “attano ca paresañca atthe patiṭṭhitā”ti.
tika-s0301t:1399_2: Atthe diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikādihite patiṭṭhitattā eva dhamme avihiṃsādidhamme patiṭṭhitā.
tika-s0301t:1400_4: tasmā sā sabbavācānaṃ uttamāti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0301t:1403_1: Vākkaraṇacāturiyato vacanaguṇahetūnaṃ pūriyā pūre bhavāti porī,
tika-s0301t:1404_1: vitthārenapi bhāsatī”ti nayidaṃ paṭhamaṃ uddisitvā tassa atthassa kittanavasena pavattitaṃ vacanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1404_3: Yā pana desanā kadāci dhammapaṭiggāhakānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena saṃkhitteneva dassetvā nikkhipati,
tika-s0301t:1404_7: Sabhāvamadhuro paccayavasena madhurataro hotīti dassetuṃ “yathā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1404_8: Vividhākāraṃ katvā dhammaṃ kathetuṃ paṭibhātīti paṭibhānaṃ,
tika-s0301t:1407_1: Tasmiṃ ahūti tasmiṃ ahanīti āha “tasmiṃ divase”ti.
tika-s0301t:1407_3: Sāsanikasīlena bāhirakaanasanena vā upetā hutvāti yojanā. Vā-
tika-s0301t:1407_5: Pakārehi diṭṭhādīhi vāreti kāyakammādike sarāpeti gārayhe karoti etāyāti pavāraṇā,
tika-s0301t:1407_7: Yasmā yebhuyyena vassaṃvuṭṭhehi kātabbā esā visuddhidesanā,
tika-s0301t:1407_10: Tadā tassa bhikkhusaṅghassa tuṇhībhāvassa anavasesatāyapi vaṇṇaṃ dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ “tuṇhībhūta”nti vuttanti āha “yato yato…pe…
tika-s0301t:1408_3: me kiñci kiriyaṃ vā vācasikaṃ vā na garahatha,
tika-s0301t:1408_9: Kiṃ nu taṃ avisuddhanti siyā kassaci puthujjanassa āsaṅkā?
tika-s0301t:1409_0: Kāyavacīsamācāraparisuddhiyā paveditāya manosamācāraparisuddhi atthato paveditāva hotīti “kāyikaṃ vā vācasikaṃ vā”iccevāha.
tika-s0301t:1409_1: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “kāyikaṃ vā vācasikaṃ vāti idaṃ catunnaṃ arakkhiyataṃ sandhāya thero āhā”ti.
tika-s0301t:1409_3: pavāremi vo”ti bhikkhusaṅghavisayattā pavāraṇāya tattha bhikkhusaṅghena vattabbaṃ paṭivacanaṃ dento dhammasenāpati
tika-s0301t:1410_5: Sasantāne pana paccekabuddhānaṃ vasena na uppāditoti na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-s0301t:1410_7: Bhagavato sīlādayo guṇāti buddhabhūtassa guṇā adhippetāti āha “arahattamaggameva nissāya āgatā”ti.
tika-s0301t:1411_0: Yaṃ attano puññānubhāvasiddhaṃ cakkaratanaṃ nippariyāyato tena pavattitaṃ nāma,
tika-s0301t:1411_3: paṭhamanayo ca taṃsadise tabbohāravasena vuttoti taṃ anādiyitvā dutiyanayo vutto.
tika-s0301t:1411_13: Tattha gahapatike pakkhijāte ca visuṃ katvā gahaṇavasena dvādasavidhaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1411_16: tadanurūpakaṃ pana ñāyena yuttakena pavattitaṃ nāma hotīti āha “sammā nayena hetunā kāraṇenā”ti.
tika-s0301t:1411_17: Ubhatobhāgavimuttāti ubhayabhāgehi ubhayabhāgato vimuttāti ayamettha atthoti dasseti “dvīhi bhāgehi vimuttā, arūpā…pe…
tika-s0301t:1411_20: Paññāvimuttā hi taṃ tividhaṃ appattā kevalaṃ paññāya eva vimuttā.
tika-s0301t:1412_1: Saṃyojanaṭṭhena saṃyojanasaṅkhāte ceva bandhanaṭṭhena bandhanasaṅkhāte ca.
tika-s0301t:1412_2: Vijitasaṅgāmanti yathā rāgādayo puna na sīsaṃ ukkhipanti,
tika-s0301t:1415_1: Sahassato paraṃ aḍḍhateyyabhikkhusataṃ tadā bhagavantaṃ payirupāsatīti āha “parosahassanti atirekasahassa”nti.
tika-s0301t:1415_2: Nibbāne kutoci bhayaṃ natthīti kutocipi kāraṇato nibbāne bhayaṃ natthi asaṅkhatabhāvena sabbaso khemattā.
tika-s0301t:1415_7: Na kutoci bhayaṃ etasmiṃ adhigateti akutobhayaṃ, nibbānaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1415_9: Vipassito paṭṭhāyāti amhākaṃ bhagavato nāmavasena isīnaṃ sattamabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1415_10: Te hi tattha tattha sutte bahuso kittitā.
tika-s0301t:1415_11: Isīnanti vā paccekabuddhasāvakabāhirakaisīnaṃ sattamo uttaro seṭṭhoti attho.
tika-s0301t:1417_0: Kilesummujjanasatānīti rāgādikilesānaṃ rajjanadussanādinayehi savisaye ayoniso uṭṭhānāni.
tika-s0301t:1422_2: koṇḍañño”ti satthu vacanaṃ nissāya bhikkhūhi aññehi koṇḍaññanāmakehi visesanatthaṃ evaṃgahitanāmo.
tika-s0301t:1422_7: imasmiṃ cakkavāḷe devamanussānañcāti evaṃ dasasahassacakkavāḷe devamanussāna”nti vadanti.
tika-s0301t:1423_3: Pāmokkhabhūto āyasmā thero antarantarā tattha tattha janapade vasitvā tadanukkamena mandākinitīraṃ upagato,
tika-s0301t:1424_0: Ānubhāvasampannā dibbāyukā te hatthināgāti vuttaṃ “pubbe paccekabuddhānaṃ pāricariyāya kataparicayā”ti.
tika-s0301t:1424_2: Mukhodakañceva dantakaṭṭhañca ṭhapetīti saḷaladevadārukaṭṭhādīni aññamaññaṃ ghaṃsitvā aggiṃ nibbattetvā
tika-s0301t:1424_3: jāletvā tattha pāsāṇakhaṇḍāni tāpetvā tāni daṇḍakehi vaṭṭetvā taḷākāsu udakasoṇḍīsu khipitvā udakassa
tika-s0301t:1424_4: tattabhāvaṃ ñatvā nāgalatādantakaṭṭhaṃ upanento mukhodakañca ṭhapeti.
tika-s0301t:1424_5: Vattaṃ karotīti antokuṭiyā bahi ca pamukhepi aṅgaṇepi sākhābhaṅgehi sammajjanto vakkhamānanayena āhāraṃ upanento vattaṃ karoti.
tika-s0301t:1425_1: ayameva vā pāṭho tāva mahantamevāti yāva mahantaṃ setapadumavanaṃ,
tika-s0301t:1426_2: Keci na sañjānanti ye navā acirapabbajitā.
tika-s0301t:1427_5: Parisā sannisīdi nissaddabhāvena tuṇhī ahosīti attho.
tika-s0301t:1427_6: Anujānāpesīti paṭhamaṃ attanā ñātaṃ upaṭṭhitaṃ attano parinibbānakālaṃ anu pacchā satthāraṃ jānāpesīti evaṃ ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0301t:1428_1: yaṃ vā dukkaracariyāyaṃ tumhākaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ ādito dassanaṃ, taṃ, bhante,
tika-s0301t:1428_3: Onatavinatāti heṭṭhā upari ca onatā vinatā.
tika-s0301t:1428_4: Kampetvāti thokaṃ cāletvā dassanatthaṃ ekaninnādo tesaṃ hatthināgānañceva nāgayakkhakumbhaṇḍānaṃ devatānañca saddena.
tika-s0301t:1429_0: Sajjhāyamakaṃsu pasādanīyesu pasādavasena sannipatitaparisāya pasādajananatthaṃ bhagavati nikkhamitvāti bhagavati gandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā.
tika-s0301t:1432_1: Paccavekkhatīti tesaṃ ariyānaṃ cittaṃ attano ñāṇacakkhunā pati avekkhati paccavekkhati.
tika-s0301t:1432_3: Dukkhapāraṃ gatanti vaṭṭadukkhassa pāraṃ pariyantaṃ gataṃ.
tika-s0301t:1432_4: Sabbaguṇasampannanti sabbehi buddhaguṇehi ca sāvakaguṇehi ca paripuṇṇaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1432_5: Anekākārasampannanti rūpaghosalūkhadhammappamāṇikānaṃ sattānaṃ tehi tehi ākārehi sabbesañca anekehi anantāparimeyyehi pasīditabbākārehi samannāgataṃ.
tika-s0301t:1432_6: Te pana ākārā yasmā anaññasādhāraṇā buddhaguṇā eva,
tika-s0301t:1438_3: evāhampi tena jambunā paññāyissa”nti jambusākhaṃ pariharitvā.
tika-s0301t:1438_4: Vādaṃ katvāti “imasmiṃ vāde sace te parājayo hoti,
tika-s0301t:1438_7: ahaṃ te bhariyā”ti evaṃ katikaṃ katvā.
tika-s0301t:1438_8: Vāde jayaparājayānubhāvenāti tathāpavattite vāde paribbājakassa jayānubhāvena ceva attano parājayena ca.
tika-s0301t:1439_0: Nibbattagativibhāvanavasena chavasīsabhāvaṃ dūseti vināsetīti chavadūsakaṃ sippaṃ,
tika-s0301t:1439_2: Attano ānubhāvenāti niraye nibbattasattassa sīsaṃ yattha katthaci ṭhitaṃ buddhānubhāvena ānetvā dassetvā.
tika-s0301t:1439_3: Khīṇāsavassa sīsanti paramappicchatāya kañcipi ajānāpetvā araññaṃ pavisitvā parinibbutassa khīṇāsavassa chaḍḍitaṃ sīsakaṭāhaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1440_2: jānāthā”ti kāmaṃ vaṅgīso nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya pucchati,
tika-s0301t:1440_7: Vaṅgīso sayaṃ mantabalena gatipariyāpannassa gatiṃ jānanto bhagavantampi “ayampi tathā”ti maññamāno “mantena jānāsi,
tika-s0301t:1440_9: Bhagavā attano buddhañāṇameva mantaṃ katvā dīpento “āma, vaṅgīsa,
tika-s0301t:1440_15: arahattaṃ pāpuṇīti iminā vaṅgīsatthero pabbajitvā na cirasseva sukhāya paṭipadāya arahattaṃ patto viya dissati,
tika-s0301t:1440_17: āyatiṃ thero pabbajitvā samathavipassanāsu kammaṃ ārabhitvāpi dukkhāya paṭipadāya tādisaṃ kālaṃ vītināmetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tenāha –
tika-s0301t:1444_0: Vimuttisukhanti sabbaso kilesavimuttiyaṃ nibbāne ca uppannaṃ sampatiarahattaphalasukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedentoti
tika-s0301t:1444_1: yathāparicchinnaṃ kālaṃ pati sammadeva vedento anubhavanto.
tika-s0301t:1444_6: Ye niyāmagataddasāti ye bhikkhū ariyā buddhānaṃ sāvakā phalaṭṭhabhāvena niyāmagatā ceva maggaṭṭhabhāvena niyāmadasā ca.
tika-s0301t:1444_8: Suāgamananti mama imassa satthuno santike āgamanaṃ upagamanaṃ,
tika-s0301t:1444_9: imasmiñca dhammavinaye āgamanaṃ pabbajanaṃ upasampadā sundaraṃ āgamanaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1444_11: Avuttampi gāthāya atthato gahitameva therassa chaḷabhiññabhāvato.
tika-s0301t:1452_2: Tathābhūtā naṃ kilesasaṅgaṇikādito vivecetukāmā nāma hotīti vuttaṃ “vivekaṃ paṭipajjāpetukāmā”ti.
tika-s0301t:1452_6: Tvaṃ janoti tvaṃ attano kilesehi jananato visuṃ jāto tādise eva aññasmiṃ jane imaṃ ayonisomanasikāravasena
tika-s0301t:1452_8: Sataṃ taṃ sārayāmaseti niyyānikasāsane pabbajitvā satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññavāsena ca
tika-s0301t:1452_9: satimantaṃ paṇḍitaṃ taṃ mayampi yathāuppannaṃ vitakkaṃ vinodanāya sārayāma,
tika-s0301t:1452_10: sataṃ vā sappurisānaṃ kilesavigamanadhammaṃ paṭipajjitvā vasantaṃ taṃ sārayāma vaṭṭadukkhaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1452_13: Mā avaharīti heṭṭhā duggatisotaṃ mā upanesi.
tika-s0301t:1455_0: 222. Kāyadaratho hotiyeva niyamena, na cittadaratho tassa maggeneva samugghāṭitattā.
tika-s0301t:1456_2: Upariṭṭhatāya parito dīghaputhulatāya ativiya vijjhatīti sattisallaggahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1456_4: Avijjāya pana sammohāpādanena dukkhāpādanena ca visasadisatā.
tika-s0301t:1456_5: Ruppatoti vikāraṃ āpādiyamānassa pīḷiyamānassāti atthoti āha “ghaṭṭiyamānassā”ti.
tika-s0301t:1457_0: Pabbajitanti sasantānato pabbajitaṃ vā rāgādimalato pabbajitaṃ vā.
tika-s0301t:1457_2: tasmā ayaṃ idāni vuccamāno ettha gāthāya attho.
tika-s0301t:1457_6: Vinayāti hetumhi nissakkavacananti tassa hetumhi karaṇavacanena atthamāha “vinayenā”ti.
tika-s0301t:1460_5: Satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā tassa janapadassa sulabhabhikkhatāya tattha gantvā viharatīti imamatthaṃ
tika-s0301t:1460_8: Ṭhatvāti padānubandhanavasena gamanaṃ upacchinditvā therassa āsannaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā.
tika-s0301t:1460_10: Aṅguṭṭhakaṃ jālāpesīti adhiṭṭhānabalena daṇḍadīpikaṃ viya attano aṅguṭṭhakaṃ jālāpesi.
tika-s0301t:1460_12: Kaṇṇehipi suṇāti tena vuccamānaṃ dhammaṃ ekadesena.
tika-s0301t:1461_3: iminā dukkhanti evaṃ samācaramānena kāraṇaṃ jānituṃ samatthena kammassakatañāṇasampayuttacittenāti attho.
tika-s0301t:1461_10: Vīriyaṃ paggayhāti catubbidhaṃ sammappadhānaṃ vīriyaṃ paggaṇhitvā.
tika-s0301t:1465_4: Natthi etesaṃ nikebhaṃ nibaddhanivāsaṭṭhānanti aniketā tenāha “agehā”ti.
tika-s0301t:1468_2: Bhikkhunā nāma upagatānaṃ upanisinnakathāmattaṃ vatvā ganthadhurehi vāsadhurehi vā yuttapayuttacittena bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-s0301t:1468_4: Thero pana tadā kenaci kāraṇena bahuvelaṃ gihisaññattibahulo ahosi,
tika-s0301t:1468_7: Tanti taṃ tādisaṃ saññāpanaṃ sandhāya etaṃ “ativelaṃ gihisaññattibahulo”ti vacanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1468_8: Bhikkhusaṅghassa kathaṃ sutvāti saṅghassa majjhe nisīditvā therena kathitattā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1469_1: Taṃ pana tattha ajjhogāhanaṃ hotīti āha “pavisitvā”ti.
tika-s0301t:1469_2: Saṅkhāradukkhato nibbinnahadayassa sabbasaṅkhāravinissaṭaṃ nibbānaṃ yāthāvato paccavekkhantassa sammadeva
tika-s0301t:1469_3: samassāsakaraṃ hutvā upaṭṭhahantaṃ taṃ upari adhigamāya ussukkaṃ karonto nibbānaṃ hadaye nikkhipati nāmāti āha –
tika-s0301t:1469_9: ayaṃ pana gihisaññattikathā therassa attano sāmaññatthaasādhanato devatāya biḷikā viyāti biḷibiḷikāti vuttā.
tika-s0301t:1472_3: Aggamahesīti kāci paricārikā devadhītā cittapaṇidhānamattena idānipi devakāye bhavissati upacitakusaladhammattāti
tika-s0301t:1472_4: maññamānā tasmiṃ vattamānaṃ viya kathentī “sobhasī”ti āha.
tika-s0301t:1472_5: Evaṃ atītampissa dibbasotaṃ paccuppannaṃ viya maññeyya nāticirakālattāti dassento “pubbepi sobhasī”ti āha.
tika-s0301t:1473_1: Aṭṭhahi kāraṇehīti cirakālaparibhāvanāya viruḷhamūlehi ayonisomanasikārādipaccayamūlakehi vuccamānehi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi.
tika-s0301t:1473_2: Ratto rāgavasenāti sabhāvato saṅkappato ca yathāsamīhite iṭṭhākāre sakkāye sañjātarāgavasā ratto giddho gadhito.
tika-s0301t:1473_4: Duṭṭho dosavasenāti sabhāvato saṅkappato ca yathāsamīhite aniṭṭhākāre sakkāye sañjātadosavasena duṭṭho rupitacitto.
tika-s0301t:1473_6: Vinibaddhoti ahaṃkārena visesato nibandhanato mānavatthusmiṃ bandhito.
tika-s0301t:1473_11: Anusayavasenāti maggena appahīnatāya anu anu santāne sayanavasena.
tika-s0301t:1473_17: Evaṃ patiṭṭhitāvāti yathāvuttanayena rattabhāvādinā sakkāyasmiṃ patiṭṭhitā eva.
tika-s0301t:1474_0: Paṭigantunti apekkhāvasena tato apagantuṃ apekkhaṃ vissajjetuṃ.
tika-s0301t:1474_3: Sūciṃ yojetvāti sibbanasuttena sūciṃ yojetvā pāse ca pavesetvā.
tika-s0301t:1474_9: Devatānaṃ uttarimanussadhammārocane doso natthīti tāsaṃ puna anāgamanatthaṃ arahattaṃ byākāsi.
tika-s0301t:1477_6: Majjhanhike vītivatteti gihisaṃsaggavasena kālaṃ vītināmento majjhanhe bahuvītivatte.
tika-s0301t:1477_9: Bhāyāmi nāgadattanti tassa paṭipattiṃ bhāyitabbaṃ katvā devatā vadantī paṭipattiyaṃ niyojeti.
tika-s0301t:1480_2: Aññataraṃ kulanti tasmiṃ kule jāyampatiṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0301t:1480_8: Ubhopeteti taṃ bhikkhuñca gharaṇiñca sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0301t:1481_8: Saddena paritassatīti parehi attani payuttamicchāsaddamattena paritassanasīlo.
tika-s0301t:1481_9: Vataṃ na sampajjatīti yathāsamādinnavataṃ lahucittatāya na pāripūriṃ gacchati.
tika-s0301t:1484_2: Sabbaratticāroti chaṇasampattiyā ito cito carantehi anubhavitabbanakkhattamaho.
tika-s0301t:1484_4: Ekābaddhaṃ hotīti yasmā cātumahārājikadevā tasmiṃ divase nakkhattaṃ ghosetvā attano puññānubhāvasiddhāya
tika-s0301t:1484_6: tasmā taṃ tehi ekābaddhaṃ viya hoti.
tika-s0301t:1484_11: Abhāsīti tena saddena ākaḍḍhiyamānahadayo ayoniso ummujjitvā “mahatī vata me jānī”ti anutthunanto abhāsi.
tika-s0301t:1484_14: Devatā paṭhamappitaṃ āṇiṃ paṭāṇiyā nīharantī viya tena bhikkhunā vuttamatthaṃ apanentī “tassa te bahukā
tika-s0301t:1484_18: tasmā tvaṃ “pāpiyo”ti attānaṃ mā maññitthāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0301t:1487_1: Nissaraṇapariyattivasenāti addhā imaṃ pariyattiṃ nissāya vaṭṭadukkhato nissarituṃ labbhāti evaṃ nissaraṇapariyattivasena.
tika-s0301t:1487_6: Arahattaṃ pattadivase paṭipattikittanāya purimadivasesupi tathā paṭipajji,
tika-s0301t:1488_3: Pāḷiyaṃ “bhikkhūhi saṃvasanto”ti iminā tesaṃ dhammassavanatthāyapi dhammo pariyāpuṇitabboti dasseti.
tika-s0301t:1488_6: Jānitvāti pariññābhisamayavasena diṭṭhasutādiṃ yāthāvato jānitvā paṭivijjhitvā.
tika-s0301t:1491_3: tasmā asubhādike subhādivasena manasikāro ayonisomanasikāroti āha “anupāyamanasikārenā”ti.
tika-s0301t:1491_5: Balavapītiñca sukhañcāti nīvaraṇavikkhambhanato balavantaṃ upacārajjhānasahagataṃ pītiñca sukhañca.
tika-s0301t:1494_1: Nandanavaggeti nandanavaggavaṇṇanāyaṃ tattha idhāpi gāthāya visesābhāvato.
tika-s0301t:1494_2: Yadi evaṃ kasmā tattha saṅgītaṃ idha gahitanti?
tika-s0301t:1494_3: Devatāpaṭisaṃyuttataṃ upādāya devatāsaṃyutte saṅgahitampi aṭṭhuppattiyā paṭisaṃyuttattā idha gahitaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1500_1: Gandhārammaṇaṃ upanijjhāyatīti gandhasaṅkhātaṃ ārammaṇaṃ upecca nijjhāyati,
tika-s0301t:1501_0: Ekaṅgametaṃ theyyānanti ārammaṇavasena theyyavatthūsu vibhajiyamānesu ekamaṅgametaṃ gandhārammaṇanti āha “thenitabbāna”ntiādi.
tika-s0301t:1501_1: Ojāpekkhāya theyyāya pavattamānāya dhammārammaṇatāpi tassā siyā,
tika-s0301t:1501_2: sā pana na madhurā theyyakatā cāti “pañcakoṭṭhāsāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1501_3: Kāmañca taṃ gandhārammaṇaṃ kenaci pariggahitaṃ na hotīti ādiyituṃ sakkā,
tika-s0301t:1501_4: satthārā pana ananuññātattā na yutto tassa paribhogo.
tika-s0301t:1501_5: Yaṃ pana tena bhikkhunā vuttaṃ “na harāmi na bhañjāmī”ti,
tika-s0301t:1502_1: Ākiṇṇakammantoti taṇhādiṭṭhiādivasena akusalakammanto diṭṭhimohataṇhādivasena ādito paṭṭhāya kusalakammānaṃ paṭikkhepanato.
tika-s0301t:1512_8: Indassa nivāsaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ kūṭaṃ indakūṭanti yakkhato kūṭena nāmaṃ laddhaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1512_10: Indo yakkhoti kūṭato yakkhena nāmaṃ laddhaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1512_11: Na cettha itarītaranissayadoso aññamaññūpalakkhaṇabhāvato yathā taṃ “kāyakammaṭṭhāna”nti.
tika-s0301t:1512_14: Imaṃ sarīraṃ pecca ayaṃ kinti paṭilabhatīti codeti.
tika-s0301t:1513_0: Kuto āgacchatīti parādhārarūpe jīve attani mātukucchimokkante rūpassa sambhavoti kuto nāma ṭhānato āgacchati.
tika-s0301t:1513_1: Tenāha “imāni ca aṭṭhīni imā ca maṃsapesiyo”tiādi.
tika-s0301t:1513_2: Kathaṃ nvayanti ayaṃ kucchisaṅkhāte gabbhare kathaṃ sajjatīti pucchati.
tika-s0301t:1513_4: dāṭhīnaṃ girigabbhare”tiādinā gabbharo ca kucchivācako āgato.
tika-s0301t:1513_7: Yathā hi macchamaṃsaṃ bhuttaṃ pheṇaṃ viya hutvā vilīyati,
tika-s0301t:1513_9: evamevaṃ yadi mātukucchismiṃ gabbhabhāvena uppannaṃ rūpaṃ satto na bhaveyya no vaḍḍheyya,
tika-s0301t:1513_19: Tassā aṃsūhi tīhi katasuttagge”ti saṃyuttabhāṇakānaṃ adhippāyo.
tika-s0301t:1514_3: Kalalaṃ sampavuccatīti attabhāvo bhūtupādārūpasaṅkhāto santānavasena pavattamāno kalalaṃ nāmāti kathīyati.
tika-s0301t:1515_0: Kalalāti yathāvuttakalalarūpahetu taṃ nissāya paccayaṃ katvā.
tika-s0301t:1516_0: Paripakkanti paripākakalalabhāvato paripākaṃ gataṃ suparipākaṃ gataṃ.
tika-s0301t:1517_1: vaṇṇavasena pana sitā arattāva hotīti vadanti.
tika-s0301t:1517_2: Maṇḍanti dārikānaṃ tathā pīḷanato nibbattamaricapakkassa sārabhūtaṃ rasaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1517_3: Sabbabhāgehi muccatīti so maṇḍo kapāle alaggo hutvā tassa sabbabhāgehi mucchitvā piṇḍito hutvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0301t:1517_4: Evarūpā pesi hotīti sā pesi gabbhāsaye katthaci alaggā yathāvuttamaṇḍo viya piṇḍito hutvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0301t:1518_0: Pesi nibbattatīti ettha pesīti nissakke paccattavacananti āha “tato pesito”ti.
tika-s0301t:1521_1: saddena aṭṭhamasattāhato paṭṭhāya yāva ekacattālīsā catuttiṃsa sattāhāni saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0301t:1521_3: Navamāsato bahi paripakko nāma hoti kesalomādinibbattito.
tika-s0301t:1522_1: Mātuudarapaṭalena ekābaddho hoti yato mātarā paribhuttaāhāro āmāsaye patiṭṭhite gabbhassa nābhināḷānusārena
tika-s0301t:1522_3: Āhārasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpetīti gabbhagatassa kāye ojāya paccayo hoti.
tika-s0301t:1522_4: Sā ca taṃ paccayaṃ labhitvā ojaṭṭhamakaṃ rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
tika-s0301t:1522_5: Evaṃ mātarā paribhuttaāhārapaccayena gabbhagato dasa māse yāpeti attano nābhināḷānusāragateneva tena yāva āhārasamuṭṭhānasattāho,
tika-s0301t:1522_7: Keci pana “mātarā paribhuttaāhāro bāhiravaggo viya tassa kāyaṃ abhisanneti parisanneti,
tika-s0301t:1522_9: Kucchigataṃ udarapaṭalena tirohitattā bahi ṭhitanti vattabbataṃ na arahatīti “kucchiyā abbhantaragato”ti āha.
tika-s0301t:1522_11: Evaṃ khoti iminā yathāvuttākārena ayaṃ satto…pe…
tika-s0301t:1522_14: Na hi diṭṭhigatassa sattāhakkamena vuḍḍhippatto icchito aniccatāpattito.
tika-s0301t:1525_1: Sakkanāmakoti baliputto viya sakkassa vasena gahitanāmo.
tika-s0301t:1525_9: Yena kenaci gahaṭṭhena vā pabbajitena vā.
tika-s0301t:1525_10: Taṃ kāraṇantaraṃ samāgataṃ purisaṃ sappañño sambuddho anukampituṃ nārahati visesādhigamābhāvā,
tika-s0301t:1525_11: sati pana tasmiṃ savisesaṃ pasādo hotīti.
tika-s0301t:1525_13: na tena hoti saṃyutto sinehavasena anukampā anuddayā tassā asaṃkiliṭṭhasabhāvattā.
tika-s0301t:1528_1: Gayāya avidūre bhavo gāmo “gayā”ti vuttoti āha “gayāya”nti,
tika-s0301t:1528_4: Idaṃ upari idaṃ heṭṭhāti natthi uppaṭipāṭiyo mañcapādānaṃ dvīsu passesu dīghabhāvena.
tika-s0301t:1528_5: Balikammatthāya kataṃ devatādhiṭṭhānanti adhippāyena devaṭṭhāne ṭhapenti.
tika-s0301t:1528_8: Apaccattharitvāti kiñci saṅghikasenāsanassa upari paṭicchadanaṃ apaccattharitvā.
tika-s0301t:1528_9: Gavacchivijjhitaṃ viyāti tehi sūcilomehi gavacchijālaṃ viya gataṃ sabbaso samohataṃ.
tika-s0301t:1529_0: Idhāpi “kharasarīro”ti vatvā kharasarīraṃ kathinasūcisadisatāya lomassāti tassa tathābhāvassa kāraṇaṃ dassento “so kirā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t:1529_1: Attano hatthehīti saṅghikatelasammakkhitehi attano sarīraṃ makkhesi.
tika-s0301t:1530_0: Samāgamaṭṭhānanti yakkhasannipātaṭṭhānaṃ. Soti sūcilomo yakkho. Manti ca tameva vadati.
tika-s0301t:1531_1: Apanāmesīti yathā so attano kāyaṃ upanetuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0301t:1531_4: Cittaṃ vā te khipissāmīti mayhaṃ ānubhāvena tava cittavikkhepaṃ vā karissāmi.
tika-s0301t:1531_7: Bheravaṃ vāti vuttākārena aññathā vā bhayānakaṃ dassanamatteneva sattānaṃ bhayaṃ chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃsaṃ uppādetuṃ samatthaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1531_9: Taṃ dvīsu pādesu gahetvā pāraṃ gaṅgāya khipissāmīti yojanā.
tika-s0301t:1532_4: Cittaṃ ossajantīti kusalacittaṃ pavattituṃ appadānavasena purato khipanti.
tika-s0301t:1533_1: Kāmo pana ayonisomanasikāro ca niyakajjhattapariyāpannoti āha “ayaṃ attabhāvo nidānaṃ etesanti itonidānā”tiādi.
tika-s0301t:1533_2: Evamevāti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ kīḷāpasutakumārakā viya micchāvitakkā daṭṭhabbā,
tika-s0301t:1533_3: tesaṃ uppattiṭṭhānabhūto loko viya ayaṃ attabhāvaloko.
tika-s0301t:1533_5: tassa pāde baddhadīghasuttakaṃ viya taṃ dūrānubandhaṃ saṃyojananti evaṃ upamāya saṃsandanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1534_0: Pāpavitakkānaṃ taṃsampayuttakilesānañca taṇhā visesapaccayo tadabhāvena tesaṃ abhāvatoti āha “taṇhāsinehato jātā”ti.
tika-s0301t:1535_3: Vinodanañcettha santānato nīharaṇaṃ bahikaraṇaṃ sabbaso pahānaṃ,
tika-s0301t:1535_4: pahīne ca tasmiṃ kilese oghaṃ tarantīti dassento “duttara”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0301t:1535_5: Etasmiṃ adhigate na puna bhavoti apunabbhavo,
tika-s0301t:1536_0: Tasmiṃyevāti yattha ṭhito “rāgo ca doso cā”tiādinā pañhaṃ pucchi,
tika-s0301t:1536_3: Ñāṇaṃ pesetvāti vipassanāpaṭipāṭiyā nibbānaṃ pati anubodhañāṇaṃ pesetvā pavattetvā.
tika-s0301t:1536_4: Sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhitoti sahassanayapaṭimaṇḍitassa paṭhamamaggassa adhigamena paṭhamaphale patiṭṭhito paṭilabhatīti yojanā.
tika-s0301t:1536_6: Setakaṇḍupīḷakasūciyoti setabhāvaṃ patvā kaṇḍupīḷakā lomasūciyo sabbā anavasesā patitā paribhaṭṭhā apagatā.
tika-s0301t:1539_3: Maṇibhaddo “satimāpuggalo satokārī sampati veraṃ nappasavatī”ti adhippāyena “verā ca parimuccatī”ti āha.
tika-s0301t:1539_4: Bhagavā pana satimantatāsiddhiyā veraparimuccanaṃ na accantikaṃ,
tika-s0301t:1539_5: nāpi ekantikaṃ paṭipakkhena parato ca appahīnattāti taṃ nisedhento “verā ca na parimuccatī”ti vatvā,
tika-s0301t:1539_6: yaṃ accantikaṃ ekantikañca parassa vasena veraparimuccanaṃ,
tika-s0301t:1539_11: Mettaṃsoti mettacittaṃ aṃso eko kusalakoṭṭhāso etassāti mettaṃso.
tika-s0301t:1539_12: Tassa kenacīti tassa arahato karuṇāya mettābhāvanāya ca sātisayattā tadabhāvena kenaci puggalena saddhiṃ verappasaṅgo nāma natthi.
tika-s0301t:1539_13: Iminā khīṇāsavepi mettākaruṇābhāvanārahite koci attano cittadosena veraṃ kareyya,
tika-s0301t:1539_14: na pana tasmiṃ mettākaruṇācetovimuttisamannāgate koci veraṃ kareyya.
tika-s0301t:1542_1: Yakkhena gahito hotīti yakkhena anupaviṭṭho hoti.
tika-s0301t:1542_2: Tassa yakkhagahaṇassa kāraṇaṃ mūlato pabhuti vitthārato dassetuṃ “so”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t:1542_3: Tassa antimabhavikattā ādito paṭṭhāya adhisīlasikkhāya sakkaccaṃ pūraṇanti dasseti “so pabbajitakālato”tiādinā.
tika-s0301t:1542_10: bhikkhu ‘sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo ca assaṃ manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo cā’ti,
tika-s0301t:1543_4: “Pubbe tuyhaṃ putto sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo lajjī kukkuccako sikkhākāmoti sambhāvito,
tika-s0301t:1543_5: idāni tato aññathā jāto”ti ghosanāvasena devatānaṃ antare māheva me lajjaṃ uppādeyya.
tika-s0301t:1544_0: Pāṭihāriyapakkhañcāti cātuddasīpañcadasīaṭṭhamīnaṃ yathākkamaṃ ādito antato ādiantato ca pavesananikkhamanavasena
tika-s0301t:1544_3: Pavesabhūtañhi uposathasīlassa sattamīsu samādinnaṃ sīlaṃ paṭipadaṃ,
tika-s0301t:1544_8: Suṭṭhu samāgatanti suparisuddhaṃ sampannaṃ katvā attano santānaṃ āgataṃ.
tika-s0301t:1544_9: Taṃ pana attano cittena samaṃ pakārehi yuttaṃ hotīti āha “sampayutta”nti.
tika-s0301t:1544_11: “Na te hi yakkhā kīḷantī”ti attano puttassa kāye adhimuccanaṃ attano kīḷanaṃ viya hotīti katvā āha.
tika-s0301t:1546_1: Kilesakāmaṃ pariccajanto eva hi vatthukāme pariccajati nāma.
tika-s0301t:1546_3: Uppabbajitvā vigatasīlassa jīvato ānāpānamattena jīvantopi so matakova.
tika-s0301t:1547_1: Abhidhāvathāti abhidhāvatīti imasmiṃ abhidhāvanakicce bhaddaṃ te hotūti vatvā gihibhāvāya abhidhāvatha.
tika-s0301t:1550_3: Yamakavaggādikā brāhmaṇavaggapariyosānā chabbīsati vaggā etissāti chabbīsativaggā,
tika-s0301t:1550_8: Chaviādīni chetvāti chaviādīni ativijjha ativiya pavisitvā.
tika-s0301t:1551_0: Dhammatāya samādiṇṇanti kassaci santike aggahetvā sayameva tasmiṃ khaṇe saṃyatā homāti yathāsaṃyatā.
tika-s0301t:1551_7: Pisācayakkhayoniyāti pettivisayasadisayakkhayoniyā api nāma muccemāti yojanā.
tika-s0301t:1554_6: Satthu mukhavikārābhāvato pavesānuññaṃ sallakkhentī “nūna ayaṃ katādhikārā bhavissatī”ti anumānasiddhaṃ upanissayaṃ disvā.
tika-s0301t:1555_0: Nibbānārammaṇena ariyamaggena muñciyamānā ganthā “nibbānaṃ āgamma pamuccantī”ti vuttā.
tika-s0301t:1555_1: Velātikkantāti pamāṇato paricchindituṃ na sakkāti āha “pamāṇātikkantā”ti.
tika-s0301t:1555_3: Āsīsanaṃ pemavasena pemavatthuno esanā patthanāva hotīti āha “magganā patthanā”ti.
tika-s0301t:1555_7: Ibharo pana atthavasena vibhattivipariṇāmoti “pāṇineti āharitvā vattabba”nti āha.
tika-s0301t:1556_0: Puttassa anumodanaṃ karontīti puttassa paṭipattianumodanaṃ karontī.
tika-s0301t:1556_1: Uggatāti ettha kalale vaṭṭadukkhe nimujjamānā tato sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ asakkonti ajja buddhānubhāvena paññāsīsaṃ ukkhipitā uggatā.
tika-s0301t:1556_7: Dibbasampattiṃ paṭilabhati pavattiyaṃ sampattidāyino kammassa katokāsattā.
tika-s0301t:1556_9: vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā tassa visesādhigamassa avibandhakaraṇasammāpayogena yathāladdhavisesāya mātuyā vasena yasmā dhītā diṭṭhadhammikasampattilābhī,
tika-s0301t:1559_1: Karaṇīyenāti ettha karaṇīyanti vāṇijjakammaṃ adhippetanti taṃ vivaranto “anāthapiṇḍiko cā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t:1559_3: Tatheva karotīti yathā rājagahaseṭṭhinā sāvatthiṃ gantvā kataṃ,
tika-s0301t:1560_0: Taṃ divasanti yaṃ divasaṃ anāthapiṇḍiko, gahapati,
tika-s0301t:1560_4: Na suṇīti asuṇanto “paṇṇaṃ na suṇī”ti vutto.
tika-s0301t:1560_5: Dhammagāravena hi so seṭṭhi aññaṃ kiccaṃ tiṇāyapi na maññi.
tika-s0301t:1561_4: Buddhagatāya satiyāti aññaṃ kiñci acintetvā buddhagatāya eva satiyā sayanavaragato nipajji.
tika-s0301t:1562_1: Pītiālokoti purimabuddhesu cirakālaṃ paricayaṃ gatassa balavato pasādassa vasena “buddho”ti nāmaṃ savanamattena
tika-s0301t:1562_2: uppannāya uḷārāya pītiyā samuṭṭhāpito vipassanobhāsasadiso sātisayo āloko hoti cittapaccayautusamuṭṭhāno.
tika-s0301t:1563_1: Tā hi seṭṭhissa sampattiṃ paccakkhato passiṃsu.
tika-s0301t:1563_3: Allasarīranti tāvadeva chaḍḍitaṃ acchinnaṃ vā kaḷevaraṃ.
tika-s0301t:1564_5: Eko koṭṭhāsoti yathāvuttaṃ padavītihārapadesaṃ soḷasadhā bhinnassa eko bhāgo.
tika-s0301t:1564_11: Vivaṭṭanissitāya eva ratanattayapūjāya dhammassavanassa sikkhāpadasamādānassa saraṇagamanassa ca atthāya gacchatopi vasena vaṭṭati.
tika-s0301t:1565_6: Atha kho buddhagatāya tikkhavisadasabhāvena sabbaṃ parissayaṃ madditvāpi agamāsīti dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1565_8: tāya yuttako sappurisopi saddhammaguṇavasena sabbaṃ parissayaṃ madditvā pakkhandatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1566_0: Sabbakāmasamiddhatā pariccāgasīlatā uḷārajjhāsayatā paradukkhāpanayakāmatā paresaṃ hitesitā parasampattipamodanāti
tika-s0301t:1566_1: evamādīnaṃ mahāguṇānaṃ vasena niccakālaṃ anāthānaṃ piṇḍadāyakattā “anāthapiṇḍiko”ti evaṃ uppannaṃ nāmaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1567_1: Kilesavūpasamanti sabbaso sabbesaṃ kilesānaṃ vūpasamaṃ aggamaggena patvā.
tika-s0301t:1567_7: dānakathaṃ sīlakathaṃ saggakathaṃ kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ okāraṃ saṃkilesaṃ nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ pakāsesī”ti.
tika-s0301t:1567_9: Cattāri saccāni pakāsesīti yathā mahāseṭṭhi sahassanayapaṭimaṇḍite sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāti,
tika-s0301t:1567_10: evaṃ pavattinivattiyo saha hetunā vibhajanto cattāri ariyasaccāni pakāsesīti.
tika-s0301t:1570_6: saddena madhuviseso vuccatīti āha “gandhamadhupānaṃ pītā viyā”ti.
tika-s0301t:1570_7: Sāmaññajotanā hi visese tiṭṭhatīti gandhamadhūti ca ativiya madhuro madaniyo eko madhuviseso.
tika-s0301t:1571_2: Yaṃ kiñci santapaṇītabhāvāvahaṃ na secananti asecanakaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1571_8: Pivantī viyāti sukkāya bhikkhuniyā upanīyamānaṃ saddhammāmatarasaṃ attano sotañjaliṃ pūretvā odahantīva.
tika-s0301t:1574_1: Bahuṃ vata puññaṃ pasavati sabbaganthavimuttiyā sīlasamannāgatena aggadakkhiṇeyyāya sukkāya theriyā bhojanassa dinnattā.
tika-s0301t:1580_1: Āḷaviyanti itthiliṅgavasena taṃ raṭṭhampi nagarampi vuccati.
tika-s0301t:1580_2: Raṭṭhe adhippetepi na ettha bahuvacanaṃ tathāruḷhiyā abhāvato.
tika-s0301t:1580_3: Tañca bhavananti tañca āḷavakassa yakkhassa bhavanaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1580_5: “Atha kho āḷavako yakkho yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamī”ti ettha tasmiṃ pāṭhapadese.
tika-s0301t:1580_6: Ayamanupubbikathāti ayaṃ idāni vuccamānā anupubbato āgatā kathā.
tika-s0301t:1580_12: Migānaṃ vananato vasanato vānato vā “migavā”ti laddhasamaññaṃ migavaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1580_16: Udakaṃ viya pavisitvā ṭhitanti yathā parissamappatto udakaṃ pavisitvā ṭhito nirassāso hoti,
tika-s0301t:1580_19: Yakkhaṃ disvāva rañño bhayaṃ chambhitattaṃ ūrutthambhaṃ ahosi,
tika-s0301t:1580_22: Atha rājā dvidhā chinnaṃ migaṃ datvā attānaṃ mocetukāmo ahosi.
tika-s0301t:1580_23: Yakkho “nanu mama hatthagatakālato paṭṭhāya migopi mama santako,
tika-s0301t:1580_24: tattha kinnāma te kerāṭiyamidaṃ datvā attano mocana”nti rājānaṃ na muñci.
tika-s0301t:1580_25: Atha rājā tassa tādisaṃ paṭiññātaṃ akāsi.
tika-s0301t:1580_27: Bhavanaṃ anupagatanti idaṃ mama bhavanaṃ anupagataṃ.
tika-s0301t:1580_30: idāni tādisena anuññātañca khādituṃ labhāmīti dasseti.
tika-s0301t:1582_1: Tassa rañño mahesī āḷavakakumārassa mātāti vuttā.
tika-s0301t:1583_0: Desanāpariyosāneti yakkhaṃ dametvā paccāgantvā nagaradvārasamīpe rukkhamūle nisinnena bhagavatā sarājikāya
tika-s0301t:1583_4: Bhagavāpi passati pakaticakkhunāva nigrodhassa upari nibbattattā.
tika-s0301t:1585_0: Iminā pasaṅgena sakalajambudīpaṃ byāpetvā pavatte aparepi tayo sadde yathā ete,
tika-s0301t:1587_2: Imāni kira sakkādīnaṃ puññānubhāvena nibbattāni appaṭihatappabhāvāni paṭipakkhavidhamanayuttāni avajjhāni āvudhāni.
tika-s0301t:1589_3: Mudubhūtacittavavatthānakaraṇatthanti mudubhūtaṃ attano citte vavatthānassa karaṇatthaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1590_1: Bhagavato sāsane ṭhite payirupāsitvā uggahitaṃ bhagavantaṃ payirūpāsitvā uggahitameva nāmāti āha “kassapaṃ…pe...
tika-s0301t:1591_2: Tena tuyhaṃ pucchaṃ tāva sutvā vissajjessanti dasseti.
tika-s0301t:1591_6: sutvā jānissāmī”ti avatvā sabbaññubuddhassa aniyametvā vacanaṃ sabbavisayaṃ hotīti āha “sabbaṃ te”tiādi.
tika-s0301t:1593_0: Saddhīdha vittanti ekadesena samudāyadassanaṃ samuddapabbatanidassanaṃ viya. Iti-
tika-s0301t:1593_2: “Vittikaraṇato vitta”nti vuttamatthaṃ sandhāya hetūpamāhi yojetvā dassetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1593_7: lokasantatiāvahanato ca saddhā vittaṃ yathā taṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇādīni.
tika-s0301t:1593_9: Nanu cetanā sammādiṭṭhiādayo ca sātisayaṃ vipākasukhaṃ āvahanti,
tika-s0301t:1594_2: saddhāvittameva uttamanti pāḷiyaṃ seṭṭhaggahaṇaṃ katanti dassetuṃ “yasmā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1594_5: Sabbasampattihetūti sabbāsaṃ sīlasampadādīnaṃ lokiyalokuttarānaṃ sampattīnaṃ hetu.
tika-s0301t:1594_8: Anaññasādhāraṇattā sabbasampattihetubhāvato hiraññādivittanidānattā ca saddhāvittameva seṭṭhaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1595_2: “Sukha”nti tividhassapi sukhassa sādhāraṇaggahaṇametanti taṃ savisesaladdhaṃ puggalavasena dassento “soṇaseṭṭhi…pe…
tika-s0301t:1595_4: Yo so padumavatiyā deviyā putto mahāpadumo nāma rājā dibbasukhasadisaṃ rajjasukhamanubhavitvā pacchā paccekabuddho hutvā nibbānasukhamanubhavi,
tika-s0301t:1595_5: taṃ nidassanabhāvena gahetvā āha “mahāpadumādīnaṃ viya nibbānasukhañca āvahatī”ti.
tika-s0301t:1596_0: Atthuddhāranayena saccasaddaṃ saṃvaṇṇento “anekesu atthesu dissatī”ti āha.
tika-s0301t:1596_3: Veramaṇīsu hi patiṭṭhitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā “sacce ṭhitā”ti vuccanti.
tika-s0301t:1596_4: Attākārampi vatthuṃ idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti pavattiyākāraṃ upādāya diṭṭhi eva saccanti diṭṭhisaccaṃ,
tika-s0301t:1596_10: nāhaṃ kvacani kassaci kiñcanatasmi”ntiādinā catukkanipāte āgatāni.
tika-s0301t:1597_0: Udakamhi dhāvatīti udakapiṭṭhiyaṃ abhijjamānāyaṃ pathaviyā viya dhāvati gacchati mahākappinarājā viya.
tika-s0301t:1597_1: Visampi saccena hananti paṇḍitāti kaṇhadīpāyanādayo viya.
tika-s0301t:1597_2: Saccenāti macchajātake bodhisattassa viya saccena devo thanayaṃ pavassati.
tika-s0301t:1597_3: Sacce ṭhitāti viratisacce vācāsacce ca ṭhitā tayopi bodhisattā.
tika-s0301t:1598_1: Niddhāraṇañca koci kutoci kenaci imanti kassaci vacanaṃ na sādhetīti dassento “ye ime”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t:1598_2: Tena hi nibbānaṃ rasasamudāyato sādutaratāvisesena niddhārīyati.
tika-s0301t:1598_19: Saccaṃ haveti ettha haveti ekaṃsatthe nipāto,
tika-s0301t:1598_23: Nanu ca sukhuppattipayojanattā cittampi upabrūhentīti? Na,
tika-s0301t:1598_26: Cittamupabrūheti padālikāya virativācāya saccarase sati samathavipassanādīhi cittaparibrūhanassa sambhavato maggaphalānisaṃsaṃ gaṇhāti.
tika-s0301t:1598_32: Evaṃ santepi “vimuttirasaparibhāvitattā”ti etena kāmaṃ vimuttiraso vā paramatthasaccaraso vā sādutararasāti dasseti.
tika-s0301t:1598_34: Atthañca dhammañcāti phalañca kāraṇañca nissāya pavattito attharasā dhammarasā ca sādū,
tika-s0301t:1599_7: Taṃ pana gahaṭṭhapabbajitavasena vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “gahaṭṭho vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1600_3: Gāthāya catūhi padehi vuttesu atthesu ekassa atthassa siddhiyaṃ itaresampi siddhiṃ anujānāti.
tika-s0301t:1600_7: Yesaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ balavabhāvena oghataraṇādi na sijjhati,
tika-s0301t:1600_11: Asaddahantoti evaṃ paṭipajjanto imāya paṭipattiyā oghaṃ taratīti na saddahanto.
tika-s0301t:1600_12: Na pakkhandatīti pakkhandanalakkhaṇāya saddhāya na ugghāṭīyatīti na otarati.
tika-s0301t:1600_18: Tasmāti vuttassa catubbidhassapi atthassa hetubhāvena paccāmasanaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1601_1: Sappurisasaṃsevo saddhammassavanaṃ yonisomanasikāro dhammānudhammapaṭipattīti imesaṃ sotāpattimaggādhigamassa
tika-s0301t:1601_11: vattamānasamīpepi pana vattamānaṃ viya voharaṇaṃ yuttaṃ diṭṭhoghassa tiṇṇabhāvassa ekantikattāti “sotāpannañca pakāsetī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1601_16: taratī”ti ettake vutte sakideva imassa lokassa āgamanampi gahitaṃ siyāti tannivattanatthaṃ “ārādhetvā…pe…
tika-s0301t:1601_18: Nanu “avasesa”nti vuttattā sotāpattimaggena atiṇṇaṃ anavasesaṃ bhavoghavatthu gahitameva siyāti? Na,
tika-s0301t:1601_19: upari dvīhi maggehi taritabbānaṃ tesaṃ parato dvinnaṃ pahānavasena vuccamānattā.
tika-s0301t:1601_21: “evaṃ esā codanā attano visaye na patiṭṭhātī”ti.
tika-s0301t:1601_22: Anādikālabhāvattā kāmasaññāya kāmoghataraṇaṃ mahatā eva vīriyena sādhetabbanti āha “vīriyenā”ti.
tika-s0301t:1601_27: Kāmanaṭṭhena kāmo ca so dukkho cāti kāmadukkhaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1601_29: sabbaso samucchinnattā vigatā kāmasaññā etissāti vigatakāmasaññā.
tika-s0301t:1601_30: Sabbesaṃ rāgādimalānaṃ mūlabhūtattā sattasantānassa visesato malīnasabhāvāpādanato paramaṃ ukkaṃsagataṃ malanti paramamalaṃ, avijjā.
tika-s0301t:1602_0: Paññāpadaṃ gahetvāti yathāvuttaṃ paññāpadaṃ hadaye ṭhapetvā.
tika-s0301t:1602_1: Tappasaṅgena attano paṭibhānena sabbehi viya uggahitaniyāmena.
tika-s0301t:1602_6: abhisamparāyasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ sarūpato saccapaṭivedhanipphādanena ñāṇena jānitvā.
tika-s0301t:1602_7: Nanu esa lokuttaraṃ sotāpattimaggaphalapaññaṃ tadadhigamūpāyaṃ lokiyapaññañca abhibhavitvā ṭhito,
tika-s0301t:1602_10: upari pana samādhissa yuttiṃ pucchitukāmo paññāya seṭṭhabhāvato,
tika-s0301t:1602_11: tassa ca ekadeseneva adhigatattā tameva ādiṃ katvā pucchati.
tika-s0301t:1603_2: Samathavipassanābhūtena nippariyāyena bodhipakkhiye eva gaṇhanto “aparabhāge”ti āha.
tika-s0301t:1603_9: Yadi evaṃ kasmā “saddahāno”ti vuttanti āha “yasmā panā”tiādi.
tika-s0301t:1603_10: Kiṃ vuttaṃ hotītiādinā vuttameva atthaṃ vivarati.
tika-s0301t:1603_12: atha kho appamādena paññaṃ labhatīti dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ “appamatto vicakkhaṇo”ti vuttanti tadatthaṃ dassento “eva”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0301t:1604_0: Idāni saddhādīnaṃ paññāpaṭilābhassa taṃtaṃvisesapaccayāni nīharitvā dassetuṃ “eva”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1604_8: atha kho yāthāvato paññāsampavedhanañcāti āha “vitthārikaṃ karotī”ti.
tika-s0301t:1604_9: Idāni paññāpaṭilābhahetuṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā dassetuṃ “sussūsāya vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1604_10: Atthamupaparikkhatīti sutakatānaṃ dhammānaṃ pāḷiatthūpaparikkhāpubbakaṃ rūpārūpavibhāgaṃ paramatthaṃ
tika-s0301t:1604_12: Anupubbenāti evaṃ ñātapariññaṃ patvā tīraṇapariññāya tato anukkamena tīraṇapariññaṃ pahānapariññañca
tika-s0301t:1604_13: matthakaṃ pāpento maggappaṭipāṭiyā paramatthasaccabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikaroti.
tika-s0301t:1605_0: Imāni saddhādīni cattāri kāraṇāni matthakaṃ pāpetvā dassento āha “desakālādīni ahāpetvā”ti.
tika-s0301t:1605_1: Yasmiṃ dese yasmiṃ kāle ye ca sahāyake nissāya yaṃ kiccaṃ tiretabbaṃ,
tika-s0301t:1605_2: tāni desakālādīni anatikkamitvā attano abhivuḍḍhiṃ icchantena “ayaṃ nāma deso,
tika-s0301t:1605_13: Evaṃ paṭipajjanto hi lokiyassa dhanassa paṭirūpādhigamūpāyaṃ karoti nāma.
tika-s0301t:1605_16: Idha pana dhurasampaggaho uttarapadalopena dhuro, vīriyaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1605_20: Tiṇā bhiyyo na maññatīti tiṇaṃ viya paribhavanto atibhuyya vattatīti attho.
tika-s0301t:1608_0: Niccaṃ mattena soṇḍena, sakkā āvasituṃ ghara”nti ca. ; –
tika-s0301t:1609_4: Catusatasahassasaṅkhaṃ cūḷantevāsī viyāti kākaṇikaḍḍhakahāpaṇa- soḷasa- kahāpaṇa-
tika-s0301t:1609_7: cūḷakamahāseṭṭhino dhītulābhavasena dve satasahassānīti evaṃ catusatasahassasaṅkhaṃ dhanaṃ ekamūlena yathā cūḷantevāsī vindi,
tika-s0301t:1609_8: evaṃ aññopi patirūpakārī dhuravā uṭṭhātā vindate dhanaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1612_7: taṃ dassento “duddadaṃ vā dadaṃ taṃ ganthatī”ti āha.
tika-s0301t:1613_5: “Ete caturo dhammā”tiādinā gahitā anantaragāthāya vuttadhammā evāti dassento “vuttappakāraṃ sacca”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0301t:1613_7: ime akusalā”tiādinā te atthe yāthāvato dhāraṇato upadhāraṇato dhammo.
tika-s0301t:1613_9: avicchedato sandhāraṇato kusalasantānaṃ dhāretīti dhiti, vīriyaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1614_0: Aññepīti ito yathāvuttadhammasamudāyato aññepi dhammā yadi santi,
tika-s0301t:1614_7: “Paññā imasmiṃ ṭhāne paññāti dhammoti ca āgatā”tiādinā paññādiatthassa uddharaṇaṃ atthuddhāro.
tika-s0301t:1614_8: Tassa tassa atthassa “paññā pajānanā”tiādinā vevacanapadānaṃ uddharaṇaṃ paduddhāro.
tika-s0301t:1614_11: dametīti damoti evaṃ padassa kathanaṃ padavaṇṇanā.
tika-s0301t:1615_2: Saccasampaṭivedhāvagahaṇaṃ vā yathāvuttena pakārena diṭṭhasaccatāya idhalokaparalokatthaṃ yāthāvato jānanto.
tika-s0301t:1615_3: Evañca yakkho satthu desanānubhāvasiddhaṃ pañhaṃ pucchanena attano paṭilābhasampattiṃ vibhāvento “kathaṃsu labhate pañña”ntiādimāhāti ācariyā.
tika-s0301t:1615_6: tena “diṭṭhadhammiko cā”ti ayamattho vutto evāti dassento “yo attho…pe…
tika-s0301t:1616_0: Tassa ñāṇassāti tassa atthassa āvibhāvanassa ñāṇassa.
tika-s0301t:1616_1: Guṇavisesehi ca sadisassapi aññassa abhāvato aggadakkhiṇeyyo buddho bhagavā. Tenāha –
tika-s0301t:1622_0: Satapuññalakkhaṇanti satasahassakappe puññasambhārassa katattā tesaṃ puññānaṃ vasena satapuññalakkhaṇaṃ anekapuññanibbattalakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1622_6: pūresīti gāthāpūraṇatthameva hi bhagavā tathārūpāni akāsi.
tika-s0301t:1624_2: yuddhatthaṃ pana bahuso ussāhassa katattā “yuddhamādiṃ katvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1624_3: Tameva āḷavakasuttaṃ kathesi tassā eva desanāya sannipatitaparisāya sappāyattā.
tika-s0301t:1633_2: Tatrāti tasmiṃ asurānaṃ abhiyāne ayaṃ dāni vuccamānā anupubbato kathā.
tika-s0301t:1633_3: Tettiṃsa purise gahetvāti tettiṃsa purise puññakiriyāya sahāyabhūte gahetvā.
tika-s0301t:1633_4: “Yāvajīvaṃ mātāpitubharo assa”ntiādinā samādinnāni satta vatapadāni pūretvā.
tika-s0301t:1634_0: Uragādisahacaritāni ṭhānāni uragādīnīti āha “uragādīsu pañcasu ṭhānesū”ti.
tika-s0301t:1634_2: Pañcayojanasahassavitthāraputhubahalāhi sinerussa catūsupi passesu cattāro paribhaṇḍā.
tika-s0301t:1634_3: Sinerussa hi tasmiṃ tasmiṃ passe yugandharādīsu pañcasataparittadīpaparivāre mahādīpe ca labhitabbassa mahato atthassa vasena mahatthā.
tika-s0301t:1636_0: Pamādaṃ āpādesīti sakkassa āṇāya pamādaṃ āpajji.
tika-s0301t:1637_2: Kiñci kiccanti kasivāṇijjādibhedaṃ aññataraṃ kiccaṃ kattabbakammaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1637_6: Kammaṃ akatvāti kiñcipi jīvitahetubhūtaṃ kammaṃ akatvā.
tika-s0301t:1637_7: Jīvitaṭṭhānaṃ nāmāti tassa jīvitassa hetu nāma.
tika-s0301t:1643_3: Bhusā panassa byūḷhatā dvinnaṃ senānaṃ samāgantvā sampiṇḍitabhāvenāti āha “sampiṇḍito rāsibhūto”ti.
tika-s0301t:1643_11: Dutiyaṃ āsanaṃ labhatīti sakke nisinne tassa anantaraṃ dutiyaṃ āsanaṃ labhati.
tika-s0301t:1643_16: Rajadhajaṃ disvāti parasenāya upagacchantiyā uṭṭhitarajamattampi disvā ṭhitopi taṃ rajadhajaṃ disvā bhīrubhāvena palāyanadhammo.
tika-s0301t:1644_1: Ānubhāvo vattati asammukhībhūtāhipi devatāhi sirasā sampaṭicchitabbato.
tika-s0301t:1644_3: saddena rogabhayādīnañceva vaṭṭadukkhassa ca saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo vidhinā bhāvite parittassa atthe upacārajjhānādīnampi ijjhanato.
tika-s0301t:1648_2: Isīhi pana abhayaṃ yācite “bhayameva dadāmī”ti vatvā tehi “akkhayaṃ hotu te bhaya”nti abhisapavasena
tika-s0301t:1648_5: Nipātapadānipi kānici atthavisesajotakāni hontīti āha “nipātamatta”nti hetuatthādīnamettha asambhavato.
tika-s0301t:1648_17: Na taṃ akkosaṃ manasi karoti dīgharattaṃ khantisoraccesu niruḷhaajjhāsayattā.
tika-s0301t:1649_3: maññe upasameneva paccatthikassa nāyakabhūtassa kodhassa paṭisedhanato.
tika-s0301t:1649_4: Tādise hi kodho paṭikiriyaṃ alabhanto anupādāno viya jātavedo vūpasammati. Yadā-
tika-s0301t:1649_7: Tāvadeva dve gāvo yujjhanteti tasmiṃyeva khaṇe dvīsu goṇesu yujjhantesu.
tika-s0301t:1650_0: Khantito uttaritaro añño attho na vijjati anantareva assa virodhaṃ anatthaṃ paṭibāhitvā diṭṭhadhammikassa ceva samparāyikassa ca saṃvidhānato.
tika-s0301t:1650_1: Taṃ khantiṃ paramaṃ āhu seṭṭhabalaṃ virodhapaccayaṃ abhibhuyya pavattanato.
tika-s0301t:1650_5: Taṃ yassa balanti taṃ aññāṇabalaṃ yassa puggalassa balaṃ,
tika-s0301t:1650_7: Paṭivattā na vijjatīti dhammaṭṭhaṃ paṭippharitvā abhibhavitvā pavattā natthi.
tika-s0301t:1650_14: “Bālo aya”nti evaṃ paññapetuṃ hetuphalānaṃ anavabodhato catusaccadhamme achekāti.
tika-s0301t:1653_1: “Chekatāyā”ti vatvā tassa vattuṃ chekabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “evaṃ kirassā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t:1653_3: Mocetvāti yassa puna “coro”ti uttari vattuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0301t:1653_4: evaṃ vimocetvāti paṭhamaṃ vattuṃ na sakkā.
tika-s0301t:1653_7: Pacchāti “parassā”ti vutto so kiñci paṭhamaṃ vadanto attano adhippāyaṃ pavedeti nāma,
tika-s0301t:1653_8: taṃ yathāsatti viditamano tassa uttari vattuṃ sakkoti.
tika-s0301t:1653_9: Tenāha “parassa vacanaṃ anugantvā pana pacchā sukhaṃ vattu”nti.
tika-s0301t:1653_14: Vacasi kusalo sakko devarājā taṃ visesaṃ teneva pubbaṃ upanayāpento upalāpanavasena “tumhe khvetthā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t:1653_15: Pubbadevāti sakkapamukhāya devaparisāya loke pubbeva uppannattā “pubbadevā”ti pasaṃsavacanaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1653_16: Vepacittiṃ sandhāya “tumhe”ti “pubbadevā”ti ca vuttattā “tumhākaṃ tāva paveṇiāgataṃ bhaṇathā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1656_6: Puññapaccayanibbattoti uḷāraṃ suvipulaṃ puññaṃ paccayaṃ katvā nibbatto.
tika-s0301t:1656_9: Vibhaggaṃ nimmathitanti ito cito vibhaggañceva niravasesato mathitañca hoti.
tika-s0301t:1659_4: Cetiyarājā kira imasmiṃ kappe tato pubbe kenaci avuttapubbaṃ kharamusāvādaṃ abhāsi,
tika-s0301t:1659_5: tāvadeva virajjhitvā mahāpathaviyā vivare dine nipatitvā avīciaggijālānamindanamahosi.
tika-s0301t:1659_8: Tathā hi vepacittino sapathakaraṇe nidassanabhāvena etāni aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatānīti.
tika-s0301t:1662_5: Sabbe hi anipphannā atthā na sobhanti.
tika-s0301t:1662_7: Akiccajātoti asañjātakicco kiccarahito nāma natthi gamanaṭṭhitasayananisajjādivasena uppajjanakadukkhavinodanabhāvato.
tika-s0301t:1662_8: Saṃyogaparamātveva sambhogāti imesaṃ sattānaṃ saṃbhuñjitabbavatthūni nāma pakatiyā virodhasīlānipi asaṃyogena vā asundarānipi,
tika-s0301t:1662_9: tāni abhisaṅkharaṇapacanasaṃyojanaparamāni veditabbāni tathā sati sambhogārahabhāvūpagamanato.
tika-s0301t:1665_3: tasmā ime antaravattino dve janā sakkavepacittino sujāya vasena jāmātikasasurā.
tika-s0301t:1665_4: “Ciradikkhitāna”nti dikkhitvā pabbajitvā cirakālānaṃ vatasamādānavasena ito bāhirakānaṃ pabbajitānanti āha “cirasamādinnavatāna”nti.
tika-s0301t:1665_5: Ito paṭikkamāti ito yathāṭhitaṭṭhānato apehi apakkama.
tika-s0301t:1665_7: Devā hi yebhuyyena “mayaṃ pubbe guṇavante payirupāsitvā tesaṃ ovāde ṭhatvā puññāni upacinitvā idhūpapannā”ti guṇavantesu ādarabhāvaṃ upaṭṭhapenti.
tika-s0301t:1668_2: Yatheva sinerusamīpe mahāsamuddo anupubbaninno anupubbapoṇo anupubbapabbhāro,
