tika-s0301t:1668_7: Evaṃ cintayiṃsūti “yaṃ nūna maya”ntiādinā yathā pāḷiyaṃ āgataṃ,
tika-s0301t:1669_2: Te pana duṭṭhajjhāsayā viruddhā hontīti āha “duṭṭhānaṃ viruddhāna”nti.
tika-s0301t:1670_1: Yathāvāraṃ bhakkhitametaṃ devānaṃ viya sukhumaṃ guruvāsañca na hotīti “bhatta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1675_4: Samattānīti puññavisesatāya pujjabhavaphalanibbattanena kittisaññānena ca samaṃ attāni samattāni.
tika-s0301t:1675_8: na yā kāci mātulassa bhariyā kulajeṭṭhakānaṃ adhippetattā,
tika-s0301t:1676_5: ayaṃ pana na evanti “muttacāgo hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1676_8: tathā dānabahulo “payatapāṇī”ti vuttoti āha “deyyadhammadānatthāya sadā dhotahattho”ti.
tika-s0301t:1676_10: Parehi yācitabbārahoti parehi yācituṃ yutto icchitassa atthassa tāvadeva vissajjanato.
tika-s0301t:1676_11: Dāneneva yuttoti sabbakālaṃ dāneneva yutto abhiṇhaṃ pavattamahādānattā.
tika-s0301t:1676_12: Dāne ca saṃvibhāge cāti parassa sampuṇṇaṃ katvā pariccajanasaṅkhāte dāne ca attanā paribhuñjitabbato saṃvibhajanasaṅkhāte saṃvibhāge ca rato abhirato.
tika-s0301t:1679_10: taṃ pana saddhāsaṅkhātaṃ maghaṃ assa atthīti maghavā.
tika-s0301t:1679_11: Pure dānaṃ dadātīti purindado anunāsikalopaṃ akatvā.
tika-s0301t:1682_5: Yathā paṭipajjanto anukkamena te dhamme samādiyitvā sakko sakkattaṃ ajjhagā,
tika-s0301t:1685_4: Tasmiṃ ṭhāneti tassa devaputtassa tasmiṃ uppajjanaṭṭhāne.
tika-s0301t:1685_5: Lāmakato cintentīti tassa purimavatthuṃ nissāya hīnato cintenti.
tika-s0301t:1685_8: Sabbadā paricchijja parivārasampanno hutvā aḍḍhaṭṭharatane hatthikkhandhe mahaccarājānubhāvena nisinnattā janakāyena samullokiyamāno.
tika-s0301t:1685_14: Kāḷarattehi suttehi sibbitattā vaṇṇavikāraṃ disvā “kuṭṭhicīvarāni pāruto”ti āha.
tika-s0301t:1685_19: tassa pana akusalakammassa vipākino balavabhāvato vuttaṃ “vipākāvasesenā”ti.
tika-s0301t:1685_22: Bhikkhāya carituṃ samatthakālato paṭṭhāya rogassa balavatāya maṃsāni…pe… patanti.
tika-s0301t:1685_23: Ñāṇaṃ pesetvāti vipassanāpaṭipāṭiyā bhāvanāñāṇaṃ nibbānaṃ paṭipesetvā pavattetvā.
tika-s0301t:1685_24: Indriyānaṃ paripakkattā satthu desanāvilāsena sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhito.
tika-s0301t:1685_26: Kuṭṭhino hi sakalapādatalaṃ mā rujīti cumbaṭaṃ katvā taṃ pādatale bandhitvā gacchanti,
tika-s0301t:1685_27: mattikapātiṃ bhinditvā viya tathā nihīnamanussattabhāvato cavitvā suvaṇṇapātiṃ paṭilabhanto viya devattabhāvaṃ
tika-s0301t:1685_28: gaṇhanto cuticittato dutiyacittavāre ādānacittakkhaṇe devaloke nibbatto.
tika-s0301t:1686_1: Ariyakantasīlanti ariyānaṃ kantaṃ manāpaṃ manoramaṃ sīladhammaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1686_2: Ariyānaṃ adhicittaadhipaññāsikkhā viya adhisīlasikkhāpi sabbā ativiya kantā evāti āha “kiñcāpī”tiādi.
tika-s0301t:1686_3: Imasmiṃ panattheti imasmiṃ sotāpannassa bhavasaṅkhāte atthe niddhāretvā vuccamāne.
tika-s0301t:1686_4: Pañcasīlampi yasmā diṭṭhi viya bhavantarepi appahīnaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1689_3: Te eva cetenti ettha saddhāya attano pītisomanassaṃ sandhahantīti cetiyāti ca vuccanti.
tika-s0301t:1689_5: Tassa pana sīlādiguṇavasena acinteyyāparimeyyānubhāvatāpi hotīti bhagavā “nāgghanti soḷasi”nti avoca.
tika-s0301t:1689_6: Acetanāya bhūmiyā ramaṇīyatā nāma guṇavisiṭṭhānaṃ ariyānaṃ sevanavasena veditabbāti vuttaṃ “idāni…pe…
tika-s0301t:1692_2: Aṭṭhuppattiko suttanikkhepoti dassetvā atthavaṇṇanaṃ kātuṃ “tadā kirā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1692_4: Tehi tehi vā yathāladdhasappiādayo mā nassantu,
tika-s0301t:1692_5: aggabhāvena gahitāni sappiādīni kevalaṃ aggimhi jhāpanena,
tika-s0301t:1693_3: Bhikkhusaṅghassa adaṃsu “sammāsambuddhena mahābrahmunā ca evaṃ ovādo dinno”ti.
tika-s0301t:1696_6: Vitthārato pana āyāmato ca anekayojanasatasahassaparimāṇacakkavāḷaṃ atibyāpetvā ṭhitassa.
tika-s0301t:1696_9: Te hi taṃsamaṅgino puggalassa sampātanaṭṭhena bhārā nāma.
tika-s0301t:1696_12: Pannarasāya puṇṇamāya rattinti yathā pannarasapuṇṇamāya rattiyaṃ paripuṇṇakāle upakkilesavimutto cando sobhati,
tika-s0301t:1696_13: evaṃ tava cittaṃ sabbaso upakkilesavimuttaṃ sobhatīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0301t:1699_2: Kā pana tāti āha “catasso disā catasso anudisā cā”ti.
tika-s0301t:1699_3: Anudisāgahaṇena cettha uddhaṃ adhopi gayhatīti ca dasseti.
tika-s0301t:1699_6: Cirarattasamāhitacitteti upacārappanājhānāni uppādetvā aparihīnajjhānatāya cirakālaṃ samāhitacitte.
tika-s0301t:1699_12: saddena tato katipayehi uposathasīlavasena aṭṭhahipīti dasseti.
tika-s0301t:1702_1: Brahmajāṇukoti dakkhiṇajāṇumaṇḍalaṃ pathaviyaṃ ṭhapetvā vandamāno brahmajāṇuko nāma tathābhūto hutvā.
tika-s0301t:1702_3: Evaṃ pūjāvisesayogato sakkoti āha “so yakkhoti so sakko”ti.
tika-s0301t:1702_4: Sakkassa namakkārabhājanabhūtañhi pucchanto mātali “ko nāma so yakkho”ti āha.
tika-s0301t:1702_5: Guṇanemittakehīti guṇahetukehi anantāni hi buddhānaṃ nāmāni,
tika-s0301t:1708_2: attano eva vā pūtidehaṃ sarīraṃ tasmiṃ ṭhitatāya avattharitvā sayanato pūtidehasayāti yojanā.
tika-s0301t:1708_3: Kuṇapamheteti ete manussā asuciduggandhajegucchapaṭikkūle mātukucchisaṅkhāte kuṇapasmiṃ dasa māse nimuggā.
tika-s0301t:1708_5: Etesaṃ etaṃ vihayāmīti etesaṃ isīnaṃ etaṃ sammāpaṭipattiṃ vihayāmi.
tika-s0301t:1708_6: Idāni taṃ paṭipattiṃ dassetuṃ “na te saṃ koṭṭhe opentī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1708_7: Dhaññaṃ koṭṭhe na pakkhipanti pakkhipitabbassa ca abhāvato.
tika-s0301t:1708_9: Paresaṃ niṭṭhitanti paresaṃ gahitaṃ santakaṃ tesaṃ pākāya niṭṭhitaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1709_0: Evaṃ subhāsitabhāsinoti ganthadhuravipassanādhurānaṃ vasena guṇaparimāṇasubhāsitasseva bhāsanasīlā.
tika-s0301t:1717_4: na pana so tathārūpo koci yakkho.
tika-s0301t:1717_6: Yadi evaṃ kasmā so tathārūpo hutvā āgatoti āha “sakko kirā”ti.
tika-s0301t:1717_8: na paneso avaruddhakayakkho”ti yuttiṃ dassento “avaruddhakayakkhā panā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0301t:1717_11: “Ko nāma mayhaṃ āsane sannisinno”ti akkhantiṃ anuppādento khantiyaṃ ṭhatvā.
tika-s0301t:1717_14: Sakkassa tāya eva ācārasampattiyā sakkāsane ṭhātuṃ,
tika-s0301t:1717_16: Upahatacittomhīti khantimettānuddayāsabbhāvato parasmiṃ upahatacittomhīti sakko attano sabhāvaṃ vadati.
tika-s0301t:1717_17: Kodhavase vattetunti kodhena attano vase nibbattetuṃ na sukaromhi,
tika-s0301t:1717_18: atha kho kodhaṃ mayhaṃ vase na vattemīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0301t:1717_19: Ciraṃ na kujjhāmīti yadi me kadāci kodho uppajjeyya,
tika-s0301t:1717_20: taṃ kodhaṃ anuvattento cirakālaṃ na kujjhāmi.
tika-s0301t:1717_21: Na upanayhāmīti anto sace me kodho uppajjeyya,
tika-s0301t:1717_22: khippameva ca naṃ paṭivineyyanti taṃ me pubbeva vataṃ paripūritaṃ.
tika-s0301t:1720_3: Sambaro nāma asuramāyāya ādipuriso purātano asurindo.
tika-s0301t:1720_5: Evaṃ paccati aññopi māyāvī māyaṃ payojetvā.
tika-s0301t:1720_9: Tathā akatvāti isīnaṃ santikaṃ netvā khamāpanavasena kātabbaṃ akatvā.
tika-s0301t:1723_5: Yasmā accaye desiyamāne taṃ khīṇayati aññamaññassa khamamānassa khamanaṃ paṭiggaṇhato,
tika-s0301t:1723_13: evaṃ mittabhāvato vuttavipariyāyo amittadhammo jarāpariyāyena vutto.
tika-s0301t:1726_1: Kodho tumhe mā abhibhavīti ettha kodhena anabhibhavanīyattaṃ khantimettākaruṇāditappaṭipakkhadhammaparibrūhanena.
tika-s0301t:1726_2: Tathā hi taṃsamaṅgino kodho abhibhuyyatīti āha “tumheva kodhaṃ abhibhavatha.
tika-s0301t:1726_10: Lāmakajananti khantiādīsu yonisomanasikārābhāvena gārayhasamācārasamāyogena ca nihīnaṃ janaṃ.
